reviews.comments:
This was just an amazing stay!
I stayed in the cocoon. it was fantastic!! Such a unique and cool place to stay.
The hosts Joanna and fredrico were just fantastic too.
Very helpful and friendly. Just the best kind of hosts.
The place is full of beauty. Everything from the pool,the views and the hot tub. This place is 11/10 and would highly recommend it to anyone who visits terceira island.
reviews.response: Thank you Ian, it was a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for the tips about England ;) Merry Christmas

reviews.comments: Nice place in the nature, the jacuzzi is really recommended 🌿

Cocoon is extremely small and has no space for any bags whatsover. It has no lock and you have to keep your belongings in a shed that is not next to the cocoon, or even in sight of the cocoon. it's closer to another glamping pod with no safety lock for your belongings. Cocoon is considerably far from shared toilets , which is particularly difficult at night when there is no light and you have to cross a difficult unlit wooden carved bridge (which was partly falling apart). There is one toilet and shower for men and one toilet and shower for women, separated by small door which makes for uncomfortable time when you are trying to go, with someone right beside showering. The bathroom facilities are shared across entire glamping campus (there are over 6 other sleeping pods). In order to get to the cocoon you have to walk passed two other pods, which is neither practical nor private. The hot tub isn't included in price, you have to pay €10 for each use and it takes 2 hours to start - the price is not listed anywhere when you are booking. Hot tub is also not private as advertised which was a big problem for us as this was one of the big selling points to book this place. Private means for your use only, which this hot tub was not, and it was also right in front of other guest's pods, which is as far from private as you can imagine.  It is in the middle of a path where people can walk and access regularly so you can't enjoy the hot tub without people walking right next to you. This isn't really a 'private getaway' or 'escape'. When our taxi driver (local) brought us, he didn't know & couldn't find the place - which attests to the fact that it is in the middle of nowhere and not a 20 minute walk from Angra as one of the other reviewers inaccurately recalls. It is 15 minute drive away. We spent just one night here, even though we booked for 4 nights as it was not what we expected or paid for. Despite this, the owner refused our compromise of 50% refund and we were charged for two additional nights that we did not spend there. We spent over 6 hours waiting for the owners and airbnb to try and resolve this issue and meant we had to do a last minute booking elsewhere - more money spent. Joana wasn't even present for us to resolve this problem - so we had to deal with her partner who didn't resolve anything without Joana's approval - a cyclical issue that kept us waiting for 6 hours and still being refused a half-refund. Not the way we'd hoped to spend our anniversary, just very unprofessional manner of handling the situation. Not great customer service, at all.

Spending the night in the cocoon was a great experience, stargazing and swaying with the wind.
Breakfast was delicious and planting a plant at check out a nice and sustainable idea.

we had an amazing stay! Everything was well organised and also very clean. Everyone was very nice as well. the cocoon was a  great experience and also loved the idea of guests planting a plant. Has everything you need!

Great glamping experience. Waking up nestled in the cocoon was very unique and I look forward to staying again! It was so nice that the space was equipped with an outlet and light. The pool, breakfast, location, and hosts were amazing.

We had an amazing stay in the beautiful cocoon.
The hosts are both so kind and wonderful.
We stayed with them for our honeymoon and will definitely come back in the future.
Thank you so much ❤️

It was a unique experience in the cocoon even though we probably havent had a very deep sleep that night.
The staff was super friendly and we loved the idea of planting our own seeds.

Quinta do Abacate is a special glamping park that is all custom-made by Joana and her husband. It’s an incredible experience to stay in a suspended tent in nature - there’s also a lap pool, and other unique tents! All guests have the chance to plant their own avocados, which is so so cool. It’s a beautiful 20 minute walk from Angra de Heroismo where you can get the freshest fish and cold white wine while you take in the sunset. Joana is an exceptionally kind, generous host who will make you feel at home, even during a short stay (I was by myself and there for 1 day). Go for it!

Joana’s place is magical and beautifully kept. We slept through the night listening to the rain and we woke to the sounds of birds in the morning. Joana was attentive to each and every guest and she made us feel very welcome. Also, the breakfast spread was phenomenal!  What a treat!  Highly recommend:)
reviews.response:
Thank you Nora for your staying here, I love to know you, you're a lovelly couple and very good guests.
It was a pleasure to met you.
Kisses

reviews.comments: Loved our stay! Unique experience. So quiet and you feel in the middle of nature. Joana and her partner were lovely people and we loved playing with Abacate the friendly dog too! Breakfast was great and lovely views. The hot tub was amazing to sit watching the stars with the cold temperature outside and the warm water inside!
particular place! many fantastic stays and nature! amazing the plantation of a plant for the guests!
reviews.response: Thank you Jessica for your presence and contribute with the plant ;)

reviews.comments:
Experiência fantástica!
Para quem se quer afastar da cidade e viver uma experiência imersiva no meio da Natureza.
Toda a propriedade é absolutamente linda e bem cuidada.
A Joana é uma excelente anfitriã e sempre pronta a ajudar.
No final podemos ainda plantar as nossas sementes e deixar um marco na Quinta do Abacate.

Joana is an excellent host and always ready to help.

reviews.comments: We loved our stay! It was perfect. It was so fun and beautiful. There is loads around to do. We hope to come back soon.
Great we went with kids it was a surprise to stay in hobbit house and boy were they excited. But honestly we hardly spent time since we were sight seeing !  Caves , castles and Lascaux .
Its an experience, loved the hot tub, but a tad expensive for what you get. Lack of oven limits cooking.

the Hobbit house is great fun. Host was great in explaining the set-up and lovely breakfast.

A real experience, our boys loved the inset bunk beds. In bed we enjoyed looking at the stars.

There are other rooms on site including 2 tree top houses. would love to book these for another trip.

Wow what an amazing place this is!
Vincent is a warm host, can tell you a lot about the region and the amazing food and wine. The hottub was warm when we arrived, bathrobes ready for us to take a dip.
The house is so special, better than in the pictures, and if you are lucky you can see the stars from your bed.
I would recommend this place to anyone, for a romantic weekend of with kids, its perfect!
A life changing experience, this place is unique and Vincent the warmest host.

Logements sympa, hors du commun, un équipement supplémentaire seraient un plus (micro-onde). Accueil sympathique.
Nous avons bien profité du bain nordique

Court séjour dans le logement « La Terre ». Le logement était impeccable et très bien équipé.
Un endroit dépaysant et calme qui peut être un peu perturbé par les logements autour (4 au total, ce n’est pas ce que nous avions imaginé).
Accueil chaleureux et explications claires. Hôte disponible sans être envahissant.
Le frigo est bien rempli (boissons et produits locaux dispo avec supplément pour certains) et peut dépanner à l’arrivée.

localizedReview.comments:
Short stay at the accommodation "La Terre". The place was spotless and very well equipped.
An exotic and quiet place that can be a little disturbed by the accommodations around (4 in total, that's not what we imagined).
Warm welcome and clear explanations. Host available but not invasive.
The fridge is well stocked (drinks and local products available with an extra charge for some) and can troubleshoot on arrival.

name: Sueña en el Nido de Quetzalcóatl 7
address: Naucalpan de Juárez, Estado de México, Mexico

reviews.comments: Been wanting to stay at this ethereal and dreamy spot for half a decade and oh my goodness was the wait worth it. Muchisimas gracias a Patricia for everything. Loved the tour, loved the hospitality, loved the manchego queso (even though I am lactose intolerant), and loved everything about this gorgeous architectural masterpiece. Was divine and ephemeral. Cannot wait to come back. Fue un placer y un gran sueño.

Words can’t describe how special and beautiful this place is! This is really one of my favorite places on planet earth.
Patricia went above and beyond with showing us the grounds.
We did have an issue with the power in our unit that went on for the duration of our stay. This made it difficult for some the people staying with us who needed the Wi-Fi to work.
That being said I’ll come back here anytime!
What a magnificent place full of magic. We are so grateful to have had the opportunity to stay here and tour the park. Thank you so much.

Unforgettable experience. We had an extensive personal tour of the entire surrounding park given by an architect from Javier
Senosiain's studio. The entire space, including the apartment, was carefully designed. Every inch of this property is amazing and worth experiencing.

If I were to stay again, I would make sure I came fully stocked with food and wine so I would not have to leave the grounds once I arrived. You can spend hours getting lost in every fine detail of the entire complex.

This place is magical! I highly recommend staying in Javier Sanosiain's  Dream world.  A great gateway and an amazing place to take in nature along with the incredible architectural design!  Will be back:)

El Nido and the adjacent Park Quetzalcóatl are magical and well maintained. The adjacent garden park is huge and partially under construction but has many parts complete and the areas under construction give one a behind the scenes appreciation of this tremendous work. The buildings, gardens, and natural spaces are gorgeous and much better than expected. Take time to get lost here and not miss the chance to visit if you have it. Patricia, our amazing host, further brought the place to life.
If you are considering booking, DO IT NOW. It is absolutely an amazing experience. They think of it all. The tour, the guided meditation, everything was perfect!

This home was absolutely beautiful, both inside and out! The tour of the gardens and the museum were wonderful and gave me a stronger appreciation for the beauty and the landscape of the architecture. It is a little secluded, so bring some food to cook/eat and expect a few critters. Definitely also save daylight time to explore all the different pathways of the garden!

The apartment is gorgeous. Four levels of architectural beauty. Loved the property and the tour Laura gave us of the rest of the grounds. Laura was also able to convert some money for us to pay a taxi. She was very helpful once we arrived. My cons were location, communication, and ease of exiting and entering the property. The complex is about an hour outside of the city so it was extremely hard getting a ride to/from. No taxi drivers would take us or said it would be double. Communication. I messaged several times a month before our stay with no response until the day we were supposed to check in. They say they offer cab rides and cooks if you inquire but I didn’t get a response on those so we didn’t get a chance to book/reserve. Very frustrating when the hosts don’t respond to messages. Lastly, when we did get a ride to leave, we would get stranded outside because someone wasn’t at the front to let us out or let us in. Overall it was great to experience this place but I wouldn’t do it again. Also, don’t order pizza from Don Carmelo. Several of us got sick from their food.

Amazing architecture & nature in one place!!!
A macro sculpture...
Superb!!!

This was a magical experience unlike anything we’ve ever seen before. If you get the chance to tour the territory, take it! There’s no other way to access this incredible park full of organic architecture. You can tell the architect has amazing attention to detail, everything is thought out. Would definitely come again!

There are so many things to say about the wonderful experience we had at El Nido Quetzacoatl. There is not enough space to list everything that we loved about staying here.  The condo on this property was one of the most magical places we've ever stayed, and we highly recommend the experience to anyone who has considered a visit. The accommodations are immaculate in design and usability.  You will have everything you need to stay on the property.  We understand there are places to eat a short drive away, but we came with supplies and did not leave once we were there.  The setting is extremely romantic if going as a couple, large enough for a group of adults, and would be exciting for families to explore together.   Patricia is a perfect host, and gave us a thoughtful tour of the grounds and explained to us Javier Senosiain's vision of how organic architecture is not only beautiful but honors the ground it's built on.  We would love to go back and stay in El Nido again, and I would rate it 10 stars if I could.
What an unforgettable experience. We thoroughly enjoyed touring the grounds with Patricia and Gabriel and really appreciated the time they spent with us. Don't miss this gem!

Our stay was magical and exceeded expectations. There is so much thought and effort put into everything inside and out, you can find hidden details everywhere. The apartment itself is relaxing and comfortable, we also had meals prepared by Georgina which were both great. The tour of the property was amazing as well.

A dream come true! This isn't just a place to stay, its an entire experience that words cannot fully describe. Adriana and Gabriel as well as all the staff were a joy to be around. Take the tour!
100000/10 would recommend :)

There are truly no words to adequately express just how magical it was to experience El Nido de Quetzalcoatl. The ability to stay in a world-renowned architect's vision & creation is already mind-blowing, but the actual experience itself is transcendent because you are not merely occupying a habitat- It is fully immersive from the moment you step through the gate and the moment you depart. Patricia is an amazing host - her love and respect for El Nido and kindness towards its visitors radiates from her and shows in everything she does. It was such an honor and privilege to stay here and I cannot recommend it enough.
Lifetime experience. Amazing!

I can’t say enough about this. It’s even more amazing then the photos. Patricia creates the most lovely experience. The tour of the grounds. We also had food arranged and it was incredible. Best vacation ever.

5 stars as soon as you walk in the gate!  Quetzalcoatl's Nest makes you feel like you're on a private island. Didn't realize how big the place was until we walked the tour. Excited to see how it looks in the next 5 years. Patricia made sure we had everything we needed! 🐍🐍
The building, the unit, the gardens, and the park are beyond expectations!!! Patricia is a very warm and kind person. We had an amazing time.

reviews.comments:
What can I say the place was exactly what was described and more . Jo was amazing when booking and all the communication we had and laura was great on arrival. Everything you needed for outdoor living was thought of and available nothing was missed at all , we had a very windy night in the globe but didn’t ruin our experience as stayed between Xmas and new year and can not wait to return in the future. We even took our new puppy and she loved everything about it.
Amazing location and very quirky all thought out would highly recommend to others in a heartbeat thank you
great stay, thank you to Laura and everyone for pulling out all the stops to make our stay as comfortable as possible.
The most unique stay in the UK couldn’t find anything better and would recommend to absolutely anyone.
A very lovely treehouse and all setting is amazing. The view around super nice as well. Probably come back in summer.
What a magical place! Exceeded expectations and everything we needed for our stay was provided. Brilliant hosts, incredible outdoor facilities and had a great time. Thank you!

We loved our stay at the Globe! We went in November and felt like we were hibernating away. Had the fire lit all night keeping us toasty, loved cooking outdoors in the woods. Laura was kind and brought us extra logs, and we had a lovely hamper to arrive with. Really great stay!
visited just for 1 night. the place was stunning and had everything you may have needed. The views were gorgeous. Would definitely stay again! it was a lovely little get away

Wow. My first camping experience. Incredible!!

We arrived after dark with the weather was against us, but the camp was easy to find and luckily set up for all weather conditions.

The fire pit ideally situated next to the outdoor kitchen has water resistant sails above allowing for an evening of fun around the fire sheltered from the rain. Ample logs provided.

The globe is cosy and ideal for a couple or two adults. The sofas convert into one small double and single bed. The bedding was spotless. It was a cold wet evening but we slept very well with small log burner burning through the night. The bells chiming at the local church didn’t bother us.

The hamper provided was a lovely touch including fresh milk, eggs, bread, butter and marshmallows, amongst other essentials.

The facilities are well thought out providing ample hot water and clean towels.

The host couldn’t have been more welcoming.

Overall we score the experience 10/10 and will return.
Such an amazing unique place to stay. Every second is special there 😍
this place is magical excellent host excellent location l. can't wait to come back for  longer 5*  from us

Wow!! We had the most incredible stay in the sleepy explorer globe celebrating our 10th wedding anniversary. The day we were arriving Laura got in touch and asked if we need anything and if we would like her to meet us and give us a tour to our accommodation or if we wanted to explore on our own we opted for the tour!

Laura met us at the gate and shown us around and we met the piglets… The forest area is just perfection. We lead extremely hectic busy lives so the peace and tranquility was literally a breath of fresh air.

Camp was clean, had everything you could need. We went for dinner at the Langdon arms (Recommended prior by Laura) which was really yummy!

I can’t wait to return back already! Thankyou Laura & Ed was a truly memorable experience x
Fantastic stay, amazing location too. Very friendly vibe all the best guys.

Outstanding! From start to finish, what an amazing place to stay. I had booked the Globe as an half term adventure for me and my son, and it fitted the bill perfectly.

Laura and Jo were incredible in terms of communications before and during the meet, and they truly excelled themselves with their own little bit of magic to make our stay are real surprise and adventure for the little one.

The Globe itself was cosy and warm throughout the night, even without the log burner lit (during late October). Amazing shower, something refreshing about showering with the woods around you!

Can't reccomend this place enough! Fingers crossed we'll be back soon!

Outstanding, magical experience for adult plus two tween kids. Laura is a generous host and there’s lots of thoughtful extras.
We went on a windy night and globe barely moved, it’s Engineered brilliantly and totally secure. Best 24 hour break ever

Magical! What an amazing adventure for me and my 13 year old twins. Such a brilliant location and you really feel away from it all!
Everything you need is there to help you fully immerse in the off grid lifestyle. They’ve really thought about the little details that make your stay as wonderful as possible.
The welcome hamper is very lovely, beds are super snuggly, shower and toilet impeccably clean. Lighting and firewood spot on. And sleeping in the tree pod is such a fantastic experience. Highly recommend

Perfect! :)

Drinking & Cooking round the fire all night, fairy lights look so good and the Pod…. wowwwww we want one. Amazing trip.

Such an amazing place to stay! We were there for 1 night in October and the pod was lovely and cosy. They have thought of everything you could possibly need; basket with eggs, bread, biscuits ect. really good cooking facilities and everything was very clean and tidy. The area was nice too, lot of walking options and we went for dinner at the pub in the village which was lovely. Would definitely recommend!
Pure peace. The sound of the birds and the roaring fire matched paired with a card game and a glass of wine. We would definitely recommend this true escape from the havoc of life!

best experience in my life !

The host was so friendly and helpful, and provided everything we need.

The place is magnificent and superior, and it is really outdoor experience!!

High recommends

What a great couple of days, away from the stress and mayhem of life and back to enjoying nature. Laura was an amazing host, gave us such a warm welcome and was very attentive to our requests.

Could not recommend this place enough.

name: Dhow - Clifftop, Unique boat design, Amazing views

reviews.comments: I wish I could have stayed longer. The serene and picturesque surroundings made for a beautiful stay. Would totally recommend.
We loved our stay at Deborah’s Dhow. It was the loveliest place with a beautiful view and we enjoyed exploring the nearby are.

Loved the Dhow. Breathtaking views, very quiet and peaceful - just what I needed for my rest. Deborah is a great host - always helpful but stays out of your way. The home has everything you need and is very clean. Great value for money!

a peaceful weekend getaway with lovely views and cozy space highly recommend this place for any relaxing visit. very accommodating hosts with sweet dogs as a bonus. lovely patio for bbq with easy to operate grill.

Amazing place. Really enjoyed my stay at the dhow. It the perfect home away from home just that it's in the wild and comes with amazing views. I highly recommend it. Will definitely be back. The host was super helpful and very friendly. She made my stay as comfortable as possible.
reviews.response: Thanks so much Mark, we are so happy you enjoyed your stay in the Dhow.  Looking forward to welcoming you back again.

reviews.comments: Lovely and quiet stay. Incredible views and very comfy bed
reviews.response: So happy your enjoyed your stay in The Dhow and look forward to hosting you again in one of our other cottages (with equally comfy beds!).

reviews.comments: The Dhow is a lovely, quiet, and serene spot. We enjoyed our stay. Right from the start, Deborah was welcoming and patient with us. She constantly sent us reminders and precise location guides. We were left to our tools and savored the serene environment and views. The house was as advertised and we enjoyed cooking by ourselves. What I can't wait to try out next time is the barbeque grill. I recommend this stay for anyone looking to leave the city for a quiet and serene getaway.
reviews.response: Thanks so much Martin, it was such a pleasure hosting you and look forward to welcoming you back again in the very near future.

reviews.comments: An amazing place to spend a good time yourself or with your loved one! We had a very pleasant stay, surrounded by amazing views, right at your bed! The directions by Debs were clear and detailed and though we arrived at night, we were able to navigate easily. If you are looking to stay at The Dhow, don't hesitate. It is all worth it!
reviews.response: Thanks so much Erick, it was a pleasure hosting you.  Looking forward to host you again in the near future in one of our other spectacular cottages.

reviews.comments: My wife and I loved our stay at The Dhow. From a very warm welcome from Debs, to an absolutely breathtaking view, rustic yet modern feel, and very quiet and relaxing atmosphere. We made good use of the gas bbq grill which made meals really easy to get done. Great experience all round!
reviews.response: Thanks so much Wambu for your review.  We really enjoyed hosting you and look forward to welcoming you back again.

reviews.comments: The place looks better in person, no pictures or videos could do the dhow & it’s environs justice. Deborah is a good host & was quick in communication & safety assurance. Loved that it’s a no contact place. Absolutely enjoyed my stay
reviews.response: Thanks so much Nzalambi, it was such a pleasure to host you and so happy you felt safe and secure in the Dhow.  It is a fabulous little piece of paradise.  Looking forward to hosting you again in the near future.

reviews.comments: Absolutely lovely getaway from Nairobi! The Dhow is one of my favorite airbnbs in Kenya and Deb + her adorable pups are wonderful hosts. We will be back
reviews.response: Thanks so much Nathan, so happy the pups got a mention!  They certainly add to the character of the place!  We really enjoyed hosting you and looking forward to next time.

reviews.comments: We had an amazing stay! The property is just as advertised if not better and the view is incredible. Deborah was also a great host in being very responsive and friendly.
Amazing place, would definitely go back.
reviews.response: Thanks so much Wasim, it was a pleasure to host you.  Looking forward to hosting you again.

reviews.comments: My partner and I came here for our one year anniversary after trying to plan to come to champagne ridge for the longest time and it was the best decision ever coming to the dhow house. comms was excellent the space was the exact amount of space and light we needed. also not to mention the fantastic bbq on the deck! debs was fantastic and we can't wait to see her and the German shepherds again!
reviews.response: Thanks so much Jessica!  We really enjoyed hosting you and love that you love the Dhow as much as we do.  Looking forward to hosting you again in the near future.

reviews.comments: The unique design of the Dhow, the really  amazing view, the tranquility, the privacy . . . makes this place a must visit for any adventurous couple
reviews.response: Thank so much Joe!  Tim is so happy you appreciate the unique design of the Dhow, makes his hard work in making it authentic worth it!  Looking forward to hosting you again in the near future.

reviews.comments: absolutely lovely and unique stay on the champagne ridge. beautiful view, modern place with everything you need to have a pleasant stay. highly recommend.
reviews.response: Thanks so much Jessica!   Looking forward to hosting you again in the near future.

reviews.comments: Beautiful place with stunning views and a wonderful host. Would definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a quick getaway not far from Nairobi. Great for solo travel.
reviews.response: Thanks so much Brenda.  We are so happy you felt safe as a solo traveler.  Looking forward to hosting you again in the near future.

reviews.comments: Great stay and serene environment as well. Highly recommend as a getaway.
reviews.response: Thanks so much Tony,  looking forward to hosting you again in the near future.

reviews.comments: We totally enjoyed this space. Away from the city, in tune with nature. Peaceful. The grill added to our experience. I fully recommend this place. I’ll be back. Deborah, thank you.
reviews.response: So happy you enjoyed your stay with us Evonne,  looking forward to hosting you again in the near future.

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our stay at the property. Everything about it was amazing, from the views to how friendly the host was. We checked in slightly early and she gracefully accommodated us. Would definitely 💯 go back.
reviews.response: It was such a pleasure hosting you, looking forward to welcoming you back.

photos.caption: The Dhow is a traditional Swahili boat 500kms away from the coast.  Perched on a cliff overlooking the Rift Valley with amazing views over the countryside in Kajiado County.
The perfect spot for a sundowner, or a cup of coffee in the morning.  Enjoy amazing views of the Rift Valley and surrounding countryside.  Watch the view change as the day progresses.
The Dhow has a home on the edge of the rift valley with this amazing view.  Purely majestic and wild countryside only 1 hour from Karen and 1 1/2 hours from Nairobi city.
Enjoy a lazy morning coffee while looking out at the amazing view across the countryside.

The Dhow is only a short distance to an Airbnb Experience - The Masai Experience - a great way to spend a half or full day with the local community learning to bead, see first hand how the community live and cook local dishes (book in advance).
Dining inside The Dhow, the compact kitchen boasts a fridge, 4 burner gas cooker, instant gas hot water and 24/7 off-the-grid solar power.
Plenty of room to enjoy the deck and lay your yoga mat for an early morning workout.  The gas BBQ takes the stress off self catering - Brai, BBQ or grill!
Take some time to forget the pressures of Nairobi.
No need to argue with your loved one about where to chill - choose from the sofa, hammock, armchair or deck chairs! No matter where you sit, the views are amazing!
The Dhow is a unique, one-of-a-kind entirely off-the-grid boat cabin at The Castle on Champagne Ridge.  Set sail without getting your feet wet!
Take the helm and sail over the valley or simply chill in the hammock.
Open the bedroom doors and let the early morning light pour in.
Waking up from an afternoon nap ..... just in time to watch the sunset over the mountains across the valley.
Choose a book, magazine or challenge your loved to a game of cards or Jenga!
Sleep amazingly in the separate bedroom in a king size bed.
The design of the entrance to the boat is just as intricate and detailed as the Dhow itself.  Welcome through the traditional carved Swahili doors to the boardwalk and on to the Dhow.

Champagne Ridge from the air, open countryside, amazing views and not an electrical line in sight!  Purely off-the-grid, self sufficient area.  The Dhow is located over the edge of the cliff in front of the Main House.
The man behind the Dhow design and project with his trusty apprentice.  Thiemo and Sally, the duo who breathed life into the Dhow boat design.
Enjoy a hot shower and revitalise yourself in the "engine room"  The hot water is instant gas, another feature to off-the-grid living.

primaryHost.about:
Originally from Adelaide, Australia I have lived on the African continent since 2003 working in tourism as well as running our own community solar power project Napenda Solar Community.  I have spent the better part of my working life outside of Australia and living all over the World.

The Castle on Champagne Ridge near Kiserian is our refuge, a place to relax and recharge the batteries. I love to cook so spend my free time in the kitchen working on some new recipe or simply experimenting with various ingredients and textures.

Thiemo, my husband, is the brains behind the design of all our 5 cottages (Nest, Dhow, Cave, Tower and Castle). He is a solar power guru and my own personal Mr Fix It! 

We have 5 German Shepherd dogs; Sally, Stella, Beau, Zanny and Pikey who are thoroughly spoiled, although they may not agree!  They love their daily walks, swimming in the dam and playing soccer (football).  Sally and Stella are adopted, while Beau and Zanny are rescue dogs; and Pikey arrived on our front lawn in Dec 2019 begging for food and never left! 

The Castle is open to all regardless of religion, culture, sexual orientation or nationality.  After all, variety is the spice of life.

reviews.comments: What an idyllic little den nestled in the woods. Absolutely perfect little spot. Loved every minute.
Lovely roundhouse with a great location, close to Porthmadog etc. Very quiet and the cows greeting you is always a good laugh.

Just got back from a lovely few days at the roundhouse and i would recommend to anyone wanting to get away from everything and relax. The location and views are stunning and it really is secluded and so very quiet! I would recommend taking a torch, your wellies, warm clothes and some hot chocolate to cosy in front of the fire. The only thing that I would say is the doors don't lock so we couldn't 100% relax at night -  completely appreciate is so secluded and a place where you naturally don't need to but it's hard to relax when you're used to having to lock doors but can't. Absolutely loved getting back to nature, thank you and see you next year! 😊
Very peaceful retreat. Rustic. Beautiful surroundings.

We had a fantastic time staying in the Hobbit house. Our family of 5 fit comfortably.  The kids enjoyed playing in the forest, collecting wood, and sitting by the campfire. This was one of the most memorable Airbnb stays we’ve had during our travels. You’ll be immersed in nature and will have a true countryside experience. Do be aware that you will have to walk a few hundred yards from the parking lot to get to the home.  On the day we arrived it was muddy, I wore sneakers and carried a large suitcase on my shoulder.  I stepped on a slippery bit of grass, absolutely ate it, fell in the mud, and yeeted my suitcase as I fell.  So wear boots if it’s wet! The people on the farm are also very nice.  There is a little shop where you can pick up farm fresh veg and they have pasta, cheese, and basic essentials for dinner. I wish I would have stayed here longer!!

We have just got home from the absolute best couple of days away :) The place was truly magical and we couldn't have asked for better. Thank you so much :) we hope to come again some time in the future, maybe in the spring, or at least not in the middle of a storm 😂 but even the storm added to some of the cozy magic
What a place ! Absolutely back to nature . Drop out of the rat race and head to the hobbit hut ! Great location and super cosy and clean !
We had a lovely stay

Great place to camp out for a few nights very peacful and private and we had a cute cat stay with us out of the blue called her beanz she stayed with us the whole time witxh was 2 nights. Had a great time. Thank you matt.

Beautiful setting and so very cosy, loved the French doors letting us watch the wildlife outside. Felt nicely secluded and away from it all.
Be aware the toilet is about 60 metres from the house and you need a torch after dark to negotiate the slippery tree roots. If lighting wood burner you’ll need to use the axe to make your own kindling, larger logs on sale from car park. Idyllic, secluded setting and a wonderful experience x
A fantastic place to spend a rainy few days-burner on and total relaxation. The outdoor shower was fabulous and this place has it all if your looking for a gorgeous quirky escape to the woods.

We stayed in the hobbit/fairy round house for our ‘mini’ moon. Set in the wilderness surrounded by nature. The log burner really heated the place up, one night it was too warm we had to have the door open! And we were joined by a friendly cat.
The only fault we had was the outside shower, we were unable to regulate the temperature so be careful as it was scolding hot or freezing cold.
Some tips we would like to share:
Take your wellies it can be muddy
Crocs or flip flops for shower
Take some kindling and firelighters
Great 4G we connected to a lap top and cuddled up to a film that we streamed in the evening. We also took a board game to play - lord of the rings themed escape room!
Don’t forget usb plug to charge your phone, better still an extension lead with usb sockets
We took a cool box ( mains plug ) to keep beer and wine in as the fridge is too small for cans/ bottles.
We also took a multi/slow cooker as only 2 gas burners so we were able to cook baked potatoes and a stew.
Be prepared to walk a distance from the car, the wheel barrow came in handy to transport bags of logs and shopping bags
No lock on patio door so take valuables with you if going out for the day.
Take a torch it’s dark walking to the toilet and also pitch black if your walking from car park late at night.
Visit the farm shop and buy local produced veg and meat
Be aware the toilet is a compost and may not be to everyone taste and may be a bit smelly if the weather is warm.
And most important enjoy the peace and quiet.

We really enjoyed our stay - a perfect location for our mini 5 day break with our kids (4,7 and 15) and our little dog. A real fairytale cottage in the woods. We explored and spent a lot of quality time with our children. A great stay!

Worth noting that the compost toilet is clean and tidy but a little walk through the woods to get to. A little tricky at night time.

No curtains in the cottage but we didn't feel that privacy was affected at all. You really do feel out on your own in the woods - perfect for us! We didn't see anybody else whilst there. Nice and warm when we visited end of October and the log burner was great.

The only complaint we had was our main bed didn't feel fresh and clean and had a lot of loose dirt and stains on the mattress which we found on stripping the sheets at the end of our stay. Have mentioned this to the owner so that they can address this with their cleaner. A fresh bed with clean sheets can really make a 5 star review.

Amazing Experience, we love the whole experience it was our third time here. Kids running around outside having fun, marshmellows on the fire & special family time with no electronics. Thank you for having us back
Absolutely the most cosy place I have stayed in . My little girl thought it was magical . Loved being back to nature ❤️🍄Cant wait to come back the whole place is amazing 🤩 ❤️🍄🧚‍♀️

The highlight of our holiday. Round house is such an adventure- our kids loved exploring the woods and meeting the house puppy at the farm. We bought the locally grown produce and I even showered outside in the pouring rain (water was hot!). Pack light as the walk is easy but in the rain was not that easy. Even with three days of rain we enjoyed the wood fire, playing cards and just relaxing in nature

4 girls away for a chilled weekend for our friends 30th. We had a fantastic stay. Hidden away from the world for the weekend. We stayed the first weekend on October, we used the fire instead and not one of us felt cold. We had drinks and marshmallows around the fire pit. Really was a great weekend away.
An oasis in nature- back to the wild but with comfort and cosines of the round house x

Beautiful little "escape from reality!"
We loved our own secluded stay in this beautiful setting. Who needs hotels!?
The round house was cosy and clean. The toilet and shower was also lovely.
Our boys loved roaming around the woods and having a fire outside. At night sat by the fire playing cards and games. NO PHONES!
Hoping to comeback another day.
Memories created. Tick! Thank you 😊

We had a magical few days here… the round house is gorgeous, so cosy with the fire lit, and easily warm enough through the night. And well kitted out with all you need in the kitchen. We loved exploring in the woods, lying in the hammocks in the willow grove, being quiet and cosy in front of the fire… lovely veg & meat from the farm shop available, and coast not far by car for some seaside walks. It’s exactly what it says it is, and it’s glorious… we would love to come back for more slow woodland respite :)

photos.caption: Our Wildflower meadows and sea views

primaryHost.about: Tea Maker and Optimist

name: Aure, Micro-house on the banks of Tessungåe

reviews.comments: Beautiful and remote camp with everything you need!
Beautiful and quiet place. We wish we could have stayed longer. Lots of fun to hanging out in the camp, relaxing in the sauna.
Had an amazing time being in nature, enjoying the sauna, and listening to the river.
Wonderfull place, cosy cabin, Nice host! A super place tot relax and enjoy the beautiful scenery!

One of the most amazing experiences we’ve experienced- super recommended!!! Everything was lovely and very comfortable 🤍
Meeting Isaac (the son) and Philip (the father) that built everything was super interesting!

Isaac's camp was really amazing. A true experience into the woods. The tree house is really cozy and carefully built with presicion to detail. The sauna session right next to the river was unforgettable.
I would definitely recommend
Great place to enjoy life!

Isaac has a great place, and is constantly adding new things and making it better for his guests. We stayed in the little cabin, and our only regret was not staying longer. In the 1 night we were there it was so relaxing, comfortable and just overall a great experience. Definitely recommend staying atleast a couple of night to get the full experience.
We had a wonderful 2 night stay at Isaac’s unique place. Amazing to wake up next to the river and take a bath! Excited to come back to see the other special houses you are building!

This is really an awesome and unique location.
Really get the feeling of sleeping in the woods.

We really loved our stay at the cabin! Really great use of space and smart storage. And right in the heart of nature! Having a ‘bushbath’ with a view over the river is an awesome experience and a must-do if you stay here.

Great value for an idyllic location in a secluded area of the country. Enjoy some peace and quiet in your own Instagram worthy treehouse, then borrow a skateboard from camp and cruise up to the perfect swimming spot in the river. Be wary of likely not having cell-service during your stay (1 of us had none, the other a little bit). The only negative for us was that the river bath was not available to use due to some fire hazard issues. Not a dealbreaker but don’t expect it if that’s what you are looking forward to. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to anyone. It is very much like staying in an elevated tent so if you are comfortable with that, you will have a great time.
Wooden designed Insane place, recommended to everyone who loves nature,  I’ll be back soon

Isaac is a very friendly and warm person and this place is just amazing. If you love, living simple and close to nature, this is the perfect stay for you. The tree houses lie direct by the river and you can hear the sound of the water all the time. The equipment is simple, but you have everything you need (gas to cook little meals/coffee, water to wash). Highly recommended. Best stay of our honeymoon !

Thank you for our stay! The treehouse and how you designed it was beautiful and had everything we needed,and we felt very welcomed on arrival! I will definitely be recommending to others and would stay here again!
The place was lovely. Thank you for the amazing experience.
Great location, unique BnBs, very friendly, responsive & flexible host.
This was amazing. Such a wonderful experience and I loved every second of it!

What a cosy place directly by the river!
If you love camping but want to add a little luxury to it, this place is perfect. With lots of things to discover (such as the garden, the camp or the river) and special features (outdoor bathtub, woodoven inside the cabin) we really enjoyed our stay and you can see that the place was built with a lot of love!
It is truly a place in tune with nature.
Lovely and relaxing place😊

primaryHost.about:
Hi! 

My name is Isaac and with loads of help from family and friends, I have been building a place to experience the Norwegian nature in an authentic, simple and inexpensive way. The goal is to make a great place to camp, hang out and do different activities along the untouched river Tessungåe.

I have developed a collection of small living spaces in tents, cabins and treehouses. The outdoor facilities are shared, and we have recently finished some great additions like heated bathtubs by the river and an outdoor kitchen. Next up: a sauna! It’s the perfect place to take a break from everyday life and meet new people from all over the world. There are a range of possibilities to explore nature, do exciting sports like kayaking and kiting, as well as discover great fishing and skiing spots.

Looking forward to meeting you!

reviews.comments:
Hotel Kan was the perfect place to spend our time in Tulum. It's easy to access both Tulum central and the Hotel Zone but private enough to provide a calming and peaceful experience. The staff was extremely helpful and kind and the entire experience was more than I could have hoped for.

I highly recommend!

Kan was everything we dreamed of and more! I couldn’t think of a more peaceful way to end our honeymoon! From the views, to the waterfall that was viewable from our room, to the aroma. Everything was dreamy as can be. The staff was SO friendly and helpful. We were even able to rent a scooter from Kan in order to ride around Tulum! We were excited to visit Tulum again, but after visiting Kan, we have even more urgency to get back as soon as possible!
kAN place is beautiful.  I really like the jungle theme . Very helpful staff. Whole place nicely designed. Very peaceful….we enjoyed our stay there

Best AirBnb experience I’ve have thus far! The place was even more beautiful in person. The staff was very friendly, communicative and gave really great suggestions as to what to do/where to go. I’d suggest renting a car, it makes life a lot easier and I believe it’d be cheaper than ordering cabs to get around. 10/10 would recommend.

Absolutely perfect. The staff. The food. The ambiance. The suites. I could go on forever. Jessica and Erika at the front desk are so friendly and accommodating. Total sweethearts.

And Christopher’s breakfast is unrivaled with any place I’ve been in the world PLUS it’s healthy and vegan. The pancakes and omelets…I already miss them lol

I’m already looking at dates to return.

Just go there. You’ll thank yourself

🙏🏼❤️

The resort was beautiful and expertly crafted. It was the slow season when we visited and it was very quiet which made it even more tranquil. The location is decent between Tulum Centro and the  each.

Eden in Tulum…
There’s no hotel that I’ve visited that masters the art of hospitality and serenity more than Kan.
Every square inch is designed to make you feel connected to nature, literally top to bottom. The staff is is so gracious, the drinks and complimentary breakfast are absolutely delicious! We will definitely visit again. Highly recommended.

Serene and magical. Hotel Kan is the perfect quiet oasis to get away from the hustle and bustle of the beach or downtown. We almost had the place to ourselves. The cenote is gorgeous and the breakfasts were so delicious. The staff was so friendly and made us feel at home. Great communication leading up to and throughout stay. Pro tip: it’s very eco friendly so if AC is important to you leave the blinds down and eco mode on throughout the day so when you get back from a long day out you can be cool. It’s about 15 min from a lot of the beach main destinations so we found renting a car to be ideal. Felt very safe here as two females traveling.

Simply an amazing place, the staff note in general i will give them 15/10 they are always answering answers 24/7 via whats app, they try to do their best for you to have nothing to think except enjoying and relaxing youre way into their natural private cenote on site wich is a big plus to the place.

I also experienced a 2h massage and it was really really good !
Great place to stay.  Very relaxing and city is not far away for activities.  Very clean and well taken care of location.

KAN is a magical place filled with beautiful people and views. The staff and the environment provide the most special experience one could imagine. Do yourself a favor and stay here for a few nights (or more!) and you won’t regret it.

Beautiful place to stay. Highly recommend. Only downside was the construction going on that was quite noisy during the day. Was not a big issue for us but definitely could interrupt the peace for some

We came here for our honeymoon and loved the place! It was gorgeous!. Everyone was very nice and friendly. Incredibly relaxing and secluded experience. The food was amazing and we were also able to order from restaurants nearby. We rented a scooter from KAN to go into town. Will definitely be back!
Expect an amazing experience.
Truly a one of a kind place. Great experience
You feel like you in another world. The lush plants and jungle atmosphere on the property is mesmerizing.
Great hotel. Love the grounds. And service was excellent and very attentive. The only draw back  is it away from beach.  And taxis vary in price.  Can get costly.  Will visit again.
Amazing staff, communication and an absolutely stunning place!
This place is amazing with great views.

I didn't know that this place was opened at the beginning of this year but I am definitely happy to say that my husband and I got to experienced it on their grand opening. Especially, with all these crazy things going on in the world. This place made it feel like there was nothing but peace. It definitely has a Bali vibes and I initially wanted to go there but because of COVID, they are not allowing tourist to come. However, Tulum made it possible and KAN made it even better. They have a beautiful cenote on site that in case you didn't want to go out to see one. There was one for you.

Everyone was so nice there! The way we communicated was through whatsapp. We made all transportation arrangements through there and it was well communicated. I would come back here again when visiting tulum. I kid you not. It was a peaceful experience!

photos.caption: Surround yourself with beauty, let every moment of your life be the beginning of a new adventure, an opportunity to create memories.
The perfect bed exists in the middle of the jungle with the best views.
Join the ethical movement. At Kan, everything’s made with sustainable materials and designed with love
Join the ethical movement. At Kan, everything’s made with sustainable materials and designed with love
KAN merge the practical with the beautiful, the well-designed with the green and lush. A more rigorous definition of the word “green”, without the loss of any luxury
swim in the healing waters of the cenote
Kan Tulum is the wonderful result of inspiration and the fusion between magnificent nature and luxury lifestyle.
A place to coexist with nature
A place to coexist with nature
You can learn about the mayan trees

primaryHost.about:
Organic design inspired by nature, carefully manifested amongst a complex and mystical ecosystem called, "La Jungla Maya".

At KAN, sustainability is at the forefront of our mind, we know sustainability has a place in everyone’s heart.

We understand sustainability has a different meaning to most people. For us it is a group of actions that become a lifestyle when trying to cover all bases, from the soil to the water and the surrounding operations right up to renewable energy sources and the quality of living of everyone involved.

reviews.comments:
House & the pool were really clean. The house is exactly what's in the pictures. No surprises. Me and my wife stayed for 2 nights, we really liked the place. The view was amazing, very quiet place for the people who wants a silent & relaxing time.

Spending time around the pool is so fun, pool is quite large, bigger than we thought.

Also, the house has everything you might need, an oven, microwave, toaster, pans, blender etc. We found everything we needed.

Hope we come and stay again Femke :)

TDLR: 2 power outages left us wondering when the next would come. Moldy smell. Wifi was not working. If you can overcome these issues, I am sure you will have a blast, because even with our issues it was a worthwhile stay.

Soon after we arrived there was a power outage in the neighborhood. In the intense 30 degree Turkish night heat, we were forced to sleep outside. The host was very accommodating and brought a mosquito net and some lights to help in the dark, but even then the heat and the insanely loud crickets chirping all day and all night made for an unpleasant experience. The power finally came on at 1 in the morning at which point we could go sleep in the AC cooled bedroom. We wake up and the internet is now down, which is a quite important for us as we received no information about where to go shop or eat or anything in the surroundings. The internet didn't work for the remainder of the trip. Around lunch time, another power outage occurs and lasts for 2 hours, meaning we couldn't make our lunch from food we had bought the day before. The remainder of the trip we were worried that another power outage would occur.

The area takes 15 minutes to drive to, from the main road, through the most intense offroading I have ever experienced in a car - no asphalt, only gravel roads. So be prepared with water, food, and everything you need for your trip, ideally you shouldn't leave the premises unless necessary.

The house is beautiful, with an amazing terrace and pool, and looks very slick and modern. There was however a mold smell. Quite a good experience, unfortunately overshadowed by the looming possibility of another power outage.
reviews.response: Hello Lauritsm the reason of the power cut was because a electric transformer in the next village was broken and had to be replaced. This is not in our hands. And after the power cut  the WiFi adaptor had to be restarted and it was working maybe you didn't get our message I'am sad for this.

reviews.comments: Femke was the most amazing and accommodating host! I can’t thank her enough! The Calypso Villa is a joy to stay in! Excellent kitchen, living area, bedroom, pool, fantastic views, a very unique and special place to stay! We will be staying again for sure!

Wir haben unsere Flitterwochen auf dem Boot verbracht. Femke hat uns ausreichend Details gegeben an welchen Flughafen wir landen sollten und dass wir ein Auto benötigen. Sie hat uns auf der Hauptstraße abgeholt und zur Location gebracht. Die Location ist traumhaft. Auch gab sie sich sehr viel Mühe das Schlafzimmer mit Whirlpool für unsere Flitterwochen zu dekorieren mit Rosen und Kerzen. Ebenso hat sie uns ein leckeres Abendessen mit Nachttisch vorbereitet. Die Location war sauber und genau wie auf dem Bild zu sehen. Femke war regelmäßig erreichbar bei Fragen.
Einziger Nachteil war dass der Strom ab und zu mal für paar Minuten ausging wenn man viele elektrische Geräte gleichzeitig an hatte.

localizedReview.comments:
We spent our honeymoon on the boat. Femke has given us sufficient details about which airport we should land at and that we need a car. She picked us up on the main road and took us to the location. The location is fantastic. She also went out of her way to decorate the bedroom with hot tub for our honeymoon with roses and candles. She also prepared us a delicious dinner with a nightstand. The location was clean and exactly as shown in the picture. Femke was regularly available for questions.
The only downside was that the power went out every now and then for a few minutes if you had many electrical appliances on at the same time.

reviews.comments:
Einfach nur klasse! Alles sieht aus, wie auf den Bildern. Der Whirlpool ist super und auch der Pool ist sehr groß. Die Aussicht ist sehr schön und man kann zu einer kleinen Bucht zu Fuß laufen.
Femke ist eine nette und fürsorgliche Gastgeberin.
Nur der Anfahrtsweg ist etwas abenteuerlich :)

localizedReview.comments:
Simply amazing! Everything looks like the pictures. The hot tub is great and the pool is also very large. The view is very nice and you can walk to a small bay.
Femke is a nice and caring host.
Only the access route is a bit adventurous :)

photos.caption: King size bed for mermaid and captain...
Open plan kitchen and living room
Beach nearby crystal clear water good for snorkeling

primaryHost.about: Hallo we are a family business who rent out holiday villa's nearby Patara, we live 20 years in Turkey,  I  want to share my love for Turkey and  experience to other people in the world to make them comfortable and have a wonderful holiday in our house build with love, in a.natural environment. We are there for you any time you need us.

name: Balsa Surf Camp: estadia unica a 30 metros del mar
address: Provincia Santa Elena Comuna Montanita, Santa Elena, Ecuador

reviews.comments: Balsa surf camp is a bohemian dream! Rasty (Cesar) and Julie have built a gem of a place in Montanita. The attention to detail is incredible and it is truly a one of a kind experience. We stayed in the VW bus and it was exactly as described. Because it is outdoors and we were there during the “overcast” season it was very humid and damp. One of the other units would be better for longer stays, but it was perfect for us the week we were there. The hosts are friendly and have thought of everything you might need. We appreciated the free filtered water and laundry service. There is security on grounds at night (not that we ever felt we needed it) and someone is always available should you need something. Complimentary breakfast each morning in the restaurant was delightful and the location is perfect for exploring the beach and nearby restaurants and bars. We loved Montanita so much that my boyfriend and I decided to rent an apartment and stay for a few months. I highly recommend our stay at Balsa and the fun surf town of Montanita.
reviews.response:
Thank you so much Crustal for this amazing review! It was a pleasure to meet you both! We are so happy that you loved your stayed in our beautiful VW room! It was a crazy idea from my husband Rasty :) Is nice to know you loved Montañita too and that you will be here for longer! We will see you around! Take care a lot!
Julie and all the Balsa team

reviews.comments: We loved this space! It was a vw bus with a patio just as described. It was very neat to stay in. We had originally planned a long term stay in the bus but after one night ended up switching rooms just for a little more comfort. I would recommend this room if you are staying one or two nights but any longer than that I would recommend one of balsa surf camps other rooms. Balsa surf camp is an amazing place, the location is perfect. It’s walking distance (recommend taking the beach) to the main strip of montanita, and there are other bars/restaurants along the way. It is located right of front of the best surf spot in montanita. I highly recommend this place and will definitely stay here again!
reviews.response:
Thank you so much Thomas! It's so great to read yours kinds words! This help us a lot, directly to our heart jajaj
Thank you both for yours good vibes and nice energy! It was a pleasure to meet you and please come back soon!
Take care both
Julie and all the Balsa team

reviews.comments: Extremely cute accommodations. Perfect location away from bustle of town.

Wow! This was such an incredible stay. Everything is perfect, it’s all VW themed with cute signs and stickers. And the mosaic is so beautiful. The property it’s on is also so beautiful, with hammocks and lights and so many plants! It’s an oasis. Also I didn’t realize this by the photos, the van is up in a treehouse 🤩 seriously one of the coolest unique places I’ve ever stayed. I would definitely stay here again!! And they have yummy food at the restaurant:)
This place was so cool and lovely,  I had to book more nights!

This is how it should be. Sleeping in a Bully in Montañita.. Says IT all.. Great stay. Very clean! Breathtaking ambiance. Loved the Flair in the Hostel. Staff helps out with everything you need. Restaurant is pricy but quite good :)
reviews.response:
Thank you Tommy :) Welcome back when you want!
We will be delighted to have You here .
Regards.
Jhonny B.S.C. Team.

reviews.comments: Great view with a fun theme.
reviews.response: Thank you Ross :) Welcome back when you want! cheers, Julie

reviews.comments: Love ❤️ Love the location and all the hosts from reception to restaurant were caring and welcoming. Very attentive to the clients needs. I am looking forward to coming back. Room beautiful decor..environment calming and quiet. Would totally recommend anyone coming to visit montañita. 🙏❤️🥰 Grateful

La estancia aquí es de 100 estrellas!! El hostal es súper acogedor, todos sus trabajadores también, y el desayuno fue realmente delicioso. Hospedarse en esta van fue una experiencia única, con muchos detalles en diseño y de gran comodidad.
Los chicos que trabajan allí nos ayudaron con todo lo que necesitamos. Es un sitio para conectar con la naturaleza, muy privado, lleno de paz y a pocos metros del mar. Se ha convertido en mi estancia ideal para ir a Montañita. Muchas gracias!!

localizedReview.comments:
The stay here is 100 stars!! The hostel is super cozy, all its workers too, and breakfast was really delicious. Staying at this van was a unique experience, with many details in design and great comfort.
The guys who work there helped us with everything we needed. It is a place to connect with nature, very private, full of peace and a few meters from the sea. It has become my ideal stay to go to Montañita. Thank you so much!!

reviews.comments: Hermoso lugar.  Amé el sonido de la naturaleza.  Un lugar muy relajante, bastante alejado de la bulla del centro de Montañita, pero caminando se llega rápido ya sea por la playa o por la calle.  El desayuno que pagamos por un valor adicional delicioso y abundante.   Limpieza muy buena.   La experiencia de dormir en la VAN fue muy interesante  y el balcón bastante amplio y con una hamaca que hacía el complemento perfecto.   La atención excelente.  Nos quedamos tubo abajo en una de las llantas del carro y enseguida nos consiguieron ayuda.   El Restaurante donde sirven el desayuno es en una planta alta donde se aprecia todo, no cenamos ahí pero al carta se veía interesante, si el desayuno fue muy rico seguramente lo demás lo será.   Cenamos en un restaurante al frente como otra opción Shanka 👌🏻.   Sin pensarlo volveríamos.  Gracias por todo.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Mercedes! Fue un placer recibirlos! Mil gracias por sus bellas palabras, eso nos ayuda mucho a crecer y a seguir trabajando con amor! Nos vemos pronto esperamos! Cuídense mucho!
Julie & toda la familia Balsa & Jaja

localizedReview.comments: Beautiful place.  Loved the sound of nature.  A very relaxing place, quite far from the buzz of downtown Montañita, but walking you can reach it quickly either by the beach or on the street.  The breakfast we pay for a delicious and abundant additional value. Very good cleanliness.   The experience of sleeping in the VAN was very interesting  and the balcony was quite spacious and with a hammock that made the perfect complement.   Excellent service.  We stayed downstairs in one of the tires of the car and they immediately got us help.   The restaurant where they serve breakfast is on a high floor where you can appreciate everything, we did not have dinner there but the menu looked interesting, if breakfast was very delicious, surely the rest will be.   We dined at a restaurant out front as another Shanka option👌🏻.   Without thinking we would come back.  Thank you for everything.
localizedReview.response:
Thank you very much Mercedes! It was a pleasure to welcome you! Thank you very much for your beautiful words, that helps us grow and continue working with love! See you soon. We look forward to seeing you! Take care of yourselves!
Julie & the whole Balsa & Haha family

reviews.comments: Hermoso lugar, muy cómodo. Muy cerca de la playa y con toda la comodidad. Muy tranquilo y limpio. Nos llevaron el desayuno a la habitación, delicioso. La experiencia fue increíble, nos sacó de la rutina. Esperamos volver pronto!
reviews.response:
Gracias Adriana! Que bellas palabras! Siempre me llena el corazón de alegría ver a nuestros huéspedes felices y contentos! Gracias por ayudarnos a crecer y seguir trabajando!!! Ojalá nos vemos pronto! Regresen :)
Saludos
Juli & todo el equipo Balsa

localizedReview.comments: Beautiful place, very comfortable. Very close to the beach and with all the comfort. Very quiet and clean. They brought breakfast to the room, delicious. The experience was amazing, it took us out of the routine. We hope to be back soon!
localizedReview.response:
Thank you Adriana! What a beautiful words! I'm always happy to see our guests happy and happy! Thank you for helping us grow and keep working!!! I hope to see you soon! Come back :)
Regards
Juli & the whole Balsa team

reviews.comments:
Un accueil très agréa de la part de tout monde. Toujours présent et à votre écoute avec le sourire.
La plage est juste à 2 pas, cours de yoga. Endroit calme. Très jolie déco originale
Nourriture excellente et copieuse.
reviews.response:
Ce fut tout notre plaisir! Merci pour tes mots qui nous arrivent droit au coeur!
Et effectivement J'espere que l'on se verra de nouveau prochainement et bon courage pour le retour en France!
Saludos!
Julie et l'équipe du Balsa et de Jaja

localizedReview.comments:
A very pleasant welcome from everyone. Always present and attentive with a smile.
The beach is just a stone's throw away, yoga class. Quiet place. Very nice original decor
Excellent and hearty food.
localizedReview.response:
It was our pleasure! Thank you for your words that come to our heart!
And indeed I hope to see you again soon and good luck for the return to France!
Saludos!
Julie and the Balsa and Jaja team

primaryHost.about: Hola mucho gusto! Somos Rasty & Julie, creadores del Balsa Surf Camp, nuestra pequena aldea y comunidad donde vivimos la buena vida y de la tranquilidad! Aqui uno se conecta con la naturaleza, con uno mismo, cuerpo y espíritu a traves de la playa, del oceano, del surf, del yoga, de la comida sana y conciente, y de personas amigables! A disfrutar de la vida!

reviews.comments: A very cool, vibey place to stay that’s a quick scooter ride to the beach but just far enough to provide more peace & quiet from the busy streets of Canggu. Wonderful & friendly staff cleaned the rooms + pool every day & answered any questions quickly via WA. Nice shared pool & kitchen to mingle with other guests. I stayed during a rainy week, so the insects/frogs/geckos were a little loud sometimes - but I didn’t mind, it was all part of the “jungle” experience! Would recommend if you’re looking for a more unique but traditional Indonesian feel v.s. the modern/luxury villas & hotels in the area.
Great place to stay - there was no mosquito for us and we enjoyed hospitality and environment very much! Thanks a lot for having us again
Wonderful place and wonderful people. Cant wait to go back
The place is good with inspiring architecture and a great pool.
Everything was as expected; tranquil, rustic, and peaceful to stay here. It’s one of my favorite back to nature themed place to stay in Canggu.

Staying at jungle room was so amazing! I have to especially mention the wonderful staff which took amazingly good care of us. They were so friendly at all times and helped us with everything we needed. The yoga was very nice and the FREE breakfast was delicious. The place is so clean and zen it’s a dream staying here.
Thank you !!!
Very nice stay and perfect location. The room was big and super clean. Nice pool area and the breakfast was perfect.
Amazing. Amazing. Amazing. Indescribable - must visit this place and to see for yourself. You will not be disappointed. Everything is spot on. Outstanding vegan food also.

We stayed in the mini-Karo house which was very unique and beautiful! As it is quite old and historic it does allow a few bugs to get in- which didn’t bother us as there was a great mosquito net around the bed. The pool and yoga studio were beautiful. We loved the yoga class with Daniella! Breakfast was healthy and delicious each morning with many other awesome Yummy food options to choose from through the day. We would definitely recommend this place to friends visiting Bali I’m the future!

This place was amazing. We ended up booking another night because of how rad it is. From the food (they have an on-site kitchen with delicious meals AND breakfast is included every morning!), to the juice cleanse we bought, to the cool hut-like room we stayed in, The Jungle Room is so tranquil and beautiful. I would definitely stay here again! One thing to note are the bugs and creatures, but I'm from an immigrant family so we're used to living in the wild. :)
pretty good.quiet place to stay.

This place is awesome, exactly like the photos and review. Quiet, it is a good place to just relax and enjoy the scenery. The public pool available feels like the private one, because there's not many guest who use it, and luckily we got to enjoy it for ourselves. Breakfast was beautiful too, even though I'm not a fan of healthy breakfast myself, but it tasted good. Overall, this place is recommended.

Unique accommodation in a relaxed location outside the hustle and bustle of Canggu. I loved the 'jungle' setting and falling asleep to the sounds of nature (although, if you're not a fan of wildlife, this accommodation wouldn't be for you!). Brekkie options were fresh and tasty. The host can arrange airport pickup for a small fee too :) (Note: the steps to the Sumatran Karo House are very steep so it probably wouldn't be suitable for anyone with mobility issues.)

Unique accommodation, situated 10 minute drive from the beach. Aircon and fan in the house alongside lovely traditional decor. Pool, juice bar and yoga available as well as a sizeable breakfast Included. Wish we could have stayed more than one night. Lots of other types of accommodation available in the jungle rooms complex, but didn't feel crowded
This place is incredible. Definitely worth it. A bit far from the beach and main drag of Canggu but that also made it a quieter, more peaceful stay. Definitely book it!

Good experience, very relax place, great breakfast, clean and good service overall.
Only the toilet outside of our tree villa was a bit inconvenient (specially when raining) but so far we enjoyed this very eco-friendly and nature connected experience.
Thank you Jungle room :)
second time to stay ！super good！
The JungleRoom is special, close to the nature. It was a great experience in Canggu. Easy to access the beach and all chic cafes with 15 mins taxi ride.
Amazing stay! Lovely place! Amazing food! And healthy! Great for yoga, definitely stay again! LOVED IT !
Very nice place with great service. The food was delicious and I enjoyed yoga classes a lot!

primaryHost.about:
Our Bali based jungle creation. Space and home for all-around creatives and life explorers. Welcome to be a guest in a tropical vibe. Stay, create, rest, enjoy and meet each other.

JungleRoom is a unique holiday concept for travellers with an active life attitude. Set in the lush green jungle of Canggu, the most happening place in Bali, the complex of antique traditional Sumatran wooden houses host everything one might need for a great vacation!

reviews.comments: It was an amazing stay! The house was just as shown and described on this site but even still exceeded our expectations. Very beautifully decorated and very clean. It was a cozy cottage with all the necessary additions. The jacuzzi was easy to operate and had a beautiful view. Overall it was a very pleasant experience, however the road to the location is not suitable for low cars, as it was very steep and bumpy.

Very nice view, very clean everything, very neat facility. The kitchen has everything you need. Sofa is very comfortable. Every day a person provided new wood in the oven of the hot tub. Also possibility to charge an electric car by a regular plug. The way to the apartment could be built better, very bumpy (come with SUV if possible).

Such an incredible place to stay,peaceful setting ,beautiful nature , willing and always helpful staff and breathtaking interior of the house  with hot tub you simply cannot resist .Definitely worth visiting and highly recommend .Thank you for an amazing stay.

Such a Magical place!
We loved our relaxing weekendtrip. Everything was so lovely decorated, clean and cosy. Hania was very easy to communicate with and very helpful. I can hardly recommend this place!
Just be a bit aware of the steep road down to the houses :)

These houses are perfect to stay for 1-2 weeks. Everything looks like the pictures show it, you get a cozy whirlpool (to heat up with wood) where you can relax & have a beautiful view over the hills of Poland. Every house has its own parking lot, its own staircase to a big terrace just for you. The house itself is almost entirely made out of wood, you have a little fireplace inside but you can also control the temperature on the floor digitally. There's also a TV with Netflix, Spofity, and more.

Hania was nice and available everytime , when we needed some help we wrote her a SMS and half an hour later (I guess) she sent some polite and helpful men to our door, that would give you more wood & more information.

The houses are placed like 20 meters apart but they're built in a specific way, the neighbours won't really see you.

All in all, it's a really recommendable place to relax -

& if you arrive in winter with your car, make sure you have snow-chains or a good engine with your car because the last 100 meters down to the houses have a steep descent which makes it very difficult to go back in the snow.

Beautiful location, heated floors, wood burning hot tub (we used it while it was -6c outside and was great). Downstairs couch is also a convertible bed so you don't need to use loft bed. Could see ski slope in distance right outside the window. Hosts were fantastic. Highly recommend.
Excellent! Really recommended!

Wspaniałe domki z przepięknymi widokami! Dookoła cisza i spokój, zachowana pełna prywatność. Balia wraz z oświetleniem na zewnątrz tylko dodają urok temu miejscu. Idealny na romantyczny wyjazd we dwoje. Gorąco polecam!

localizedReview.comments: Delightful cottages with spectacular views! Peace and quiet, with complete privacy. The outside lighting only adds to the charm of this space. Great for a romantic getaway, just the two of you. Highly recommend it!

reviews.comments:
Es war das schönste Haus in dem wir je waren.
Alles war sauber und der Service war Hammer.
Der Mann der da herumläuft und alles in Ordnung bringt ist ein Hammer Kerl.😊👍

localizedReview.comments:
It was the nicest house we've been to.
Everything was clean and the service was awesome.
The man running around and making things right is a blast.😊👍

reviews.comments: Klimatyczne domki, wszystko zgodnie z opisem. Lokalizacja na tyle super, że w każdą pogodę jest co robić. Polecam

localizedReview.comments: Vibrant cottages, all as described. Location is great enough that there is plenty to do in all weather. I would recommend

reviews.comments: Ubytování krásné, vše perfektně připravené, včetně uhlí do grilu. Bohužel příjezdová cesta je hodně příkrá a je zde hodně děr. V zimě bez 4x4 a řetězů nereálné. Spaní na matraci na zemi ve zvýšeném patře - pouze jedna velká přikrývka. K dispozici deka, když nemáte rádi společnou přikrývku :) Určitě stojí za návštěvu

localizedReview.comments: Beautiful space, perfectly prepared, including charcoal for the grill. Unfortunately, the driveway is very steep and there are lots of holes. Without 4x4s and chains, they're unrealistic in the winter. Sleep on a mattress on the ground floor, with only one large blanket. There is a blanket if you don't like to share a blanket :) It's definitely worth the visit

reviews.comments: Dokonalost! Naprosto úžasný pobyt. Vše bylo nádherné jako na fotkách. Všem moc doporučujeme pro klid a odpočinek ideální.

localizedReview.comments: Perfection! An absolutely amazing stay. Everything was as beautiful as the photos. We highly recommend all of them for peace and relaxation.

reviews.comments: Wspaniała lokalizacja, można odpocząć od zgiełku. Wszystko zgodnie z opisem. Zdecydowanie polecam.

localizedReview.comments: It's a great location and you can take a break from the hustle and bustle. It's as described. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.comments: Idealne miejsce na relaks! Piękne widoki czy to w ciągu dnia na góry, czy nocą na gwiazdy 💕 super domek, z bardzo dobrym wyposażeniem i przemili gospodarze, którzy cały czas doglądają aby nic nie zabrakło!😍

localizedReview.comments: Great place to chill out! Beautiful views, whether it's during the day, or the stars at night, a 💕 cool cottage with very nice amenities, and lovely hosts who make sure everything is there all the time!😍

reviews.comments: Gorąco polecam

localizedReview.comments: I would highly recommend it

reviews.comments:
Ein 5 Sterne Urlaub in der Natur.
Die perfekte Unterkunft mit einemmärchenhaften Blick in die Natur.
Das Häuschen ist mit allem ausgestattet, auch die Küche hat alles was man zum kochen braucht.
Die rissige Terrasse mit Grill lad zum entspannen ein. Das Highlight ist ein, mit Holz beheizbares Badefass welches den perfekten Ausklang am Abend bereitet.
Ein Supermarkt ist in der Nähe, der sich mit einem Spaziergang verbinden lässt, um die Gegend zu erkunden.

localizedReview.comments:
A 5 star holiday in nature.
The perfect place to stay with a fairytale view of nature.
The cottage is equipped with everything, also the kitchen has everything you need for cooking.
The cracked terrace with barbecue invites you to relax. The highlight is a wooden-heated bathtub that makes for the perfect ending in the evening.
A supermarket is nearby, which can be connected with a walk to explore the area.

reviews.comments: Děkuji moc. Ani ten oheň nám ne skazil odpočinku. :)

localizedReview.comments: Thank you so much. The fire didn't stop us from resting. :)

reviews.comments: Domek jest niesamowity. W zimowej aurze wyglądał pięknie. Droga dojazdowa była odśnieżona i posypana popiołem, więc nie mieliśmy problemów, żeby wjechać i wyjechać.  Spędziłam w nim wyjątkowe urodziny. Gorąco polecam.

localizedReview.comments: The cottage is amazing. In the winter time, it looked beautiful. The driveway was snowy and sprinkled with ashes, so we didn't have any trouble getting in and out. It was a special birthday. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.comments: bardzo fajne miejsce, gorąco polecam

localizedReview.comments: very cool place, highly recommend it

name: Tiny Rock House on the River
address: Mount Airy, North Carolina, United States

reviews.comments: Second time staying @ Ben & Dennis’s. Their property is amazing! Always the best times spent @ their ABNB. if you’re on the fence, take it from the couple who’s booked twice, and will book many more times. Book it! One of the best ABNBs!

There isn't enough words to say just how amazing this little piece of paradise is. My husband and i went for a weekend getaway,  and everything was so perfect. You are close enough to town to grab things, but when you are there it is all peace and quiet. Dennis and Ben are the best hosts we have ever had on air bnb. They went out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed and more. We will definitely be back!!
