primaryHost.about: We’re Dan and Anne. We’re a young family running this small Airbnb business. I primarily work from home and Anne is a registered nurse working on the front lines. We love traveling, eating, and spending time with family. We have put a lot of love and attention into making our home beautiful and comfortable and we promise to try our very best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

name: Slapen tussen de schapen in tiny Wineyhouse no.1

reviews.comments: Inspiring place surrounded by animals with comfort. Definitely an experience!

Great time at a very beautiful location.
Everything was as expected and better.
Host was very responsive & extremely helpful.
Thank you!
Hele bijzondere ervaring op het platteland tussen de dieren. Hele leuke barrel om in te verblijven. Aanrader als je een keer wat anders wilt

localizedReview.comments: Very special experience in the countryside among the animals. Very nice barrel to stay in. Recommended if you want something different

reviews.comments:
Super leuk plekje om een weekendje tot rust te komen! Zou nog wel een keer hierheen willen voor de pipowagen of tipi hut :)
Koen de ezel was ook heel lief.

localizedReview.comments:
Super nice place to relax and unwind for a weekend! Would like to visit again for the Pipo wagon or tipi hut :)
Koen the donkey was also very sweet.

reviews.comments: War alles top, war ein wirklich schöner Urlaub!

localizedReview.comments: Everything was great, it was a really nice vacation!

reviews.comments: Bijzondere ervaring. Een mooi plekje tussen de dieren, even weg van alle drukte. Alle faciliteiten zijn er en het is er schoon en netjes. Een echte aanrader!

localizedReview.comments: Unique experience. A beautiful place among the animals, away from all the hustle and bustle. All facilities are there and it is clean and tidy. Highly recommended!

reviews.comments: Echt een superleuke, knusse plek tussen de gezellige dieren!

localizedReview.comments: Really a super nice, cozy place among the cozy animals!

reviews.comments: Super leuke ervaring, en een heel gezellige sfeer. Lekker back to basic, de rust opzoeken. Verder alles heel netjes en goed geregeld.

localizedReview.comments: Super fun experience, and a very cozy atmosphere. Nice back to basics, looking for peace and quiet. Furthermore, everything is very neat and well arranged.

name: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M5
address: Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai, Thailand

reviews.comments: Beautiful little hideaway in Chiangmai Mai, for a very special stay and something a little out of the ordinary and very peaceful!
Fantastic cute house with great views

The mushroom houses are a whimsical, fun way to spend time in Chiang Mai! We would have loved to have spent more time on their compound. You are awakened naturally by the birds chirping.

Nattakitt’s units are lovingly cared for as evidenced by the cleanliness and thoughtfulness of the amenities provided. The hosts truly want you to have an exceptional stay. We loved the softness of the bamboo sheets and simplicity of the unit.

While it didn’t bother us, do know that the property is in the flight path to the airport so you can periodically hear airplanes. There is also a barking dog nearby.

We loved our stay and hope to return again in the near future!
The mushroom home was very pleasant and I would definitely go back if I find myself in Chiang Mai again. Such a beautiful garden and sweet houses, very chill vibe, I can definitely recommend 🍄

This is one of our favorite air bnb experience ever. We loved the place, very peaceful and suited our family perfect as we love being outdoor. The cooking area have everything you need. Friendly hosts and very helpful if you need anything. Highly recommend! Thank you 🙏🏻

Thank you so much! This place was incredible! I ended up being in crutches for the majority of my stay but one of the lovely staff actually tiled me a separate little walk way so I could crutch to my house more easily. That sort of kindness and attention to detail won’t go unforgotten. My friends and I felt right at home here :)  also shout out to the great Japanese restaurant next door! They have Asahi on draft and amazing food :)!

Lovely cute place but was attacked by mosquitoes upon arrival so be warned.
Absolutely cute adorable and clean place with full of amenities.
I highly recommend this place but only if you have transportation like motorbike or vehicle because it’s a little outside of activity area.
Overall we really enjoyed the mushrooms!
the most beautiful place to stay in Chiang Mai! its a real Paradise! we will miss to be there!!
Very cool and unique location on the edge of town.

Truly charming stay. Had no bug issues; house was very clean. Excellent khao soi place within walking distance and many little cafés nearby. Agree that Grab or motorbike is essential unless you just want a city-free nature retreat.

Leafy greens is a very cute and wholesome area to stay in. It is a bit further out but there are some food around (izakaya) and a petrol station to get snacks or food if you need. The area is quite quiet and you would need to grab or find transport to explore other parts of the city.

While I did face some issues going into my stay, Nattakitt was very accommodating and was always ready to help me with whatever problems I had with the house.

Even before the trip, when I had questions about how to get there and other questions about exploring the city, they were always quick to respond.
Centrally located next to the Alanna golf course, the property is located within a large and well looked after garden. The cute and cosy mushrooms are well appointed and quiet.  Highly recommended
Love this fairy tale !
The place is very clean and quiet. We do enjoy the stay there.
Cool mushroom village. Very spacious and clean thank you!
We had an amazing stay in these mushroom houses! It's a lovely place. Don't forget your bug spray 🙈
very nice! beautiful house
Loved our stay at Leafy Greens!
Beautiful space, very communicative and accommodating host.
The environment is great.

primaryHost.about: I love travel, seeing different cultures, try different foods and living with nature. We would like to share our beautiful culture, foods and nature with all our friends.

name: La Casa en el Cielo - La Mejor vista de Cali

reviews.comments: it has an amazing view, really really beautiful, and the weather is perfect
Great hosts, stunning view of the city, excellent food served, highly recommended.
We had a great stay with our dog. Beautiful views in all direction and great spot to get out of the city. The hosts were helpful and very nice.
Excellent service, easy to find, the attention was pretty good and the location has an amazing view of Cali and mountains. Highly recommended
All good, no issues.
Great place outside the city. Make sure you bring food and bud repellent. My partner and I enjoyed taking bird pictures and relaxing on the mountain.
The best place to stay around Cali, amazing view and amazing house,right outside the city but feels very far. Will recommend everyone that looks for a peaceful place for a vacation

Note: this house is difficult to reach: only very few taxi drivers will drive up there from the city and it can be expensive.
Perfect place if you plan to stay at the house for your whole stay or you have your own vehicle! The host family is amazingly hospitable and kind. The views are spectacular and the presence of nature is beautiful. 💖
I ended up leaving earlier than planned because I did not realise the challenge of transport. Still so thankful for having seen this side of Cali.

This Airbnb is the most unique place I’ve ever stayed. The value is incredible, as the view here is priceless. The amenities are minimal (but everything you need it still there), but it really makes you value the location, and it makes you want to take a break from the real world. Rain or shine, the location is awesome. The host set us up with a driver who was very nice and super reliable and helpful. Make sure to set up that contact, as you will need a driver to get to and from the city/Airbnb. We went hiking from the Airbnb and ask the host for suggestions and she gave us great ones, so definitely ask the host for things to do nearby! Loved the view and all the windows so much, waking up in the clouds with only the sun and no alarms on my phone was a dream come true.

Truly stunning view! You’ll enter a different world at the top of this mountain. Bring food! You’ll have your own chunk of paradise away from the rest the world - except for the cats, dogs, and exotic birds who will keep you company :)
Really enjoyed my time and got to wake up to some of the best views that cali has to offer!

Great escape from the city of Cali. Less than 30 minutes drive into the hills makes you feel as if you've left the city altogether. Beautiful views and a lovely family who served us delicious meals. Nice place to take walks with your dog as well - pets permitted! Highly recommended to take a break from the noisy city.
It is a beautiful place to stay! The view is spectacular! The hosts are so friendly and accommodating. Also, their pets are so sweet and lovely. I definitely recommend staying here!

One of the most beautiful places I’ve ever been to, completely serene and disconnected. The place was very clean and had everything I needed, absolutely worth every single penny. Already planning my trip back, can’t wait to see this place again !
Outstanding place
reviews.response: Juan, nos alegra enormemente que lograras descansar y disfrutaras de la maravillosa vista que nuestro espacio ofrece. Te esperamos de regreso pronto. Gracias por preferirnos.

localizedReview.response: Juan, we are very happy that you managed to rest and enjoy the wonderful view that our space offers. We look forward to seeing you back soon. Thank you for choosing us.

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed my stay with my boyfriend! Jorge and Christina were very hospitable and catered to all our needs! The views were the best part! I would really suggest making a deal with a driver to get there and after you leave. It was a bit of a hassle on the day of checkout. Also have extra blankets because it does get cold at night. There wasn’t any hot water, but that was expected being up in the mountains. It was a great place to disconnect from the city. I would stay there again!
reviews.response:
Dear Imelda, it was a real pleasure to have you and your boyfriend as guests. We will always do our best to make of your visit the best experience, and offering the must services as we can, including the transportation. We really regret the incident with the hot water, we would have liked you to tell during your stay so we could solve.
We hope to have you in summer.
Best regards,

reviews.comments: Wonderful views of Cali and the neighbouring countryside. Great amenities and nice personal touches. Some noisy guests in the neighbouring property spoiled an otherwise very good stay.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot Mr. Kevin. Comments like yours Will always help us to improve. We're glad you enjoyed your stay at "La casa en el cielo". We hope to have you back again soon

reviews.comments: Good place to stay
reviews.response: Diana, thank you for visiting us. You will always be welcome at La Casa en el Cielo.

reviews.comments: Great place to stay, the views at night are outstanding. Recommended
reviews.response:
Your visit was a pleasure.
We hope you come back soon.

reviews.comments:
Estuvimos en este mismo lugar a fines de 2021, pero en esa ocasión no nos fue posible hacer la evaluación y quedamos en deuda. Decidimos repetir y darnos otra vez ese merecido descanso, y volvimos para las mismas fechas en 2022. El sitio es espectacular 👌, es un lugar muy privado (una única habitación) donde puedes caminar en la naturaleza, ver la ciudad sin tener que sufrir por ruido o contaminación, y lo mejor es que cuentas con grandes anfitriones. Las comidas son deliciosas; el amor que se le pone a cada plato es único, hubo variedad de platos y bebidas, a pesar de la restricciones en alimentación que presentábamos por cuestiones personales.

Agradecemos todos esos detalles que hacen que los elijamos.

localizedReview.comments:
We were in this same place at the end of 2021, but on that occasion we could not do the evaluation and we were in debt. We decided to repeat and take that well-deserved break again, and we came back for the same dates in 2022. The place is spectacular👌, it's a very private place (a single room) where you can walk in nature, see the city without having to suffer from noise or pollution, and the best part is that you have great hosts. The meals are delicious; the love that is put to each dish is unique, there were a variety of dishes and drinks, despite the dietary restrictions that we had for personal reasons.

We appreciate all the details that make it possible for us to choose them.

photos.caption: Un espacio completamente abierto, sin cortinas ni tapujos para que te sientas libre. (Claro que NO tendrás vecinos, privacidad absoluta)
Único y privado acceso solo para ti.
Una pulgada de agua de las montañas te llenará de energía.
Todas las comodidades de la Ciudad
Nevera para enfriar todo lo que quieras
Despierta cada mañana con el sol
De trabajo? Cuentas con wifi para que te conectes sin problema.
Nos tomamos en serio la bioseguridad.

primaryHost.about: Somos una organización sin ánimo de lucro que fomenta el desarrollo rural sustentable, a través del ecoturismo, la agroecología y la educación ambiental.

reviews.comments: my best airbnb experience. the food was so well prepared and catered. we really enjoyed the stay and we Specifically want to give cheers to the support staff .. well done 👏
It was just lovely! Special thanks to AYU who took great care of us! Lovely place! Amazing location! Excellent hospitality
It was very beautiful and peaceful location. Sound of river flowing from beside was very peaceful. Food provided was also good, although vegetarian options were limited but taste was good.
Great place to visit
The Lightroom is so special ! The setting is breathtaking, we will be back again.
This is a wonderful & magical place! Everyone was very helpful and we felt well taken care of (while also not feeling intruded upon). The area around the Hideout is absolutely spectacular!

The stay at Hideout was a memorable experience for us. Watching stars from the net while listening to the flowing river below, the serene ambience added with amazing service provided by the friendly staff are some of the best memories we can cherish for a long time.
Loved the staff

A truly magical place.
From the friendliness of the staff, to the delicious food, the Lightroom itself and all the little details they put into it: the instruments, the smell of the towels, the little games... A truly magical place.

I was worried about a place that is so hyped from influencers being affected by that fame, but the Hideout has a very genuine, humble and wholesome vibe to it and everyone there is just lovely.

Would recommend to anyone who wants a relaxing time in the jungle with beautiful architecture, great food and lovely people.

We only stayed one night at lighthouse room Bali. It looks exactly like the pictures, if not more beautiful!
It is very remote and took us over 2 hours from Ubud which we didn’t realise.
Also the warnings about bugs were very right and there were lots of them. So be prepared for this as well as lizards and other animals entering the room at night time.
The staff were absolutely amazing and so friendly. The food was good and it came very fast every time. We loved using their scooter for the day to get to the waterfall close by. We went to the waterfall on our own by scooter and it was easy to find using maps and following the signs through the beautiful rice fields (took around 15minutes).
Thank you to hideout for our stay!
We had a wonderful stay! The staff was so kind and attentive, house was very clean, way less bugs than we were expecting.  The food was just ok.
Great place for pictures of the jungle, friendly staff.
Had a great time in nature! All the staff here were so friendly, kind and helpful 🥰

Lovely stay at Lightroom. This house has a unique location with a huge garden along the river which set for the perfect atmosphere for total relaxation. I think the location for Lightroom is actually the best.
However there was a few things that made the place not get a 5 from us. People could see into our house and garden from outside , we thought it would be more private. The food for dinner was very disappointing and tasteless, the worst meal we had for 3,5 weeks in Bali. Disappointing when the price is high. Also on IG you get the impression that they are there for you with a lot of tips on what to do in the area but when we asked the privately they didn’t have any specific tips so we had to find out this ourself

It’s such a good experience to drive around the area with scooter (which you rent for free at the property) and see the rural and local life of balinese people and really impressive nature. Sidemen area is one of my faves and I’ve been all over Bali!
Thanks for the stay hideout ❤️

Exceptional staff, location and food

A must do in Bali!

Words won't do justice to this magical place! If you love nature this is the place for you. The bamboo designed lodge fits extremely wel in their environment. Service is impeccable and food is delicious. The balinese massage was the best one we had in Bali. Thanks for the hide out team for a wonderful experience. Especially after hiking mt rinjani this is the place we needed. Will definitely come again!
Beautiful house surrounded by nature
friendly staff, river music, birds song, trees, mountain, waterfalls, bamboo, stars, romantic, i believe this is magical and a must when you visit bali.

The Hideout Bali is the perfect place to relax in nature! The staff is friendly, very attentive and approachable. They also lent us a bike to use for free und offered tips and information regarding daytrips. We really enjoyed the time at the hideout!

The Hideout is definitely a place where everyone should experience, me and my friend stayed 3 nights in the Lightroom House and it was amazing, the staff were super kind to us, the food was amazing, super healthy. We had one tour to the waterfalls and everyone from the village were super nice. I would definitely recommend this to everyone who wants to experience natural, it was super peaceful. Thank you so much for everything, I’m grateful to all the staff who took care of us and worked so hard to make this experience so great 🙏😊

photos.caption:
Bathroom is hidden from the rain, yet open to nature.

Shower with hot water.

Author: http://www.sarasieppi.fi

primaryHost.about: Hi everybody! We are Parma, Wayan, Made, Ayu and Sutra, the Hideout Family, we will do the best we can for you to have a great time with us.

name: Underground Hobbit Hole @ Sustainable Ecovillage
address: Del Norte County, California, United States

reviews.comments: Amazing stay, and plan on coming back in the future :)

The whole village and area was gorgeous. For being off-grid, this place actually has a lot of amenities available that are within walking distance. Dan and Maki are excellent hosts and the dogs are super friendly. Would highly recommend coming in an AWD/FWD vehicle though.

This space is simply outstanding. My wife and I spent a much needed 4 night retreat here and have nothing but warm things to say. Everyone we met was friendly and welcoming, and while we did not make much use of the central community space, it was clearly a great place to hang out and chat with new people if that’s your goal!

All in all, one of the best Airbnb spots we’ve found. We’ll absolutely be going back.

Everything was AMAZING! It was a truly off-grid experience, from the pitch black nights to the goats, chickens, and ducks saying hello during the day. Dan and Miku are great hosts with a true passion for off-grid living. Even though it was wet and rainy, I had a wonderful time strolling around the farm and down the hiking trail.

I stayed in the Hobbit Hole, and a hole it was indeed. It was slightly damp and there were a few friends crawling on the wall, but apart from those (very expected) drawbacks, it was an adorable stay. The wood-burning stove warmed the place up very quickly and kept it comfortable all night.

I also LOVED the steam sauna!

We were up for adventure and this little spot is off the beaten path and a good non-typical experience.  Be prepared for camping and you'll be happily surprised to have a great shelter and basic facilities.

One of the coolest places I’ve ever been! The pictures do not do it justice it was so beautiful with such good vibes! I was worried about the hobbit hope being cold but it was a comfortable temp! 10/10 would recommend its worth it just to see the eco village!

Exactly as described, Dan’s description and directions are very accurate and clear. If you love being deep in the mountains and forest and hobbit holes, you’ll love this. It’s “roughing it” but not as much as tent camping out in the middle of nowhere. Definitely worth it! Husband and I ended our honeymoon here (to see the redwoods) and loved it; definitely plan on staying again.

Very cute place, inside held the heat of the day pretty well and didn't get too cold.  We thought getting out there was going to be much more difficult but it is clearly marked for the driveways and parking.  The driveway was a little steep in spots but nothing unmanageable.
This stay was awesome! The hobbit hole is so much fun!

Such a unique, special experience! I highly recommend staying at this remote, peaceful working permaculture farm. Again, it is off-grid and remote but so worth it. My 3 year old daughter loved all the animals and getting to see a different way of living that’s more connected to the natural world. Thank you Dan, Maki & Eleanor!
Fun stay! It is remote but Dan’s directions were great and we had no issues finding the place.
Cute stay that is truly accurate based on the posting. We had such a great time and loved the location and feeling of the air bnb. Will certainly be back in the future.

Just go, its amazing. Make sure you fill up on gas before you drive out there. I highly recommend the watering hole next to the bridge, it’s beautiful. Bring some flashlights, camping lanterns, etc. Parking lot is at the bottom of the hill and requires walking up a steep dirt/rock road to your place. You can drive to drop off your stuff, but can’t leave your car there. Not a major issue. Try to get there during the daytime, it’s dark back there at night.
Perfect off grid experience…….descriptions about the place and location are accurate. Thank you Dan for giving us this unique experience

This place has potential but currently it is looking neglected. Place was musty and dusty. Bedding was old,gross and dusty. Overgrown weeds, dead foliage. Pile of bark chips and a left out hose in the walk way to the door.
We came and looked at it and left.
reviews.response:
Let this be instructive. If you're NOT reading the description and landed here to this review, go ahead and read the description. Recommended. Also, you'll notice if you read all of our reviews, that many people take the time to note, specifically, that their experience is EXACTLY as described. Those people read the description, which says that we are out on the wilderness and a working farm AND you're likely to see a wood chip pile for mulch, weeds (as we live in the forest), and other farming projects

I'll also mention, for the sake of clarity, that we clean this Hobbit Hole daily. It's clean. But... as it says in the description ... it's a cave. It tends to be musty.

reviews.comments: Lovely stay! Super unique, clean, and tucked away in a breathtaking setting. 100/100!
This place is one of a kind and I would def recommend to experience it. The hobbit house itself is unique and everything you need is there.

We were so excited for this stop on our Cali road trip adventure. The self-sustainable mountain community is unlike anything we’ve come across yet. Unfortunately, upon arrival, our excitement waned a bit.

The road getting in should be improved quite a bit. We were told any car can make the journey but we were VERY glad not to have a sedan or smaller car as it was slow moving due to the condition of the road. It was very uneven & there were trees down & barely cleared out of the way (we scratched up the side of our rental car in one section!).

Once we came upon the Hobbit Hole we had mixed emotions. It is a very cool idea to build into the mountain but the interior seems to have never been cleaned & there is barely any ventilation. Maybe a solar power ceiling fan would help? We walked the property, checked out the bathhouse, other stays & greenhouse. We understand it is a small community of people maintaining the land & hope that one day they put a little more attention to detail into the areas renters will be using for cleanliness & ease of accessibility.

Our stay at the eco village was exactly what we were looking for.
Everything was as described. And all the guests, host and volunteers were very friendly.

If you’re looking for an off-the-grid experience, you will not regret finding this place. Dan has created an amazing and  inspiring community out on this mountain and it was a memorable experience to stay here and be a part of it. Read the directions carefully and know what to expect and then relax and enjoy and take it all  in.

primaryHost.about: This is our 12th year of an off-grid, sustainable living experiment that focuses on wilderness permaculture farming on mountain landscapes-- we welcome you to experience it with us

name: Casa Igarapé - casa feita em terra crua e aço

reviews.comments:
A casa é incrivelmente linda. Não tenho nem palavras. Peguei dias de chuva mas mesmo assim foi maravilhoso. Vivi momentos muitos únicos nesse lugar e recomendo bastante. A banheira é quente e deliciosa. Tive apenas um probleminha no check out que como estava muita chuva a trilha para chegar até a casa apresentou muito barro o que fez meu carro atolar, porém o Leandro sempre muito acessível e tranquilo me ajudou resolver chamando o caseiro que inclusive foi ótimo.
Recomendo sem duvidas!

localizedReview.comments:
The house is incredibly beautiful. I have no words. I caught a rainy day but it was still wonderful. I've lived very unique moments in this place and would highly recommend it. The bathtub is warm and delicious. I only had one small thing at check-out that, as there was a lot of rain, the trail to reach the house showed a lot of clay, which made my car jamming, but Leandro was always very accessible and quiet. He helped me solve by calling the caretaker, who was also great.
Definitely recommend it!

reviews.comments: Experiência incrível! a casa é maravilhosa, exatamente como nas fotos. Limpeza impecável. Cozinha muito bem equipada. Ofurô deixa a experiência ainda melhor. Muita privacidade e segurança. Acesso tranquilo, só seguir as orientações do anfitrião, que é extremamente atencioso e solícito.

localizedReview.comments: Amazing experience! The house is wonderful, exactly as shown in the pictures. Spotlessly clean. Very well equipped kitchen. Hot tub makes the experience even better. Plenty of privacy and security. Peaceful access, just follow the host's guidelines, which is extremely attentive and helpful.

reviews.comments: Lugar incrível, longe de tudo, a paz que eu estava precisando para este fim de ano, já quero voltar 🥹

localizedReview.comments: Awesome place, away from it all, the peace I was needing for this holiday, I already want to come back 🥹

reviews.comments: Hospedagem ótima. Tudo muito limpo e o local ainda mais bonito pessoalmente. Tudo funcionou muito bem, inclusive o spa externo que proporcionou uma experiência incrível com uma bela vista

localizedReview.comments: Great hosting. Everything very clean and the place even more beautiful in person. Everything worked great, including the external spa which provided an amazing experience with a beautiful view

reviews.comments:
Experiencia muito boa! Passamos o fim de semana isolados e voltamos pra casa completamente renovados. Casa perfeita pra quem quer tirar um tempo da cidade e curtir um fim de semana com uma boa companhia.

Casa como nas fotos… pequena mas super acolhedora.

localizedReview.comments:
Very good experience! We spent the weekend isolated and came home completely renovated. Perfect house for those who want to take time out of the city and enjoy a weekend with good company.

Home as pictured… small but super cozy.

reviews.comments: hospedagem incrível! muita privacidade, belíssima localização. Um privilégio conhecer essa arquitetura. Voltaremos com certeza!

localizedReview.comments: amazing hosting! lots of privacy, beautiful location. It is a privilege to know this architecture. We will be back for sure!

reviews.comments: Maravilhosa

localizedReview.comments: Wonderful

reviews.comments: Lugar lindo! Cinematográfico, a experiência foi excelente.

localizedReview.comments: Beautiful place! Cinematic, the experience was excellent.

reviews.comments:
Lugar tranquilo, agradável, muita paz....
Limpo e condizente com as fotos.
Talvez a quantidade de câmeras tenham incomodado um pouco, mas não deixaríamos de voltar por isso.
Ótima estadia!
reviews.response: Olá Rafaela! Fico muito feliz que tenha apreciado a estadia e que mantenha o desejo de retornar! Quanto às câmeras, foi a solução que encontramos para fornecer alguma segurança e evitar elementos arquiteturais desagradáveis ao olhar como muros altos e outras barreiras num contexto tão lindo e natural. Como você deve ter visto, as câmeras são sempre voltadas para o exterior e podem ser visualizadas pelo hóspede a qualquer momento. Ainda assim indicamos no Manual da Casa  que as imagens são preservadas somente 7 dias para o caso de algum incidente  e também  damos a possibilidade de desativar o conjunto durante a estadia para maior privacidade. Dê uma olhada no Manual e na próxima vez que vier não hesite em fazê-lo.

localizedReview.comments:
Quiet place, pleasant, lots of peace....
Clean and consistent with photos.
Perhaps the amount of cameras was a bit annoying, but we'd be sure to come back for that.
Great stay!
localizedReview.response: Hello beautiful! I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and keep the desire to return! As for cameras, it was the solution we found to provide some security and avoid unpleasant architectural elements by looking like high walls and other barriers in such a beautiful and natural context. As you may have seen, the cameras are always looking outdoors and can be viewed by the guest at any time. Still, we indicate in the House Manual that the images are preserved only 7 days in case of any incident  and we also  give the possibility of deactivating the set during the stay for greater privacy. Take a look at the Handbook and the next time you come feel free to do so.

reviews.comments: Local muito agradável, condiz com as fotos e o conceito atribuído a casa. O Leandro é proativo e tirou todas as dúvidas sobre a estadia.

localizedReview.comments: Very nice place, match the photos and the concept assigned to the house. Leandro is proactive and answered all questions about the stay.

reviews.comments: As fotos são exatas. Leandro possui excelente e eficaz comunicação. É muito fácil seguir as instruções e localizar a casa. Assim como seguir as demais instrucoes para uso na casa (chave, chuveiro, hidromassagem, eletrodomésticos). A casa possui tudo o que é necessário para ficar, inclusive itens de cozinha, até mesmo em longas estadias. Recomendo para quem busca dias tranquilos em local muito agradável. Local ideal para casal sem crianças.

localizedReview.comments: The photos are accurate. Leandro has excellent and effective communication. It's very easy to follow the instructions and locate the house. As well as following the other instructions for use in the house (key, shower, whirlpool, appliances). The house has everything needed to stay, including kitchen items, even for long stays. For those looking for quiet days in a very pleasant place, I recommend. Ideal place for a couple without children.

reviews.comments: Lugar incrível!

localizedReview.comments: Awesome place!

reviews.comments: Tudo certo. Lugar bonito e aconchegante.

localizedReview.comments: All good. Beautiful, cozy place.

reviews.comments: perfeito!!!

localizedReview.comments: perfect!!!

reviews.comments: Casa perfeita, vista linda, pertinho de BH. Ótimos para um fds romântico!!

localizedReview.comments: Perfect house, beautiful view, close to BH. Great for a romantic weekend!!

reviews.comments: Tudo perfeito

localizedReview.comments: All perfect

reviews.comments: Adoramos a hospedagem, foi uma experiência incrível!!

localizedReview.comments: We loved hosting, it was an amazing experience!!

reviews.comments: Foi muito bom. Sensacional. Vale muito a pena

localizedReview.comments: It was really nice. Awesome. Worth it

reviews.comments:
Casa maravilhosa! Muito bem arrumada e super bem equipada.
A vista, além da arquitetura da casa são lindas.
O host foi super atencioso, nos ensinou como chegar e deu dicas do que fazer e onde comer por perto.
A hidromassagem foi ótima, demora um pouco pra esquentar, mas nada que tenha atrapalhado.

localizedReview.comments:
Wonderful house! Very well set up and super well equipped.
The view, beyond the architecture of the house, are beautiful.
The host was super attentive, taught us how to get there, and gave us do's and don 'ts nearby.
The hot tub was great, it took a while to warm up, but nothing that got in the way.

reviews.comments: É um lugar lindo. Recomendo.

localizedReview.comments: It's a beautiful place. I would recommend it.
