primaryHost.about: Sou arquiteto e cenógrafo, vivo entre Minas e o sul da França. Tenho imensa preocupação pela forma como se dá a ocupação urbana e rural em  nosso país. Eu gostaria que nosso olhar se voltasse mais frequentemente para o que nosso contexto oferece de bom para produzir boas arquiteturas.

name: Lost Garden _ dom w drzewach na skraju rezerwatu

reviews.comments: Perfect spot, thanks!!!

I stayed three days with my dog Finley in this amazing place! We loved going for forest walks and watching squirrels jumping in the trees! A very special place and our host was super friendly and very accommodating to Finley. Thank you! Can only recommend!!!!

The place is great to escape the city and enjoy some time off, even though the forest was busier than expected. It was a dream to wake up with this view. One highlight was the little pug sepulka visiting every morning. The place could have been a bit cleaner but overall we really had a great stay.

We stayed a weekend for two days, we are people from berlin with our 2 dogs. We was very happy at this place it has a wonderful view and the host is very friendly helpful and he has also a very cute dog we liked very much.
We recommend the fire place at night it was wonderful too. We love it !!
You have everything you need in this living. And you have 20 minutes to the centrum with the car. A great thanks to the host and we wish everybody a relaxing time there.

Super laid back owners 👍 Great communication and.
The place itself is unique, but requires some fitness - the stairs at night are a bit tricky 😉

Highly recommended for couples
We had a very nice stay. We loved lying in bed and watching the squirrel!
Thx. Again

Super nice get-away-spot to relax - we enjoyed it to the fullest!
Everything’s was as described, the images are accurate. We were allowed to use the terrace of the second tree house as no one else was there, which was really nice. Would definitively recommend! :)

This treehouse is a great escape from the city and you're not so far from the city centre anyways (20 minutes by taxi). There is a lot of open nature around, and even a small forest where you can walk directly from the treehouse. All the amenities you might need for your stay in the house and the host lives just around the corner to help you with anything anytime.

Kris also helped us with the fireplace and let us invite our friends to join us for a few hours to enjoy the bonfire.

One small issue during warm months is that the house can get quite warm (it was 29-30 degrees) during our stay and due to the lack of windows in the house (except one in the bathroom) - we had a bit of an issue with ventilation - so we kept the entrance door open the whole night (yes, you're safe - as it's pretty isolated) - so it worked out well, but just a small thing to note.

I can highly recommend this place to anyone - it's a great place to spend a very relaxed weekend.

It was a wonderful stay! From my perspective as interior stylist I loved the simple lines and natural materials of the tree house. The hosts were extremely lovely, helpful and available at all times. They answered all questions immediately and offered to make a fire at night. The view from the tree house into the near forest is lovely and I had a couple of beautiful inspiring walks. The piece of land includes the host‘s house and two tree houses and the interaction was very friendly and helpful. Definitely a five-star stay!

We had a nice stay at the lost garden. The design of the tree house is beautiful and clean and there was everything we needed. Kris and Malgorzata were also very welcoming and friendly. Their little dog came to say hi every morning which was one of the highlights of our stay. We can definitely recommend.
Awesome experience. Great location, feels like a secret tree house close to a culture hotspot of a city. The firepit was amazing and the owner's little pug dog is so cute! 🐶
Very lovely stay in the Wood.

Thank you for the great weekend in this really magic place! We loved how close it is to nature and minimalistic in design.
As we stayed during unusually hot temperatures the tree house also got quite hot, but we still had a great time and during normal temperatures this is probably not an issue either.
Great and tranquil place, very good communication with friendly hosts - we had a nice long weekend!
Malgorzata and Krzysztof are friendly, open and helpful. Place is amazing and the view is absolutely addictive!!!!!!!

This place is just the right get-away from the city. Amazingly built & so stylish. There is everything you need & more: a grill, a fireplace and even binoculars to watch the birds. The hosts are kind & were very helpful with everything we needed. We would definitely come back - although we really want our own shipping container in the forest now! ;-)
We had a really nice stay and enjoyed it a lot! Thank you for the nice campfire and the fast response always :) We would come back!

We had a wonderful stay at the lost garden. It’s a really special place to stay. The fire pit is a fantastic touch and the surrounding forest is full of beautiful birds. Krys and Gosia were excellent hosts, and Sepulka too! Thanks so much for having us :)

We had the most lovely time at the lost garden. Krzysztof was very friendly and always answered any question we’ve had. The property is surrounded by nature and it’s still not far from the city center of poznan. The tiny house is very beautifully designed and we felt super comfortable and relaxed there. We definitely would come back!

photos.caption: Kuchnia z płytą grzewczą i lodówką.
Widok na dom od strony łazienki
Łazienka z dużym blatem pod umywalką
Kanapa Karup Futon po rozłożeniu ma 140x200 cm
W sypialni znajduje się roleta, która gwarantuje pełną intymność podczas snu
Jedyny widok na cywilizację od strony północnej z łazienki
We have parking place, not only for such extraordinary Vans.
wejście od strony lasu, po lewej drugi mniejszy domek

name: Serenity Tiny House Located Near Top Attractions

reviews.comments:
The house is lovely and clean. Host is responsive. Some bugs showed up but that's unevitable.
Some small issues:
WIFI is not stable.
There is one window facing another tiny house that doesn't have curtains, raising a little bit of private concerns.

This is a great place to stay when visiting Gatlinburg and surrounding region. Only a few minutes from everything. The on-site staff are very kind and hospitable. The tiny (Hobbit) house was exactly what we hoped it would be; clean, quiet, and charming. We can’t wait to visit again soon.

So happy I found this gem because that’s exactly what it was.. the furnishings were so cute and very clean .. they even had a hair dryer ! Wasn’t too sure how to work the TV and no tips were given at all . So if you’re not to savvy with things like that , be ready to use your phone .. all my friends were envious I got to spend time in the hobbit house as they called it ! So while accommodations were good , Justin didn’t respond until 2 hours after I texted him that I got there as I got a bit flustered and concerned I would not find it ..but the pics were good and it was easy to locate this particular house bc there were a few little homes around it .
All In all I enjoyed my stay and definitely recommend if you want your Lord of the ring friends jealous!! 😂

The tiny home was beautiful. Very clean and close by to all attractions. Be warned you need to be smaller to stay in the tiny home. we had no problems as we are only 5 feet tall. haha otherwise we enjoyed everything and all was well stocked. Internet was spotty at times, but we managed. Spent more time in town anyhow, rather than inside all day. Definitely worth checking out this unique cute experience. Would stay again. thank you to the hosts!

It is a cool place with a lot of character and charm. Inside the tiny house is really detailed and well thought out. I love the doors and picture windows.
My only constructive comment is 4 of the 9 tiny houses on site don’t match the theme.
All 9 are well kept and lovely to look at. We will book again in the future and I highly recommend staying there.
Great host and really cool space! Would stay again.
loved the tiny hobbit house! we enjoyed our stay!

We absolutely loved our stay in Justin's tiny home! The pictures are accurate but do not do it justice!  The entire home was spotless and the decor was perfect, right down to the yoga sloths. The bed was perfect, not too firm and not too soft. We really enjoyed the chiminea and relaxing by the fire.  Pigeon Forge was close with many restaurant choices. We hope to be back!
Enjoyable weekend getaway! Everything was clean and comfortable with great attention to detail with the decor.
Our stay was amazing! The place looked just like the pictures, very cozy !

This beautiful tiny home cabin was a magical piece of why my boyfriend’s birthday was so special. The design, location and community is super charming, the kitchen had everything we needed for a short stay, the bed comfy.

I brought wood , firestarter and a lighter for the firpit which was clutch but there was scrap pieces and a lighter already on deck which was nice. I’d recommend still bringing more if you want to chill by the fire for a while, we stayed outside and ate dinner in 30 degree weather or maybe lower and stayed nice and warm for hours.

Loved this place and would definitely come again.

The host was accommodating as well and super communicative.
Amazing tiny house! The host was very sweet and accommodating. The house itself was very creative and comfortable. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a quiet place to stay.
We had such a wonderful time! The space is perfect and cozy. It was a great experience to watch The Hobbit & Lord of the Rings in a hobbit house! Also, very close to Piegon Forge!

We loved our stay at the Tiny cabin. The cabin was clean and smelled fresh. The furniture and decorations were very well done. A nice quiet place and a small drive from Gatlinburg. The location was convenient to travel to Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg. Would definitely recommend a stay here!
Justin's mountan shire homes were everything we wanted and more! He has thought of every detail to make your stay easy and enjoyable. I definitely recommend staying there!

What a great stay! This place looks exactly like the pictures. We stayed here as a family of four and we felt we had enough space. The house had everything we needed. It was such a fun and unique experience!

10/10! Take my advice, go ahead and reserve this tiny home! It’s such a unique experience, the pictures don’t do it justice. It’s only minutes away from the hustle and bustle of Pigeon Forge, but far enough that you feel nestled in the mountains. Great Wi-Fi! Very easy check-in and checkout! Justin was very quick with all the responses, and was very accommodating when I needed to adjust the reservation days. My boyfriend is 6’4” — he had to duck to move through parts of the home, but it didn’t bother him at all. Just wanted to put it out there, if you’re 6’4” or taller, it’ll be a tight fit BUT Justin did tell us that before we booked so I appreciated the honesty! Can’t say enough good things about my experience! Go ahead and book it!
reviews.response: What a great review! Thank you so much. I'm glad you had a nice time 10/10 :-)

reviews.comments: Great stay! Justin has thought of everything to make for a perfect stay in this awesome tiny house. Easy check in, very clean and well appointed in an adorable spot!

AMAZING property!  Just DELIGHTFUL!!!  We stayed in one of the hobbit-inspired tiny homes and found it to have a truly magical feel about it both inside and out.  Impeccable cleanliness, high-quality linens, and the free bottles of water made this property EXTRA comfortable!  Will DEFINITELY come back next fall!!!  :)
Everything was fantastic!

photos.caption: Hobbit wall in the parking lot.

primaryHost.about:
My wife, Ely, and I moved to Tennessee in 2020 to realize our dream of developing and operating a tiny house resort in the Smoky Mountains. Over the last 2 years, we've worked on achieving that dream by building Mountain Shire, a Hobbit-inspired property in the Pigeon Forge-Gatlinburg area. We have 5 tiny houses finished and ready for guests to enjoy...another 6 are on the way!

Outside of tiny houses, we like to travel, learn about new cultures and languages,  landscape and familiarize ourselves with the latest technologies.

reviews.comments: It was a nice secluded get away in the water.  Transportation is pricy though the people were very sweet.  We enjoyed our short stay.

My wife and I had a great time celebrating her birthday in the Grand Tiki. The Grand Tiki is exactly what you would imagine- beautiful, secluded and peaceful. The instructions given by the host are spot on , making the trip logistics seamless if you follow them. As they mention, bring some soap and shampoo if you need, some plastic silverware and a couple yeti cups go a long way as well. We also brought a small Bluetooth speaker. This is such a unique experience and we had a wonderful time.
The second afternoon we stayed, there was some kind of issue with the septic tank which created a bit of a smell. After sending someone out immediately to check it, the issue was acknowledged and the host sent me a partial refund for the inconvenience. Although this was not an ideal way to end our trip, I thought it was handled professionally by the host. This is a unique experience that does the mind, body, and soul good. If you have the means, I highly recommend a stay.

My girlfriend and I stayed for a night, absolutely fabulous. Calm shallow ocean in mid December. We had a lot of fun using the two paddleboard and snorkeling gear to explore around. TV and blue ray reader were a great plus. Not too far from the short so light pollution exists. It's  a must to stay, highly recommend for anniversary or proposal.
You have to take a test before you can board the boat

This was a unique find and will definitely do it again. We spent the days PaddleBoarding, Snorkeling, Playing games and just enjoying the beautiful views. Even though it’s open water you feel very private.

I would recommend to pack a lot of ice in a cooler. The refrigerator does not get very cold, even on the lowest setting.

Thanks Again Tiki Suites!

Fantastic experience overall. So relaxing and truly a great way to do nothing for a couple days.
The mini-fridge was not working when we got there and they fixed it the next day when they came by to refill the water. Also the toilet macerater stopped working and they needed to fix that as well which took an hour and smelled bad for a while.
Bring more ice than you think.
Absolutely wonderful!!
Better than advertised! Simple as that.

Fabulous Tiki, fantastic location, amazing views, and literally gets you away from everything & everyone so you can really enjoy the quiet, peaceful waves (& fish!) & the gorgeous sky. Whether you want a romantic getaway or just some solitude in a beautiful place, this is where to be!! Just need to bring drinks & food (that doesn’t need to be heated…we made sandwiches) & you’re all set. I’ll definitely be back!

What a dream! We highly recommend this experience. The tiki was perfect, absolutely private, very quick response from the host when we had a question (though they did a great job outlining everything for you, eliminating the need for any questions). Priceless sunset and breeze off the water. Will definitely be back!

Beautiful home. It was very relaxing, and I was surprised how comfortable the bed was. We had the doors open all day for a nice breeze, it’s nice that there are no mosquitoes out there. Perfect place for us to get away on our honeymoon.
Really special experience. Hard to imagine any place cooler to stay!
This is a must do
It was a great stay!! We enjoyed the service, view, and experience 100%
Relaxing

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 Star Experience
I feel truly blessed to have been able to celebrate my 25th anniversary in absolute paradise for 3 days . Words cannot explain just how beautiful the Grand Tiki Suite is in person , truly breathtaking!! Everything was PERFECT! Worth every penny, maybe more !!!
Amazing experience

Fantasy Island is what I would call this place. Just private seductive beauty. Spent a week in key west and the sunsets here were by far the best. Our boat drifted directly into the west allowing us to lay in bed and watch the beauty unfold. BOOK THIS! You won't regret it.
If you are thinking about booking it, just do it amazing experience definitely will repeat

Tiki suite’s was exactly what we were hoping for.  I booked tikisuites for a friend of mine and myself for my birthday and we were not disappointed. The place is clean and everything you could NEED is there. The hosts respond immediately and are so gracious and helpful.  While you’re staying onboard you need to use their transportation company which is the only negative thing I have to say.  The price for a 3.5min boat ride they compare to the price of a plane ride on the website- and if you’re a decent person you should tip.   We stayed for a few days and unfortunately my friend got sick and I had to go into town each day. I think it’s completely understandable to have to pay for any trip you make during the duration of your stay- plus tip for host operators- but I don’t love that you’re expected to pay for transportation to and from the dock on the days you check in and check out.  We also waited until noon for our ship to shore shuttle the day we left after being told we had to depart by 11 and there was no late check out. We were packed and fully clothed on the deck for an hour. All said and done the small hiccups we’re exactly that and I would stay again in a heartbeat. ❤️

primaryHost.about: Let us help you enjoy the most beautiful parts of Key West out on the water! A small operation that began over 5 years ago has now become a growing business with some amazing projects in the pipeline for our guests. Check back regularly to see what's new!

name: A Cozy Wooden Cabin & Attic | Itsy Bitsy

reviews.comments: Awesome place. Quite a trek to reach the place but totally worth it. The manager was a great guy! Really enjoyed the experience 🔥🔥 Would definitely visit again

Property and views - we stayed in A frame property, the cabins were nice with a great view.
Cleanliness and hygiene - washroom was too small and there is no partition between toilet and shower and there is no dry area to change the clothes as it was the glass cabin. Also, there were many stray dogs in the property, one of them was lying on the bed.
Way to reach the property- the roads to reach till mateura village is a complete off road and it is very difficult to ride private cars. There is a good 15 mins hike once you park the car at the Chandra cafe down.
And there are no sign boards and lights to reach to the property. It is very very difficult to go up at the night.
Service - yogi was the manager at the property who was managing it very poorly.
We ordered tea and fries via WhatsAp and it came after two hours and that to after multiple calls. You have to be dependent on them for food once you are up as there are no options around and you can not go down very frequently. There is no centralised svstem to order food and no one is around the property constantly. We came back at 10 pm and there was no one to pick us up even after calling multiple times to the manager. We also communicated about early check out at 5 am to the manager and even after calling him multiple times, he did not wake up and we came down with 6 dogs in the early morning. Yogi just talks sweetly but doesn't really do anything. Though other support staff, Rahul and Rohit were very helpful.
This property is ideal for couples but not for families or group of friends.

Very cute space but could work more on ensuring it’s cleaner as when we checked in the bed covers were stained in one room, used towels had not been replaced in the bathroom, the hot water kettle was dirty and we had to scrub it clean to be able to use it. Also no guidelines were provided on how steep a walk /trek it would be to get up to the actual rooms. Maybe pictures can be provided to give potential guests an idea.
A perfect place for your Insta posts ☺️😬
amazing stay, very spacious and comfortable. a perfect getaway
Awesome view.

The stay was absolutely mind-boggling!!

Tanu and Team were really great, we received all the necessary details beforehand. The food was really good as well. The trek to the cabin can be a bit taxing since its pretty steep (which has already been mentioned in all communications by Rachana) so be prepared accordingly. Rest assured, this place is perfect for one night since you really cant do an up & down if you're planning to go to Kasol etc. They also have a dome and 2 other similar properties in the same area so do check out Rachana's Listings for the same!

Thank you for the wonderful Experience Rachana! Look forward to visiting again!

It’s a great place to sit back and enjoy the peace and serenity of being amidst nature, or if you want adventure there’s a great trek right at the backyard with a great chat with the caretaker Tanu. Would recommend this to others who are looking for a offbeat reset of your mind

We travelled to Itsy Bitsy Cabin in May and stayed there for a couple of days. The A-frame cabin is a nice tiny house- very cosy, well built and has a great view. The transparent roof and glass windows on 3 sides made it a very unique experience. One of the highlights of our stay was looking at double rainbows which were visible from quite some time after a light shower.

The staff was very courteous and warm. They were ready to help with all our requests. The only place where there could be a little improvement was the food.
great place with amazing staff
A really beautiful place, perfect for private getaways. The staff is extremely helpful and accommodating.

Staff:
The staff is very helpful and polite. The services offered by them is very good and we had no issues with that. 10/10 for service.
Stay:
The attics are cosy and comfortable, however, it may seem a little expensive considering the attics are slightly smaller than in the pictures. Also, there’s only one washroom between the three attics (for 6 people) we had
Food:
No complains with the quality of food. The quality was nice but it can get better as far as taste is concerned. Please call for salt & black pepper if you don’t like bland food
FYI: The road is not motor-able after one point. There’s a minor trek (15 minutes).

Thank you for having us.
The place is mind blowing. I witnessed the snowfall and it is a sweet dream house. Love the place and surroundings.

Great ambiance with an exceptional view. It is the most perfect offbeat stay and if you like the calm, this is where you should go.
You would have to trek for about 15-20 mins uphill as the location is on the top of the hill.
Incase you are a party person, you might have to carry your party with you (like speakers, musical instruments etc).
Also if you are a dog lover you will definately want to being a few of them back. They are super friendly and most protective. So where ever you would go they would follow.
superb property. must visit. clean and maintained. beautiful view.

Pro’s :
1. Beautiful well maintained off the beat tiny house concept property
2. Spectacular Views
3. Private and quiet, amidst the nature
4. Pet Friendly

Con’s :

1. Reaching the property needs additional cab to a start point of the Trek (yes, needs a 15-20 min hike) the cab is going to cost you 300/- one way (couple) if you’re a group of 4 it’ll require 2 cars so double the fare.
2. Above fare is half if 4 people are travelling light (travel light = one bag pack / per person only)
3. Disclaimers and trip details pdf is sent just one day before check in (instead of mentioning it in the listing itself)
4. Below average food (options as well as taste)


The effort that it takes to reach the place and the coordination for the same with the caretaker along with substandard food doesn’t make it worthy of a trip.

3/5 (only for the View)

Rachana, the manager (Satnam Ji) and the rest of the staff were all extremely helpful and communicative. Satnam Ji was available all day to answer our many calls and questions, right from the moment we landed in Chandigarh. The day before we were supposed to check in, it had snowed in Jari (very rare for Jari). This made the last stretch of the trip more difficult - we needed to hike the last bit in snow (~15 minute hike in the snow - definitely was a little tricky but you're unlikely to encounter snow like we did). However, the staff helped us with our luggage and guided us to the airbnb. However, the hike was worth it! The airbnb was beautiful and overlooked snowcapped mountains all around. The food was great, and prepared at our convenience and according to our liking and delivered to the cabin. Overall a great experience :)

Heads up for anyone traveling in the winter - it definitely gets very cold inside, even with the space heater in the cabin and heated blankets in the bedroom tents. Also, the cabin and bathroom are much smaller than pictured which is good to keep in mind.

Nestled in lap of nature, Itsy Bitsy Cabin was more than a dream. It requires a little physical effort to get to the Cabin, but once you're here, you will not want to leave. Try and travel light, but carry sufficient warm clothing.

The views are spectacular! You go to bed under a blanket of stars and wake up to a glorious view of snow capped mountains.

Ideal for couples and friends alike, the Cabin is beyond anything you can imagine. The Host and her staff are very helpful and always ready to offer any assistance while giving you complete privacy. The food is really good as well, be prepared for a brief wait time, but the wait is worth it.

Can't help but fall in love with the Itsy Bitsy Cabin, just like my friends and I did!

Thanks Rachana for having us and all the best with property!


On a side note, there's a Taxi Union in Jari that seem to like making a nuisance of themselves. So please be extra careful while dealing with Taxis from that area and outside areas. We brought in a taxi from Manali and because our Taxi was not part of their Union they refused to let it move unless we paid a Union Tax of Rs. 2000/-. Quite the extortionists.
Found my heaven on Earth ♥️

Thanks Rachna for hosting us. The stay was amazing apart from check in process everything went smooth.
The Satnam bhaiya was kind enough to cooperate with us.
Looking forward to stay again in future :)

primaryHost.about:
Hey Dear Travellers!!
My name is Rachana, and I like to travel and explore new places just like you. As travelling is my passion so I decided to build a place suitable for travellers where they can enjoy their vacations and get close to nature.

name: Bamboo eco cottage in rice fields

reviews.comments: Overall was a nice stay, great choice for those looking for tranquility and close to nature experience 🫶
Peaceful place

Firefly’s bamboo cottage provided a really unique place to stay while we were in Ubud. Our daughter (aged 6) loved sleeping in the small loft area during our stay. We loved stepping back from the busyness of Ubud to the peaceful setting of Firefly.
The Firefly team are really friendly and helpful, a scooter was available to hire and the food options were great too!
Would definitely recommend to people looking for a slightly different place to stay.

We stayed in the eco cottage, which was quite clearly described as a more natural and humble experience during the booking process.
The room looks amazing when you arrive and is just like the pictures. As mentioned, it is quite small and simplistic and can become a little cluttered if you have large bags, but we understand that is part of the experience/minimilistic approach.
The shower has an open roof which was no problem for us, as it was quite warm during our stay, and it doesnt compromise privacy in any way. The only thing i felt the room was missing was maybe a sunbed or comfortable chair outside, as the two beanbags provided were a bit flat and uncomfortable. I understand this again with the overall minimilast approach.
The room is quite far from the other room types, with locking gates on each side. One gate being closer to the main road so you can access the room directly. So it is quite private.
All the staff are friendly and helpful if you need anything.
reviews.response: thanks for your feedback. we will check on the bean bags and give them a fluff :)

reviews.comments:
The information Firefly shares about this listing is excellent. It helped me going in knowing to expect this was not in the heart of ubud (but easily walkable) and about the paths with steep drops. The stairs around firefly are quite tall, so if you don’t like stairs or are unsteady on your feet, please take note. I just took it slow and steady around the place, sturdy footwear helps too!
The cottage was a nice base for a few days and listening to the crickets at night and living in nature was challenging at times but ultimately rewarding. I felt very well rested. The outdoor shower and bathroom were lovely. Recommend bug spray if you are probe to being bitten and a torch for night. Service is friendly and helpful.

Amazing experience in the cottage!
Nature pure, great staff, great location…
Really recommendable
Cool unique spot if you want to still be close to the town center

We loved our stay at Firefly! The whole property is a work of art. We are used to camping so we found the whole set up pretty comfortable. The cottage is  gorgeous and the staff make sure you feel welcome every step of the way. Bring a flashlight or small lamp in case of power outages!

This place was incredible to say the least Authentic, comfortable, and all around peaceful.
The food was amazing, and the staff was even better I’ll stay here anytime I go to Ubud
Amazing experience, especially fireplace at night)

a great place to stay, it's not a conventional stay so you have to be open about it. it's an experience.

there is no wifi for the villa as its isolated from the main place.

I loved my treehouse...the bamboo ladders are not for everyone but I found it exciting. The staff is amazing. Travel lightly since your arrival will be on motorbike. There is a large pool and restaurant next door as well. The Firefly staff will make motorbike arrangements for you. (Ask for Gus!) The hot water showers were great & be sure to get a massage!
reviews.response: Yes the ladder is definitely something some people complain about but I am reluctant to put in stairs as my childhood self feels like a true treehouse without a bit of a climb but yes please be warned :) We are glad you liked it as we do. :)

reviews.comments: Amazing stay in the cottage! Room was great and very beautiful area - peaceful and serene. Their in-house food and beverages were delicious. The team at Firefly made the entire experience even that much better. Cannot recommend enough!

Try this location when you are near Ubud! It is really unique as you will sleep in the real nature. The cottage is beautifully and the surrounding really quite. You can hear all the insects and animals around you, but don't be scared of them! The whole reception area is also really beautifully, including delicious food, a chill out area and a pool. And there is the chance to get a nice massage in the spa next to it!
The most amazing place !!
Lovely place ! We had an amazing time :)

We had a wonderful stay at Firefly! The location is absolutely stunning and you can get to wherever you want so fast. Felt like a dream. In the evening we had really nice chats with the employees who could tell us a lot about the beautiful Balinese culture. Everyone was so friendly and we were absolutely amazed, this place is an absolute place to be.

Our stay in the firefly cottage was amazing. In the middle of the rice fields in an open bamboo hut we couldn't have wished for a more authentic stay.
Check in was super smooth and the whole lodge was exactly as described. A truly amazing accommodation!

Just perfect and unique. The food and the service are amazing.
Thank you

Can you say Unforgettable!? Coolest place I have ever stayed and truly the best lobby ever. The staff is so helpful in making sure you find their tucked away location. They are located right outside of center city, but it feels like you are in the middle of nowhere (PERFECT). Everything on the property is made of recycled materials and the whole energy is very artistic! There's a bar, a delicious restaurant, a beautiful pool, a swing and some really comfortable seating available 24/7 in the lobby. They also offer incredible messages! Every time we had a pick up, someone was willing to escort us to the front of the property by bike (even at 2am for our sunrise trek!) The most helpful and warm staff. I cant wait to return to the property in the future :)

photos.caption: we have an outdoor firepit, we can organize a bbq around the fire under the stars for you
Custom curved stain glass window looking out from the bathroom
stone bathtub available for everyone to use

primaryHost.about: We are a friendly team that work together to give you the best experience possible. We are happy to help you get settled or to give you tips on good places to see while you are here.

name: Luxury Glass Tiny House - Mountain View + Hot Tub

reviews.comments: We had an amazing time, the view was great and everything was clean. Would highly recommend.

We had a great time in this tiny house! After a long day of skiing this was the perfect place to relax. The hosts prepared of for the tricky driving conditions which were fine, and the house itself was so cute, clean and relaxing. From the rainfall shower head, nespresso machine, hot tub, and diffuser it felt like the zen getaway we needed!
Awesome cabin with beautiful views.  Would love to come back someday!
Brand new house, we had an amazing time. Katie was very accommodating. Heated floor, jacuzzi, amazing view what else I can ask for ? Thank you again for everything!
We had such a great time at the Glass House! Katie and Zachary were so responsive and friendly. Definitely come prepared with extra snacks/games if coming during inclement weather.
one of the best stays we’ve ever had! felt like a resort in the middle of the mountains. everything was great! will absolutely be back!

Great place. Exactly as described! Beautiful views and a peaceful atmosphere! Definitely take their advice and use a 4×4 vehicle especially for people booking it during snowy season! Would definitely stay again!
Unbelievable scenery. Amazing hot tub. Very comfortable bed. Everything you see in the pictures and more. It was an amazing little house with an amazing view while sitting in the hot tub.

Katie’s place was everything that we could have needed and more for our little staycation. Beautiful location and beautiful home. The pictures don’t do it justice.

Be sure to have a vehicle that has 4WD!!!

Katie’s place was the perfect quiet weekend getaway for my husband and I! Anything we needed was supplied and there was nothing better than waking up in the morning to those stunning mountain views!

Katie was extremely responsive and provided a welcome brochure that included great recommendations! I highly recommend staying at Katie’s place!
We came here for our honeymoon! It was even more beautiful in person. Katie and Zach were so helpful throughout our stay. The perfect place to go to relax!

This was the stay and experience myself and my fiancé desired to the “T” Everything was exactly how the owners advertised and more! The tiny home was an experience of a lifetime and I would highly recommend it! On top of that, the owners were extremely responsive and helpful with any questions we had. All in all an amazing worthwhile place to visit, a must see!
Amazing
The house has great views. It’s in a cute small town. The house was beautiful, clean and easy to find.

10/10 must stay airbnb! If you need a place to unwind and relax and love being surrounded by nature, this is the spot! The house is very cute and cozy and borders the state forest so plenty of exploring area too.
Great place. Be ready for a minor issue to find it but it definitely worth it.
reviews.response: Hi Maksym, we’re so sorry to hear that you had a minor issue finding the house. We try our hardest to prevent this by providing detailed directions (both written and a photo) in our House Info, and sending a message to guests requesting that they review the directions prior to their trip. We also send our phone number beforehand so that guests can reach out with any questions should they get lost or have any other issues. We wish we could have helped you avoid this issue, but we’re so glad that you enjoyed your stay overall!

reviews.comments: Everything was fantastic! House has everything you need and an amazing view!
Absolutely amazing stay, beautiful home. We really enjoyed ourselves! Highly recommend staying here for a nice weekend trip or even longer!

We had such a great stay. The tiny home is really well thought out and makes the most of it's size. The views were amazing. We loved relaxing in the hot tub and soaking up the sun on the deck. Katie and Zach were very communicative and attentive hosts. Thanks for making us feel so welcome!  We hope to visit again soon!!
If you are lucky to get availability, just book it. It's a lifetime experience!!

primaryHost.about: We are passionate about travel and the outdoors, and we feel so lucky to live in the beautiful state of Vermont.

reviews.comments: Amazing place to stay. Thanks to the very friendly hosts.
This was definitely not the last time that we went here. The place is a 💎

This was a highlight of our honeymoon. We loved staying here. The host was extremely kind, responsive and understanding. The kitchen was better equipped than our own. The dam was clean, private and great to swim in. We enjoyed how private it was. We hope to return soon!

Beautiful place to stay with amazing views. Very private and great space to relax in, except when you’re dealing with extreme conditions. We had severe rain, a 24hrs power outage, therefore no WiFi and poor cell signal and only two candles and one box of matches to light our first night. When we asked for more candles, we were promised some and none came. On the one hand you feel like, ok we can get through this, it’s fine, on the other hand, our food was getting warm, we had no power and no support. Even with two SA cell phones. We were stuck in extreme weather and would not suggest going there in bad weather!
reviews.response: Hi Laura, shame you really did arrive in a major weather crisis, which made our national news! If I could have moved mountains and changed the weather for you, I would have. But 100's of kms of SA countryside was without power for 24hrs over that night following a major electric storm. We were happy with free cancellation, suggested alternative accommodation, and did all within our power, while also personally managing the storm. The big Magneto floodlight which you were charging your phone on is really bright for the space, and the 2 candles are only for added ambience. The staff did flop dropping more candles and lights off during the daytime, as they accidentally took it to the wrong unit that day, and with all their phones dead, it was a case of broken telephone communication. But we would have gotten them to you before too late. Then the power came on again before 8pm, so we told the staff not to worry further. We had 42 messages between each other over your 38hours in residence.

reviews.comments: Awesome place. So many nice little details, from the cozy terrace to the amazing outdoor bathtub. We never got a chance to swim in the pond but I bet it is great on a hot and sunny day!

The CouplesPod is a must-visit. Surrounded by berry farmland, this pod is a modern and clean getaway. The outdoor bath is a highlight, along with an incredible view of the stars at night. Candice provided us with everything we could have needed and more.
Thank you again and we'll be back in the future.
Beautiful and comfortable , you can’t get a more picturesque spot .

Our stay was amazing. Loved every moment of it. So peacefull out there
The outside bath was our favourite.

What an amazing place! So
Relaxing! Loved every minute of it. Stay was too short… but that was our fault. We will sure be back. First class.

This apartment was simply a dream!

The view was just breathtaking.

The terrace is the perfect place to enjoy the sunrises.

I especially liked the furnishings of the apartment. Uniquely beautiful!!

Candice was super friendly, helpful and always available if I had questions.

Absolute 10/10

Beautiful home, perfect getaway for anyone looking for tranquility and isolation. The hosts are very helpful and responsive when you need something. Everything was perfect, I highly recommend the pod.

The couples pod is heaven on earth, everything is exactly as depicted in the photos. I love the aesthetic, such great attention to detail! Candice is an excellent host, she attended to all our requests/questions prior to check-in which made planning this escape such a breeze. Privacy is guaranteed as the cabin is tucked away and secluded. The indoor fire place is the perfect heater and the lake is ideal for relaxing on tube floaties. Strongly recommend !!

You can not ask for a more awesome break away as a couple.
It was so much more than we expected.
Lovely finishes and the attention to detail was just wonderful.
Highly recommend this beautiful place.

We really enjoyed the couplespod. It offered the right mix of luxury, privacy, relaxation and romance! A perfect place to recharge and enjoy some quality time with your loved one. Candice was a great host, very attentive, responsive and welcoming. I would recommend this stay and hope to return soon.
Amazing break away spot. Highly recommended!
One of the best stays ever! Cute, cozy, stunning views, amazingly kitted, incredible host! Definitely will be back <3

The couplespod was the perfect anniversary getaway. The scenery is breathtaking and the actual pod is beautifully set out for convenience and comfort. We thoroughly enjoyed the views from the pod and it allowed my husband and I to unwind and relax. Would definitely recommend this place for a romantic getaway.

What a fabulous stop for a romantic getaway. The couple's pod is even better in real life. The views are spectacular, and the pod has everything you need. No need to go anywhere but if you are up for some adventuring, there are restaurants, wine farms, walks and bike rides a plenty.

The Pod is a private haven on the farm-dam. You will be sure to see magnificent sunrises and sunsets with the maintains reflecting in the water.
This is the perfect get away for a couple.
Amazing farm getaway, perfect spot to relax and unplug. Great fireplace, good bird life and very private. Take a good book with and enjoy a thoughtfully designed and curated space.

primaryHost.about: From Cape Town South Africa.

name: The Majestic Treehouse romantic, luxury retreat

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our 20th anniversary “disconnected” from society but connected with each other. Beautiful accommodations.

My husband and I loved this magical little treehouse! We had so much fun together and loved all the antiques inside. The outdoor shower was our favorite along with the VIP package really topping it off. We would recommend this place to any couple looking for a fun getaway. Definitely would come back in the future.
Thank you Bolt family!

Great experience and a great stay! It was so relaxing and lovely! There were some black ants which I saw mentioned in other reviews, but since it was raining quite a bit and this is a cabin in the middle of the woods, I don’t think there’s any way to control it. Such an incredible experience!
Absolutely charming treehouse and a wonderful way to truly disconnect! Thank you!

My husband and I stayed here for a night as part of our mini honeymoon. We really enjoyed the walking paths, cuddling in the daybed and listening to the sounds of nature, especially the rain falling through the leaves. It was so peaceful and a great getaway to relax and just talk. We would recommend this stay and come back again.

Amazing getaway treehouse. Seth and Tori thought of everything to make your stay so special. I was worried about getting settled because we arrived after dark after a long drive. However, my fears quickly turned into excitement when we saw the treehouse was all lit up and looked so inviting. The minute we walked in we felt right at home. It was hard to believe we were in a treehouse because it was so clean! Even the outside decks and ladders and ramps were free of debris, webs, dirt, etc. You could really tell they spend a lot of time making the treehouse (and all of its amenities) absolutely perfect (inside and outside). There was no road noise when we were there (saw someone mention that in another review). The acorns falling on the tin roof were not loud enough to warrant ear plugs for us. It was actually peaceful. There was a heavy rainstorm one of the nights and that was very loud on the tin roof but manageable with the provided ear plugs and/or a sound machine. Book it now!

Overall the treehouse was nice on the inside and outside and seemed to have everything you would need. Nicely decorated.
Treehouse is located about a 100 yards off the main road so you can hear car noise throughout the night. A lot of loud reving.
The treehouse is not a secluded as it seems It does face the woods but when leaves are down you can see the main house and neighboring property through the windows.
Woke up the first night to find small ant’s crawling on me and the comforter covered in them. Most were dead but still some crawling around. Apparently they were coming in from the skylight over the bed. Owners were aware from guest prior to us and informed us the following day after our arrival but would have been nice to know before arriving and not having a great nights sleep for 2 nights. Probably would have made other arrangements and rescheduled when it was taken care of.

Easy to find off their driveway not far from the road. Wagon to easily bring all our things to the treehouse. Beautiful treehouse with so many extra touches! Slippers, robes, shower shoes plus all the sweet decor.
Small fridge with freezer plus a full cooler with ice kept our food cold. Pizza oven, grill and toaster to cook our food. Basic utensils etc provided. We brought paper products to avoid doing dishes. Plenty of wooded property to take walks. Played the game Shut the box for the first time and became addicted. So many areas to relax in and around the treehouse. The outdoors lighting was lovely and on timers. We always had hot water in the bathroom and shower.
Hosts communication excellent and replied to our messages and concern.
We had a relaxing rejuvenating time.
After checkout we went to Stumphouse Tunnel/Park. Isaqueena Falls and Yellow Falls trail. Also highly recommend but Yellow Falls Trail is an arduous 45 min hike to the falls and 45 min hike back.
We enjoyed our stay at the treehouse.  The experience was relaxing and forced us to disconnect from the real world.

Everything at Bolt Farm is always great, and Walhalla is no different!  We had a wonderful time. We really enjoyed all the amenities of the Tree House, but our favorites were the covered outdoor cooking area with the space heater and the bed beneath the treehouse. Can’t wait for what Seth, Tori and the whole Bolt Farm team does next!

Such a lovely experience. I've thought about doing this for years, we flew in from Utah just for this.

I do feel like the additional $200 for the VIP experience was pricey, but other than that, a wonderful stay.
Loved this magical spot! Just wish the tree house was farther from the road. Overall an amazing experience.
Exceptional stay at the majestic treehouse! A gorgeous treehouse with great views of an exquisite piece of property!
Wonderful experience! Would highly recommend getting this spot on your books!

Such an amazing dreamy space to stay in. Felt right out of a movie. Nice and clean, well designed, bbq, pizza oven, outdoor shower for two. Bathrobes, slippers, record player and many many many other details that you can’t even imagine. Would highly recommend staying at this place and create memories!

If you see availability on this calendar, don't hesitate; book right away! I don't know how it's possible, but as amazing as the photos are on the site, it's still quite breathtaking to experience in person. They have thought of everything. I highly recommend taking advantage of the VIP package as this heightens the whole experience. There's no way that you will be disappointed. It's a dream come true. An amazing way to spend your birthday!

Everything was perfect and amazing. The bed was so comfortable and the room was perfectly toasty since it is 43 degrees. There’s hot water and the vinyl disc player was a plus. I got the VIP experience where we could make our own pizza and a bottle of wine which was a lot of fun to do together. Overall, we can’t wait to come back and check their other locations. Thank you guys so much.

The TREEEHOUSE of DREAMS,
It was so great to just get away and reconnect with 'the one your soul loves'. My husband and I had a great time at this beautiful place. While it felt a little odd walking up and seeing this rustic cabin, my husband actually was very freaked out. He completely was underwhelmed as we drove up. He thought, 'What did my wife get us into!' While I saw the pictures online, I too thought-' Holy Moly... What is this!?' But when walking up, we were elated!! ITs so beautiful. This was amazing. The outdoor shower was amazing- HOT HOT Water!! The Cabin was so clean and no bugs, I only saw one little beetle. Which I appreciate because I HATE BUGS. I know crazy right? Why would I go to a TREEHOUSE. Well, because it was so romantic and isolated. We felt like we were the only people around. Like an Adam and Eve experience without the snake. Thank you so much Seth and Tori!
Thanks for making a place for couple to connect.

Exceptional stay! Such a cool experience for any occasion…would recommend everyone to stay in a treehouse at least once! It was so beautiful, and  all the thought and details put into the guests stay was above and beyond! It was a little less secluded than we expected, but we still had privacy and had no problems. We would definitely come back!

primaryHost.about:
Creating one-of-a-kind, inspiring spaces for our guests is our life's passion. 
We honeymooned in The Majestic Treehouse in Walhalla – the treehouse Seth built with his dad. And since then, we've continued to build treehouses and domes in other beautiful nature settings across the USA. 

Check out our treehouses on Netflix's "The World's Most Amazing Vacation Rentals" and on Chip & Joanna Gaines' Magnolia Network!

We love traveling the world with Airbnb! Our goal as 27x Superhosts is for everyone who visits one of our places to feel like they're finally home. One of our biggest joys in life is creating unforgettable experiences for people and helping them rest & connect!

name: Young Wild & TREE(HOUSE) private hot tub

reviews.comments: Our stay was perfect! The treehouse was gorgeous and the indoor space was too. The sunroom and skylight let in the perfect amount of sun during the day. Everything was clean and the indoor space smelled amazing. We will definitely be back!

A great stay! My only thing is bring ice and know there’s no full kitchen. Maybe that was somewhere I didn’t read. Beautiful property. Though you have a private bathroom it’s still in a community space to walk through. Ok verano we enjoyed our stay though!
This was easily the coolest airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. The wood fire heated hot tub was so awesome! It’s in the middle of a neighborhood, but feels like you’re somewhere in the mountains.

The place was nice, but missing pots and pans, anyway to cook anything. There was an outdoor grill but no propane. Contacted the host and no reply so had to order food in and spend more money. Had high hopes for this place but it fell a little short.

I took my Fiancé here for her birthday and we loved every minute of it. To be honest, I should’ve stayed longer. I was truly at peace here and I recommend this place to anyone who wants to make a nice getaway special!
Cool

Great place! My fiancé and I went to celebrate our anniversary and it was everything I had hoped for. The house was a nice distance from the road and even though there were others staying in neighboring units, privacy wasn’t an issue. The amenities really made for a great experience. The unit we stayed in (unit 7) was beautiful. The owner was informative and respectful. Our busy schedule only allowed us to stay for a night, but that was all we needed. Our private chef, Michele, was delightful. My fiancé and I both agree that we like a softer bed than the one provided. All in all our anniversary was thoroughly enjoyable and this place helped make that possible. I certainly hope to stay here again for longer than just one night.
The atlanta treehouse is a superb getaway adventure. Theres nothing quite like it. Cant wait to visit again and explore the additional ammenities and features.
10/10 recommend! The host was extremely helpful and the BnB itself was clean, cozy, and so much fun! Also such a fun hottub! We would love to come back!
Amazing spot! simply beautiful
Beautiful property. Get the private dinner, it was delicious!
Young, wild, and treehouse #7 is the perfect retreat! The space is so tranquil from the moment you walk through the door to exploring the treehouse. Highly recommend the 60-minute massage.
Very beautiful, very cozy, great location, very quiet, and very private…cleanliness was awesome… weekend stay is a must.
Absolutely and undeniably the best honeymoon and vacation I have ever had. My husband and I had the most relaxing and romantic time. This place is very unique and so lovely.
My son and his wife stayed here for their honeymoon!  Loved the hot tub and on-site dinner prepared for them.   Thank you for making it such a memorable experience!

Such a cool space! The treehouse is really just an added bonus to the beautiful inside space. So much natural light and the home is nestled in a private wooded area, but really just off the beaten path of the hustle and bustle of the big city. We dipped in the hot tub on the cool night that we were there, and slept sooo comfortably in the nice DARK room! One of the few times I actually slept really well in a an Airbnb! The bathroom being detached in a somewhat shared space is a little awkward, but it was fine. We really enjoyed our stay overall. Wish we had one more night!

Everything was absolutely stunning! You are pretty close to other Airbnbs, and your bathroom is separated, so just be prepared for that. But other than that we absolutely loved this space!! It was so much fun and really cool to take pictures in! It’s also fairly close to downtown if you’re interested in shopping. The host was extremely responsive and helped us with whatever we needed during our stay. Great experience and would recommend it for anyone!
Great stay!
The space was beautiful. My husband and I had a great time and loved the ambiance. We also booked the private dinner and it did not disappoint. Highly recommend. I wish I lived there.
Great choice! Spot on with the description.

primaryHost.about:
Patrice

I am from the "big easy" (New Orleans, LA) but was raised in New York. I am a oncology registered nurse / pharmaceutical sale rep. and I'm extremely passionate about helping others.  I am the mother of 2 beautiful girls I love working out, and watching and participating in all sports. I am well traveled and have visited various countries with many more in my radar. My guilty pleasures: watching reality shows and gardening! :)  


Darrel 

I am originally from Jamaica, but grew up in Connecticut. I am a disabled combat veteran and served in Afghanistan in 2010.  My family and I moved to Atlanta in 2014. I love to travel and I am a aspiring chef. I like to work out, run, hike, outdoor activities and entertaining guest. My wife calls me a nerd because I love jeopardy and am filled with useless knowledge.

name: Barn Stay in a Hedge Maze free-range Chicken Farm
address: Tambon Khao Hin Son, Chang Wat Chachoengsao, Thailand

reviews.comments:
The place is peaceful, the staff is so sweet and kind. and they have the little guide there.

Thank you for taking care of us :)

The place is away from attractions. But the farm has everything i needed. The activities was feeding the hen, picking eggs, walk around the farm. The atmosphere was very nice, fresh air and very cool in evening and morning. The Sunrise was beautiful, can view from the bed. We will definitely come back!

The place is just a quick drive away from Bangkok.
It was surprising that the room is hidden in a fertilizer warehouse!
The space is nicely decorated and super cozy. We really felt at home.

Taking a tour around the farm and learn about its operation is a real pleasure.
The farm's staff has a lot of interesting stories to share.

We thought the chickens were hostile as the whole pack rushed towards us and made a lot of noise! Turned out they were only hungry because we arrived before feeding time 😂

The food was great. Nothing beats a simple recipe made with fresh ingredients. We bought a pack of eggs as a souvenir 😁

It was a pleasure and great experience to stay at Nathan Farm. Just about 2 hour driving from Bangkok. The place is safe, newly renovated and clean. Pop, Nut and staff were the excellent hosts. They went above and beyond, for example taking us around the farm and explaining everything, they even prepared breakfast for us even though it wasn't included. The farm experience is also amazing. We get to learn more about local agriculture which is very interesting (especially a group of hens in the maze!) This place is highly recommended if you want to spend your holidays with your family and experience the authentic organic farm stay in Thailand.

It was our first time doing farm stay. It was fun and eye-opening. Would recommend anyone who enjoys learning about farming and wants to have a quick getaway from Bangkok.

The host family were warm-welcoming as they guided us through their farm.

💛💛💛💛💛

ที่พัก airbnb "ฟาร์มไก่ในเขาวงกต"🐔🐓🌳
🏠 Entire space เป็นของเรา
ตั้งแต่พื้นที่ทำอาหารอย่างกับคาเฟ่ ห้องนอน minimal แต่วิวดีงามมาก และระเบียงชมวิวกว้างขวาง พร้อมวิวเขาวงกตน้องไก่ สวนหลังบ้านมีสนามหญ้าให้เด็กๆวิ่งเล่น และมีประตูเชื่อมต่ออาณาจักรไก่
🌳 พื้นที่รอบๆ เด็กๆวิ่งเล่นได้ มีบ่อปลา บ่อเป็ด ไก่ ห่าน ฟาร์มไส้เดือน แปลงผัก และนาข้าว
👩‍👧‍👧Host พาเดินแนะนำ เล่าเรื่องราวของฟาร์มให้เราฟัง และมีไกด์ประจำไร่ ป้าก้อย น้องแก้ว และเจ้าสอง หมาดูแลไร่ เป็นคนพาเดินให้อาหารไก่ และเก็บไข่ไก่ มีรอบเวลาที่เขาจะพาเราไป
🙂 โดยรวมชอบนะคะ แนะนำครอบครัวมีเด็กๆ พามาทำกิจกรรม ไม่ไกลจากกทม.
👍เด็กๆ มีที่วิ่งเล่น ได้ขี่จักรยานด้วย เด็กๆชอบเก็บไข่ และบอกอยากไปฟาร์มอีก 🌞👍
👩‍👧‍👧พี่ๆที่ไร่ ดูแล ช่วยเหลือ อย่างดี

localizedReview.comments:
airbnb residence "Maze chicken farm"
🐔🐓🌳🏠 Our entire space is yours.
From the cooking space like a cafe, the bedrooms are minimal, but the view is spectacular and the expansive viewing terrace with a keen view. The backyard has a lawn for the kids to run around and has a connecting door to the chicken every day.
🌳 The area around the kids can run around, including a fish pond, a pond, a ducks, goose, farm, vegetable conversion, and rice paddies.
👩‍👧‍👧Hosts provide us a guided tour guide to tell us the story of the farm, and we have a long guide to the farm, auntie Kaew and two dogs day in which they walk, feed the chicken, and pick up the eggs. There's time for him to take us.
🙂 All I loved it, introduced the family to have kids for activities not far from BKK.
👍The kids have a place to run around, ride bicycles too, kids like to pick their eggs and go to the farm again.
The 🌞👍👩‍👧‍👧brothers are very helpful at the ranch.

I love Nathan Farm. The place was really amazing. This is my first experience to stay at BarnStay. My mom, sis and I absolutely enjoyed the time there. Our hosts have many mini farm inside the properties from rice field, barn, duck, hen, organic veggie. However, my highlight would be to see all the hens ran in the maze!! Hens are super cute!! Totally love them.

The communication with hosts are great. Thank you for all the tips and neighbourhood recommendation :) Totally recommend for people to experience barnstay that is not too far from BKK!

localizedReview.comments:
It's only 2 hrs. Thank you for your lovely Host, Popnut, Sis, and your auntie for a lovely time at Nathan Farm. 🐔

But there is also a lot of small farms to learn: rice fields and barns, fish ponds, ducks, meat and eggs, dumpling malls, organic vegetable gardens, and more importantly, a Happy Hen with a labyrinth, jogging in the labyrinth.

I would definitely visit again if

I love Nathan Farm. The place was really amazing. This is my first experience to stay at BarnStay. My mom, sis and I absolutely enjoyed the time there. Our hosts have many mini farm inside the properties from rice field, barn, duck, hen, organic veggie. However, my highlight would be to see all the hens ran in the maze!! Hens are super cute!! Totally love them.

The communication with hosts are great. Thank you for all the tips and neighbourhood recommendation :) Totally recommend for people to experience barnstay that is not too far from BKK!

primaryHost.about: We both were born and raised in Bangkok. Yet, we never run out of places to explore or things to do. Yes, this busy city has been keeping us busy :) Our house gives you a great access to many cool parts of the town. The riverfront is an easy 20 minute taxi ride away. From here, you can take a long-tail boat to old-town area and the Grand Palace. Bangkok's biggest park, Lumpini, is 2 train stations away. Morning jog or evening sunset watching here is never a bad idea. Sound inviting enough? We hope you will LOVE Bangkok as much as we do!

reviews.comments: We loved our stay in the Owl House! The staff were so friendly and helpful. They gave us a special welcome as it was our honeymoon. The house itself is lovely. It felt like such a novelty to stay there! We opted to have the romantic dinner and the set up, meal, and service was great. They catered well for vegetarians. Would definitely stay again if we have the opportunity!
Great stay. Enjoyed the service and ambience.
Such a unique and lovely stay. The team were super helpful in making the stay extra special. Thankyou - highly recommend this stay

We absolutely enjoyed and love every minute of our stay in the Owl House. My expectations were exceeded and we were well looked after. Thank you so much to Gede, Surya and the rest of the team for making our stay memorable!

If you want to rough it up a bit and unplug from the busier sides of Bali, this is the place for it! The views are unbeatable and the staff is absolutely wonderful! They will work with you night and day to make sure you’re happy! The bamboo house is stunning and as comfortable as can be, given the fact it’s in a quite remote location. We recommend working with the amazing staff to plan tours to Pura Lempuyang, Tirta Gangga, rice paddies, and waterfalls. The subcontracted massage therapists are also wonderful and work with really good rates. Due to the remoteness of the location, Wi-Fi may be spotty. Make sure to take advantage of the mornings, as it rains pretty consistently in the afternoons during wet season in this side of Bali.

What a unique and beauitful stay in Sidemen!
It is quite breathtaking the view and the villa itself. All the detail of the bamboo villa are quite spectacular and make it extremely special.
The staff at Veluvana were so lovely and responsive and really made the trip.
Although quite remote, the property has an onsite kitchen which you can order any meal.
We opt'd for the Romantic Dinner on our first night, which was stunning with flower display and candles, along with a 3 course meal.
Only cirticism I will say is that there are a few workers in the rice fields, so its not always completely private. With the villa being quite open, it didn't always feel completely private. Within saying that they were always quite respectful and never looking in.
Again, with other villas on the property, there was an incident with our neighbours using drones at 7AM in the morning. Once reported the team asked them to stop. Overall a magical and beautifu stay!
Very good place

stayed here for our honeymoon and it was the most amazing stay.
very helpful and lovely staff, great recommendations, helpful and respectful of privacy.
the house is stunning. very unique and very comfortable.

loved everything about it. will come and stay again
Great place

Veluvana is incredible. We stayed here for 5 nights for the first part of our honeymoon and it was perfect. The bamboo house is breathtaking and the team at Veluvana were so helpful and accommodating, we couldn’t have had a more amazing stay. Sidemen is also such an amazing area full of local culture and there’s so much around to see/do. HIGHLY recommend!

We had an exceptional time at Veluvana. The staff are so kind and caring, tending to your every need. As well as staying in such a beautiful property, you can choose extra services including transport, romantic dinner and flower pool which add to the experience and ease of staying there.
Our stay was amazing. We love everything about it! The views were incredible and the staff were so kind. Already planning another stay with them next year!!

Words cannot describe how amazing this villa is. I didn’t think it could be better than the pictures, but it exceeded every expectation! The Veluvana staff is amazing in every way and Sideman is the perfect location for those looking to experience the beauty of Bali away from crowds. This is by far the most beautiful place we’ve ever stayed.
Everyone at Veluvana was great! The staff was so accommodating!

If you’re looking for a peaceful getaway, I really strongly recommend Veluvana. Everyone who works here is amazing and goes out of their way to make sure your stay is as memorable as possible. The views are unbelievable, the food is great, and the town is quiet and off the beaten path. 10/10 would highly recommend to anyone.

WOW… what a beautiful unique villa, set in a stunning location, right in the middle of the rice fields with nature all around you (you can certainly hear the frogs and crickets on a night as well as the resident gecko if you are lucky!) The staff go above and beyond to make sure your stay is special, yet respectful of your privacy… Loads of lovely restaurants within walking distance however the food at the villa is also fantastic.. breakfast pancakes are a must as well as the local fruits .. Gede kindly got us different local fruit from the market to try at breakfast .. Terima kasih !!

I wish I could give 6 stars. We stayed in the Owl House and it was better than we imagined. What really made our Honeymoon there special was the attention to detail and how much the staff made sure we were comfortable and happy. The best hosts we have ever experienced! Will be back :)

We absolutely loved our stay here, by far one of the most beautiful villas we have visited with the most amazing views of Mount Agung. Not only was the accommodation amazing, Gede the manager was so lovely, he was so happy and dedicated to his job and his happiness and enthusiasm was contagious. We booked the romantic dinner for two and Gede personally looked after us during this experience, serving us our food and making us laugh and smile throughout the night. Gede so kind and willing to go the extra mile for us, he even offered to go to the local market before we checked out at 6am just so we could try the local Indonesian fruit such as Snake Fruit but it rained Heavily so the market did not open (thank you Gede we managed to try some later on in our trip). 10/10 service and 10/10 accommodation.

This lives up to the pictures and experience. My wife and I came here for our honeymoon and couldn't have asked for a better stay. The whole staff was very attentive and responsive to any questions or requests we made. The view was amazing waking up to every morning and you were completely immersed in nature the whole time. Bugs were never an issue, especially with the net over the bed. Highly recommend this for anyone visiting Sideman or Bali in general.
Stunning and very special location! Absolutely worth to stay at least 1 or 2 nights :)
Unique experience!

For the more adventurous, we are staying 2-nights in Caldera at a nature preserve. We are in a Treehouse at El Rio Encantado. The kitchen and shower is on the ground floor. Absolutely no words for this experience!

First let me start out by saying this property is absolutely gorgeous. The pool is great and staying in a treehouse was a great experience. I would’ve given it five stars except the quality of the bed was very poor.
Really beautiful location and the team are wonderful.  I was underprepared for the insects. Would recommend bringing plenty of insect repellent.

We enjoyed our stay in the treehouse. This is a unique and extraordinary accommodation if you really want to get a connection to the nature and its sounds. You have a kitchen for yourself where you can cook under the sky with the sounds of the Caldera River.

Our stay was magnificent, it was much more than what we expected. The pictures don't do it justice, when you come over the little hill and see the treehouse for the first time, your jaw drops.
The Treehouse was very clean, the linen and towels perfect. We brought our own mosquito net, but we didn't need it, as yours was perfect.
The outdoor kitchen was perfect for our cooking needs.
The shower had hot water, and having it downstairs is perfect for showering after enjoying hicking and river. The pool was refreshing and great for exercise.
I will warn people who don't know, it gets windy sometimes, and the Treehouse will shake a bit, that is normal.
The great ingeneering that went into the build will keep you perfectly safe.
Download some good books over by the pool area, so that you can read when off line in the treehouse.
Our Valentines was perfect here.
Thank you, Jose
We had a fantastic time!  A truly one of a kind experience!  Frank was a great host with lots of stories to share.  It is a fantastic spot to get away!  We can’t wait to come back!

Love this place, the nature, the energy.
Just amazing.

Everything was just awesome!
Unique place in the middle of beautiful nature!
Just love for this place ❤️

Our experience was an unforgettable one. The property is breathtaking, the tree house is unique and one of a kind, the details and hard work put into the land is outstanding, the amenities are great, the river and trails must be swam in and explored. If you have the opportunity to stay here, do it.

They have a pool, people on site with a bar to make drinks and really so much to do. We wish we had more time! If you have the opportunity to meet Frank, be sure to chat with him. He’s full of great stories and insight.

Thank you again!
100% recommendable! Frank is an amazing host and has a whole bunch of exciting personal anecdotes to share with the guests :)

What a privilege and pleasure to stay at one of the most unique places we have ever experienced. Thanks for your hospitality and sharing your passions with us. Until we meet again. Highly recommend this place to the wild at heart, open minded and free spirited. And well, if you do not find your inner self, true happiness and peace in this beautiful place...then good luck 😘
Jose was a great host. He recommended us a few restaurants in the area. Joel was really amazing. He made our experience outstanding!! If we come back it would be because of him!! Thanks!!
Perfect tree house experience.everything was perfect!

If you’re searching for some
Tranquility and serenity this is your spot.
If you are looking for a “tree-house” experience this was a very interesting locale. Especially recommended for bird watchers/lovers.
It was so beautiful we decided to stay another night. Ideal if you want to relax;  watch the birds and swim in the river. Great place!
reviews.response:
thanks

was a pleasure to have you as guests

greetings

Jose

reviews.comments: If you think the picture of the tree house is incredible, you will be even more impressed when you see it in person. To be able to stay in a tree house is such an incredible experience, and to make it even better you can hear and see the river that's right next to it. You are surrounded by trees, you connect with nature. I highly recommend this very unique space for anyone who wants to experience nature to the fullest.
it was just amazing, the only thing is, we couldnt hear the birds coz of the noise from the river. but i mean it the nature:))

Fantastic stay and absolutely unique experience staying in the tree house. Place was spotlessly clean even though every thing is outdoors. Were there in torrential thunderstorm and river rose significantly but no flooding and tree house stayed mostly dry. Splendid wild life. Saw many birds including many kingfishers plus 2 otters in the river. Grounds, garden and pool are meticulously maintained. Were not too many mosquitoes and bugs when we were there. Not for those who need nighttime accommodation with doors and windows or who are afraid of the outdoors

name: Bumble Barn at Great Field Farm

reviews.comments: The perfect spot to spend Christmas with the family. Being all on one floor, it was ideal for small children - and it felt really spacious. Everything was super comfortable and there was beautiful scenery and great local walks. The barn was really well stocked and really modern which we loved. I would highly recommend this beautiful barn to everyone
We absolutely loved our stay and would love to come back again!
Stunning location, wouldn’t hesitate to go back

Really lovely accommodation with great views in a tranquil setting.
The host is very friendly and check in and out was very straight forward.

A fab stay in an idyllic location. Great for celebrating my friend’s BIG birthday. Went for a beautiful walk around the perimeter of Lympne Safari, great lunch at The Five Bells, Brabourne, and memorable evening at The Pig at Bridge Place.
Very worthy of 5 stars. Lewana was a fantastic, responsive host and Bumble Barn outdid all our expectations. Immaculate, beautiful, convenient, beyond cool and eco friendly. Loved it!
Great place

We had a fantastic time at the Eco barn. It was easy to find and in a stunning setting - so peaceful. The rooms are surprisingly spacious and the kitchen is well stocked with everything you need. Would really recommend a stay here.
Lovely and unusual place to stay. Very clean and comfortable.  Host is very welcoming.

Incredible stay - lovely, clean and has all the amenities. We stayed for the weekend and explored around Kent. Highly recommend for anybody in a group or family visiting Kent. Wonderful hosts who also were flexible on check-in and checkout.

The Bumble Barn was a really fantastic place to stay in a really great location perfect for exploring the surrounding area. The barn was furnished to a high level, extremely comfortable and our few days away felt very special - my young children loved it, especially seeing the horses out in the field right next to the front door. Thank you Lewana for a great stay.
This barn is just stunning and so clean and tidy. We visited for a friends 40th and it couldn’t of felt any more special. It was a truly unique space.
Lovely stay, great location and bumble bee lodge was beautiful. Would definitely recommend to friends and family

From the moment you arrive, the laidback ambiance of this farm becomes apparent.

After a brief introduction about our eco property, and when you realised that yes you can actually see the horses and chickens she keeps on site at your leisure (making the stay even more fun for our young child), you easily settle into a well kept, clean and easy to use staycation sanctuary. There is a helpful guide inside the property for all your needs and even advice on where to go, walks available and places to eat and see.

Without having to worry about any heating as example, as quite literally the technology looks after the property, this spacious retreat boasts views over the fields to watch the sunset. It’s remote location is superb positioned if you want to head to Canterbury or Port Lympne as example, but also realising we can hit most of Kent’s coasts within 30mins drive, made us want to explore more of the county through the winding lanes that is dubbed the Gardens of England.

An effortless stay, we have already recommended!
Great host and nice place to stay with kids and family

A unique stay, spotlessly clean, everything thought about from soft towels, fur blankets, well stocked kitchen and toy boxes. Lewana had good communication throughout and gave us some great tips in terms of day trips. Thoroughly recommend
Great place and Great Stay!
What an exceptional house. The place was fantastic and extremely clean.

We really enjoyed our summer weekend at Bumble Barn. The eco-friendly barn was stylish, very comfortable, and sparkling clean and we were made to feel very welcome. Our kids loved meeting the chickens and horses and playing with the toys. Thanks!
What a amazing place to stay.  All the little thoughtful details were there. Set in a beautiful surrounding. A amazing place for a little get away.We will be staying again
