name: Casona Sforza, Hot Tub Master Suite 5

reviews.comments: It is truly as beautiful as it looks, and the staff was very kind. The location is quiet and lounging by the beach in the hammocks was the highlight. However, the food isn’t very good and it’s not close enough to things to walk for other food. We were very disappointed that they didn’t let us know there would be loud construction on the back of our room until we arrived, much too late to change any of our plans at that point. It would be worth checking in with them to confirm that renovations or construction won’t be happening when you book, because it really hampered our ability to relax. Can’t say we would stay again.
reviews.response:
Jonathon, we really apreciatte your comment.
We are really sorry we couldn't comfort your expectations. We are doing some modifications in the building but that one it wasn't arranged at the moment you reserved the room.
We promise getting better day by day, and we truly thank you for being sincere with us.
Anyway, we hope to see you again.

reviews.comments: The best hotel in Puerto Escondido! Amazing design, great food and incredible staff. Highly recommend

photos.caption: Contempla el atardecer desde tu tina con agua caliente.
Confortable cama King Size con colchón ortopédico, almohadas de pluma de ganso, sabanas de algodón egipcio de 400 hilos.
Café Orgánico de nuestra finca Pueblo del Sol.
Piscina ecológica de agua salada, espacio común que podrán compartir con otros huéspedes.

Ubicada a unos pasos de la brisa del mar, esta casa boutique fue diseñada por el arquitecto Alberto Kalach con la conciencia de integrarse a su entorno compuesto de arena blanca, agua, sol y vegetación endémica.

Nuestras sala, espacio común donde podrás disfrutar de los mágicos atardeceres que solo Puerto Escondido te ofrece deleitando tu  paladar con un rico café orgánico de nuestra finca o un esquicito Cocktail que nuestro barman te podrá preparar.
Déjate consentir con la sazón de nuestro Chef que usa productos frescos y de productores locales.

It was a very thin quilt like cover.
Everything else was perfect! Steve did an amazi g job building it and we would stay again!

reviews.comments: Steve is a incredible host! Conscientious, incredibly thoughtful, answers immediately, great communicator, and resource. The silo is completely enchanting and set with amazing views. Would def go back!!
reviews.response: Thanks again Kay

reviews.comments: This Silo was incredible. It was more of an experience and added to our trip immensely. 360 view was beautiful with the open wheat fields and snow capped mountains behind. Honey was the sweetest greeter along with Steve’s horses that you can feed! Steve was a wonderful host and promptly replied to all of my questions. The silo was clean, nice decor with personal touches. Steve was so thoughtful in making this place special. We will be back!!

reviews.comments:
We loved the little silo! It was the perfect place to begin our honeymoon in Montana.
You can’t beat the privacy, views and hospitality!
The only thing wrong was we couldn’t stay longer!

reviews.comments: Delightful! It rained one night and the sounds were magical. Highly recommended.

Honey's Place is truly a hidden gem. After a long day exploring Glacier National Park it was the perfect one night stop before my drive home.  Out in the middle of a field, you are surrounded by deer playing in the grass at sunset. It was magical. The silo is well stocked in the kitchen and bathroom. I wish I had more time to stay and enjoy the property. Bring apples or carrots for the horses! I will definitely be back!
reviews.response:
Kayla
Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I appreciate it sincerely Steve

reviews.comments: Second time staying at this location. Surely won’t be the last. Beautiful views all around.
reviews.response: Thanks again!!!

reviews.comments: Absolutely LOVED this spot. Beautiful views and such a cozy and comforting little spot to stay in. Had a perfect stay here, and highly recommend it to anyone passing through. Steve and Honey were great hosts!

Thanks again Maya
Loved having you spend some time at my place
Steve

reviews.comments: What a great experience! This cozy silo has everything you could ever need! Upon arrival we were greeted by Honey herself! Such a relaxing environment with all the amenities. I can’t recommend this place enough.

reviews.comments: Easily one of the best Airbnb stays I've had. From beginning to end, the host was communicative. The property itself is incredible and well designed. We sat on the deck and watched the sunset & came out later to see the stars. Us city folk don't get those views enough. I'd highly suggest this property anytime, to anyone.
reviews.response:
Jeremiah
Thanks again for the awesome review!!
Steve

reviews.comments: The silo is awesome! Very unique, cozy, and a very private setting. Nice location for viewing incredible Montana sunrises and sunsets. I would book this location again in a heartbeat!
reviews.response:
Thank you again Peggy!
Steve

reviews.comments: Honeys silo is a wonderful stay. I would rate it higher than 5 stars if I could. I ended up cancelling our st Mary tiny house reservation to stay here 3 nights and I’m so happy we did! We enjoyed being more secluded and on the edge of the park. The solo sits on the edge of the property and the deck is perfect for glassing for animals as the sun sets. We saw countless amounts of deer, pheasants and grouse. The silo is very well done. It was nice and warm, had a hot shower and full kitchen for heating up our meals. The bed was comfy and a Mountain View out every window. There is construction on hwy 206 so we took a parallel road and ended up seeing a elk herd. I highly recommend staying here! We hope to return!
reviews.response: Thanks again. Would love to have you return. Steve

reviews.comments: Awesome stay in a well done silo in the middle of farm land. It is quiet, clean and comfortable but close enough to town for amenities. Great place!

reviews.comments: Steve has thought of everything in his charming, cozy silo.  We can’t wait to come back!
reviews.response:

reviews.comments:
Such a unique little
Get away! Remote enough to enjoy the scenery, but close to town and things to explore. Thanks Steve!
reviews.response: Thank you so much!

reviews.comments: This is an absolute gem!!!  Tons of wildlife (saw a fawn, 3 large bucks, several does and sandhill cranes). Place is super cute, very quiet, incredibly comfortable and conveniently located.  I highly recommend staying here for a wonderful and unique experience!
reviews.response:
Kelli
Thank you so much for the awesome review!!

reviews.comments: Great place! Enjoyed the views and the animals! The silo was amazing! We will be back!
reviews.response:
Thank you
Steve

reviews.comments:
I honestly don’t even know where to start. Staying at the silo was truly an “experience”
From the minute we pulled up I knew we were going to love it. It is everything it says it is…and more! It went too quick, and we didn’t make the time to meet Honey…those are my two complaints. Now something I’d like to mention is if you stay, step outside on the porch upstairs in the middle of the night, and just look around…the stars are amazing :)
Also, we enjoyed just sitting in the afternoon and watching the deer play in the field. There is also a hawk in the tree nearby that I enjoyed watching. Steve was an exceptional host! He answered any questions we had with a quick response. We thank you for our visit!!!!! It was perfect!
reviews.response:
Fantastic!!
It makes me happy to hear stories like this. I certainly appreciate you staying here. I hope you can return again someday. Thanks again steve
Thanks

name: Cow Shed: Daisy at Easton Farm Park

reviews.comments: We had a great time. The cowshed is small but had everything we needed with good bathroom facilities just a short walk. Our 8 and 6 year old liked sleeping up in the ‘bunk’. Having access to the farm each day included,  was a massive bonus for us as the kids enjoyed feeding the animals, playing in the various play areas and the train and beetle rides!  We’d definitely return.
Very cosy and everything was as described

Very cute and clean cow shed. Great that we had use of the family room, which included a bath for the kids. The entrance to the farm is included every day of the stay. We had a camp fire both nights, with s’mores and had a barbecue last night too. We will definitely be coming back ☺️
we had a great time staying in Daisy. lovely staff and facilities with unlimited entry to the park we had a great time. thank you.
Lovely stay, great value for money. We will definitely be coming again.

Loved it so much stayed an extra night!
Brilliantly said up for children with the being next to the farm - staff friendly and helpful.
Beds really comfortable and overly clean and tidy.
Had a great time. Highly recommend
Absolutely loved the Cowsheds - the kids gasped when they saw them and they are brilliantly designed with lots of lovely touches. A great way to kick off the bank holiday - would definitely return.

We had a great stay in Daisy.  The farm to which you have access had so many activities and things to do it filled a day.  The shed was clean and sufficient amenities included.  Close walk to showers and toilets too.

My 5 year old daughter and I had a wonderful time during our stay in Daisy the cowshed. The cowshed was clean and the linen, towels and kettle were really helpful to have. The site facilities were good and the access to the park farm was great for children. We really enjoyed our stay and would certainly return.

Fabulous weekend in Daisy. The two bunks were plenty big enough for me and my 3 children who had an amazing time on the farm each day. Communication was great and even though we arrived late we had no problem finding Daisy or getting inside. Daisy was the most shaded of the cow sheds and although the weather was hot, it stayed nice and cool inside. The hammock and tea bags and milk were a lovely touch. We are already planning our return!

If we could give it more stars, we would!

We stayed in “Daisy” the cow shed (or cowavan as our little one called it) and it was fantastic.

The beds are so comfortable, enough space for the three of us and our pup too. So clean as were the showers etc, and we even had a BBQ and utensils.

Beautiful location and not too far from us which was great. Everyone on the farm was so friendly and approachable, we were a little confused when we initially arrived but it was dealt with really quickly and set the tone for how relaxed our next few days was going to be.

The fact we also got entry to the farm was amazing. We have been on a lot of day trips and farm visits but this was by far the most child friendly and we couldn’t even fit all of the activities into one day!

I could go on, but I think I’ve said most of what I wanted to!

We will definitely be backs to stay at Daisy and to camp too.

We had a great stay in the Daisy cow shed. It was really good fun. My 4yo LOVED it. We especially liked the free access to the farm park and the fab facilities block.

Daisy has lots of very handy sockets. I wasn’t expecting this and was happily surprised.

We’d love to return again in the future and maybe book two cows so that more family members can join us.
Beautifully furnished cow shed, extremely comfortable bed!

Great little cabins, perfect for a couple or small family. Kids loved the access to all the animals, the large play area and the fun wagon rides.
Cafe is okay, not amazing quality but certainly sufficient and does the job. Shared bathroom are kept nice and clean and bonus points for the family bathroom that comes with a bath (great if you have very little kids)
Location is lovely and rural, 10mins from a Coop, a decent chippy and an Indian take out. We drove the 20mins to Aldeburgh beach and it was well worth a day out.
An absolutely beautiful location. My kids and I had a wonderful stay.

The cow shed is absolutely delightful. It’s comfortable, quirky and has everything you could need. The campsite facilities were clean and well maintained. I would not recommend the food in the farm but you can bbq by your cow. You are unable to go into the farm out of hours as described. Overall, we had a really lovely stay

We had a lovely couple of nights in Daisy. The kids loved the hammock out the front, and the access to the farm with all the cute animals and fantastic playground. The caravan is small, but didn't feel overly small for the 3 of us. There was room for all our stuff, with some ingenious use of space. The beds were nice and comfy too.
Cracking feature stay, excellent amenities, excellent value for money (feature stay included VIP-esque early entry to farm & park, which ours really enjoyed)

Amazing place to stay the Cow sheds are really Fun and staff are amazing
We got to feed Lambs in the morning as we were staying there which was a highlight for the kids
Also the beach was only 25 minute drive away and the farm had a great play area for the kids
Beautiful quiet property. Perfect for a weekend getaway.

Very nice house on a golf club.  The best part of the house is the downstairs outside part with a large green area, pool, huge table, and lounge area.  That is where you will spend all your time.  It also does not have neighbors on either side, so you can play music and be a little loud without bothering the neighbors.  Mario was also very communicative and a great host.

Beautiful house located on the golf course, with an incredible view. The host Mario is great and responsive. It is a great weekend getaway with friends, but not so kid friendly (stairs without railing). The house needs a bit of updating.
This is one of a kind. Hector is one of the house help you can have.Thanks Mr.Mario

What a magnificent space to spend a weekend with family Xochi house is, we were amaze by the architectonic expressions on every corner and enjoyed the excellent service we received  from Hector and Bertha. We hope to return soon. Thanks a lot Mario!
Great place to stay!
Great hospitality! Amazing house
Amazing stay! The house is very confortable with a great location and view on the golf course.
The place was amazing, the staff were very kind and helpful. A great place for a weekend getaway.
Muchas gracias, esta hermosa tu casa

localizedReview.comments: Thank you very much, your house is beautiful

reviews.comments:
La casa es una maravilla. De hecho, las fotos están muy cortas. La alberca es muy buena y el clima es increíble. La temperatura del jacuzzi al calentar es perfecta. Todo muy bien y Héctor siempre estuvo atento con nosotros.
El repelente para mosquitos es una obligación pero nada del otro mundo.
Al igual los desayunos que nos dieron muy completos y muy ricos. Regresaríamos sin duda

localizedReview.comments:
The house is wonderful. The photos are actually very short. The pool is very good and the weather is amazing. The temperature of the jacuzzi when heating is perfect. Everything was great and Hector was always attentive to us.
Mosquito repellent is an obligation but nothing from the other world.
Likewise, the breakfasts that gave us very complete and delicious. We would definitely return

reviews.comments: Antes de llegar les sugiera contactarse con el señor Mario para tener la dirección y en la caseta los dejen pasar sin problema, de igual manera hay deficiencia eléctrica, si planean llevar una gran cantidad de alimentos es mejor llevar una hielera porque el refri no logra enfriar de manera correcta, la vista desde el jacuzzi y la piscina es espectacular, el lugar esta algo retirado y hay que pagar casetas de carretera, tanto de entrada como de salida (tomenlo en cuenta en su presupuesto)

localizedReview.comments: Before arriving, I suggest contacting Mr. Mario to have the address and at the cabin they let you in without any problem. Likewise, there is a lack of electricity. If you plan to bring a large amount of food, it is better to bring a cooler because the refrigerator cannot cool properly. The view from the jacuzzi and pool is spectacular. The place is somewhat far away and you have to pay for road booths, both at the entrance and exit (take this into account in your budget)

reviews.comments: 완벽한 휴가를 보낼 수 있는 장소

localizedReview.comments: A perfect place to spend your holiday

reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación de la casa, servicio Perfecto solo falta un poco de mantenimiento de la propiedad … importante llevar repelente para mosquitos.

localizedReview.comments: Excellent location of the house, perfect service, just a little maintenance of the property is needed... it is important to bring mosquito repellent.

reviews.comments: Bellísima casa y propiedad. No hace falta absolutamente nada, es una maravilla de lugar. El staff, Bertha y Hector, son sumamente agradables y nos ayudaron con todo lo que necesitamos, no dudaría ni un segundo en recomendar esta estancia a diferencia de cualquier otra en xochitepec. 💯

localizedReview.comments: Beautiful house and property. Absolutely nothing is needed, it's a wonder of place. The staff, Bertha and Hector, are extremely nice and helped us with everything we needed, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this stay unlike any other in Xochitepec. 💯

reviews.comments: Muy recomendable

localizedReview.comments: Highly recommended

reviews.comments: La casa superó nuestras expectativas, la atención de Hector y Bertha fueron espectaculares ! Estuvimos muy agusto y regresaremos muy pronto.

localizedReview.comments: The house exceeded our expectations, the attention of Hector and Bertha was spectacular ! We were very comfortable and will be back very soon.

reviews.comments: Ya nos hemos quedado varías veces y todas han sido un placer!

localizedReview.comments: We have stayed several times and all have been a pleasure!

reviews.comments: La casa es verdaderamente fabulosa y el personal los ayudará a pasar una estancia de calidad. El espacio tiende a ser muy caluroso (nada que no pueda ser soportable con el aire acondicionado), sólo hay que tomarlo en cuenta. Es una paraíso en Morelos.

localizedReview.comments: The house is truly fabulous and the staff will help you have a quality stay. The space tends to be very hot (nothing that can't be tolerable with the air conditioning), just take that into account. It's paradise in Morelos.

reviews.comments: Hemos disfrutado el airbnb en diferentes ocasiones y siempre salimos descansados y felices. La atención es increíble, el lugar súper limpio y con instalaciones comodísimas. Disfrutar todo el día bajo el sol para terminar con una cena ligera y el jacuzzi nocturno sirven para desconectarse de todo. Mil gracias por todo Mario!

localizedReview.comments: We have enjoyed Airbnb on several occasions and always left rested and happy. The service is incredible, the place is super clean and with very comfortable facilities. Enjoying all day in the sun to end with a light dinner and the night jacuzzi serves to disconnect from everything. Thank you very much for everything Mario!

primaryHost.about:
Architect based in Mexico City
-in contact with nature-

name: Dome house in the Sacred Valley

reviews.comments: amazing place

After traveling all over Peru, it was great to end my trip at this cute a d adorable Dome in the Sacred valley. My partner and I woke up to breath taking views of the Andes mountains,lush gardens and the sounds of birds hanging out in the trees. The location is near Pisac, there, you can go to local markets,shop in the town where local artisans make the most amazing cloths and trinkets and eat some good local food.After a long day of hiking and traveling it was great to relax and stay put. Our hostess Milagros  welcomed my partner and I with open arms. It was wonderful meeting people in the small area. we enjoyed every minute of our time there. The neighbors were lovely with wonderful pets. we felt so welcomed. Words can't describe how amazing that place is, all I know is that it touched me so deeply  that I can't wait to go back.

We had such a wonderful time during our stay at the dome house. The environment was so calm and we felt at peace instantly on arrival. This trip was for our 10 year anniversary, and the mood during our stay at the dome house was exactly what we were looking for.
We had a peaceful stay in a unique home. We absolutely loved the community, ceremony space, and meeting Milagro. It’s a peaceful property and we would definitely recommend staying here

Much more spacious and comfortable than you can see on the profile. A very beautiful piece of land with an abundance of flowers, attracting countless insects and birds. Many friendly dogs around and eas access for some great walks.
it's like a fairy tale, I loved it. so cozy and nice. wish I can have a house like this. I fell in love and Milagros is so nice. I love this place ❤️
A real gem between two mountain ranges. We felt at ease and at peace during our entire stay.

This place was a disappointment.
The area is beautiful and the WiFi is strong. But ..
The apartment is really really dirty it’s seem like no one clean the place in a long time! The towels smell so bad. There were died ants everywhere. Most of the kitchen tools are not in a condition to use.

The place full of mosquitoes ,flies and spiders. the net that is supposed to prevent it was apparently torn

The owner barley reply to me. Once asked for recommendations and didn’t get much of a help.

Every time I went outside they were 5-6 hugest dogs were running and jumping on me.
I love dogs but that’s didn’t feel so safe at night

There were many things different from the description.
1. There are no hikes from the Airbnb. To go to the waterfalls from the Airbnb. U must take a van for 30min to do any hike.
2. It’s not 60 sol taxi from Cusco.I was talking with the taxi drivers they mentioned, and they asked 150% more.
Everything, amazing. Best spot in Pisac!
Super kind host with a beautiful accomadation. One of the best Airbnb's I've stayed at

The setting was gorgeous. Very quiet and peaceful. I did an event at the place that was wonderful. The check-in was not great. The host had her teenage son meet me, and he was very sweet, but didn't seem to be trained in orienting a guest. He didn't know the wifi password and said he would get back to me. And did not. I just used my data on my phone instead. When I went to take a shower shortly before check-out, I discovered the hot water heater would not turn on. Maybe there were instructions that could have been included? They did let me check out an hour late which I really appreciated. I might stay again because of the peaceful location, but would get necessary information in advance so I would be prepared for little communication. Also, the description says conscious community, which I thought might mean there would be a community atmosphere. I am traveling solo and look for opportunities to connect. Everyone in this community keeps to themselves. They are very friendly if you pass them by, but the guest is not necessarily included in activities. That was not promised, I made that up. And, you should not expect that there is community there.
great location amazing views, cute house lofty house, will be back!

The dome house in Pisac is fantastic! The property is gorgeous, surrounded by mountains and they have done a fantastic job with the gardens. Stop by the temple for a sound healing or many other ceremonies, all held in in high vibration atmosphere. I would highly recommend.
Amazing place! Super cute, quiet and cozy!! The views are incredible...the flowers, birds and friendly dogs make this a gem to visit. Communication was great. Highly recommend!
Milagros is a very welcoming and warm personality. Her dome house is a very relaxing atmosphere and provides a great break from a more hectic pace elsewhere.

Beautiful location and beautiful houses from the outside. But inside the houses were not clean. There were a lot of dust, bugs and spiders. The single bed matresses were not comfortable. It also had an animal smell inside. It’s a pity, because the environment is amazing. They did clean well after our complaints. But the owner are very on their own. There was no more communication or interaction after checkin. We felt always like we were bothering them when there was a problem, like the internet not working. So, they were not one of the friendliest hosts we have met.

Honestly exceeded expectations. Going into it we expected a relaxing stay in the Sacred Valley and nature, but got so much more.

Milagros was very helpful getting us settled in, and helped arrange us get a taxi from Cusco to the location.

Can not recommend enough.

Beautiful grounds. Mornings were the most tranquil, sitting outside.
Friendly dogs running around- close to Pisac.
Milagros arranged a taxi to pick me up from Cusco airport. Friendly people
We had a great stay at Milagros house. Such an amazing location with great energy.
The dome house is a great place to stay! Easy to get into Pisac and very peaceful at La Pacha!

photos.caption: Pachatusan Mountain at the back of the Domes.

primaryHost.about: We live in Pisaq since 2004 and we love this beautiful town. We have some properties we love to rent to the travelers who visit this little paradise in the Andes. You will love the place, the ancient quechua people, the tradition, the mountains, the simple way of living and the delicious fruits and vegetables of the market.

name: Unique and luxurious hideaway with private hot tub

reviews.comments: The most perfect stay for myself, my partner and our dog. The Coop is as gorgeous as the photos suggest and the space has everything you need to make it a home away from home. A great location to explore North Norfolk. Thank you!

We had a lovely Christmas evening, hot tub was great. Lovely location over looking garden. The Coop had everything in it you could possibly need.
Thanks
Clare was very helpful. Everything was spotless and we really enjoyed our time there. The beach is very close and there are plenty of places to get good food very close.

The Coop at Clare’s place was amazing! Just a beautiful little place with a lovely view and great hot tub.

Clare was very quick to reply to any questions and the place was spotless. Lovely stay and would highly recommend it :)

Great location if you want to explore norfolk.
Great if you have dogs as you have a bit of land fenced off so your dog can sniff.
Really nice interior in the pod, basically everything you could need.
The free gift was a nice touch and gave you robes and slippers to use if you chose to.
Came with a nespresso coffee machine which was lovely.
There’s a book about how to use the hot tob, check out procedures and what to do locally, even gave takeaway numbers which we did use.. recommend the Chinese! Also thought it was cute that they showed their dogs in the book incase you have dogs or just see them about

The only two minor things I could say (which is why I gave 4/5 stars)
Although there was instructions for how to burn the wood for the hot tub, it was quite complicated to work and we gave up In the end. I do understand however when we went it was winter and electric is not in everyone’s budget.
Road noise can be loud but is stated it’s next to a road.
All in all, would recommend!

Had a really nice stay here for three nights in November, with my husband and young son. I think we had assumed it would be a bit more private and secluded as we had a couple of people walking by who could see us in the hot-tub, but that's more my interpretation rather than anything misleading in the description!
There was also no outdoor lighting during our stay, but otherwise we had all that we needed. Overall, this is a really lovely place and was really clean!
Louise
reviews.response:
Hi Louise,
Thank you for your review; feedback is always much appreciated. The bedding for the sofa bed is stored in the L shaped part which lifts up - I’m sorry you couldn’t find it - we will add this to the information folder. I apologise that you found the lack of outside lighting tricky; the solar lighting we had, had failed and we have wired deck lights due to be fitted tomorrow in fact. Hopefully, this will make it easier now that the nights have drawn in.

reviews.comments:
Good points:
Accommodation was spotlessly clean and very warm.
Sunny private southern aspect in living room.
Lovely location over looking garden.
Hot tub was great.
Easy access to Norfolk’s beaches and the Broads.
Comfortable bed.

Not so good points:
Nowhere in the address does it mention Bengate Cottages. This is the only sign on the entrance and if you arrive in the dark it’s not easy to see.
There is no lighting at all on the entrance to the accommodation , again, in the pitch black it’s very difficult to navigate up to the front door, especially with luggage.
reviews.response: Thank you for your review; we appreciate your feedback. We have mains deck lighting being installed this week to replace solar lighting that had failed and will be installing additional lighting at the main entrance.

reviews.comments: Lovely place to stay all made very easy by the hosts
Was a lovely stay loved the hot tub
The perfect pod for a little break. Everything you could possibly need, very well equipped, Clare thought of everything! Thanks for a great stay, we loved it.

We had a brilliant stay. The coop is fantastically comfortable, the bed especially so. Great shower too. The hot tub is amazing! We sat out in it a lot and found once it was up to temperature it stayed that way or was easy to re heat because of the cover. Clare has thought of everything you might need, and communication was very clear. We wanted a relaxing few days and we certainly got that so thank you. I can’t recommend it enough. The only thing to note, is that a road runs behinds the property. You can’t see it, but you can hear it. It isn’t constant but it is noticeable and does mean it isn’t totally peaceful at all times. It wasn’t a problem for us and would not stop me from returning.
Wonderful location and property. We stayed with our dog and it was all perfect. Would recommend and return happily. Thanks for everything.

The AirBNB is modern, immaculately clean and a great get away for a couple. We had the best stay here with our little dog which was also a bonus. Check in was smooth and we were left to our own devices, it's equipped with everything you would need and there are some lovely surprise touches. I would agree with some of the other reviews that it's not situated as we would have expected, near a road and visually in sight of other cottages but we could barely hear the road from inside and it's so quiet at night that it did not disturb us one bit, even when we were outside in the hot tub which we did most evenings. It's on a beautiful plot of land and very thoughtfully done. Would highly recommend.

The Coop is an aboslute treat. Location wise its perfect as its quiet and peaceful but close enough to local beaches and attractions/amenities. The accommodation is amazing and is a home away from home. The hot tub is an added bonus. I brought my dog along and the enclosed garden was perfect. She even made friends with the resident doggos. Highly recommend a stay.

The cabin was a very nice and relaxing place, very clean! And as you would expect any 5* hotel to be.
Only downfall we saw it wasn’t as private or secluded as we thought and there was a main road backed onto the property
But overall we enjoyed our stay!
The best Airbnb I have stayed at, fantastic little home with everything you could need and more. Hot tub fantastic. will definitely return when back in Norfolk.
Lovely setting, adorable pod with everything you could need provided. Hot tub a great touch and doesn’t take too long to warm up! Great base to explore the area.

The lodge was fantastic and just what we needed for a cute getaway in Norfolk! within driving distance of all the great attractions such as the broads, Cromer and Sheringham with some great local pubs within walking distance too! The hot tub was a dream. the lodge was extremely well maintained and clean and the gift bag was greatly appreciated! thanks Clare for a great stay!

Accommodation was lovely, everything you could possibly need for a short stay, albeit a very tight squeeze for 2 adults & 2 children. Good size for a couple though. Hot tub was great fun & the dressing gowns & slippers were a nice touch too. Sadly, we did check out 2 days early as the location was not what we were expecting. We came to Norfolk looking for a truly peaceful get away in a beautiful part of the country but the constant loud road noise, which is just over the hedge, went on all day & night really spoilt it for us. Being such a busy A road with huge lorries thundering past kept us awake all night & during the day there was no rest from it either. There was also a lot of dog hair on the sofa which was unfortunate particularly as I asked the host prior to arriving if it could get an extra good clean as I have allergies. If the location was quiet & peaceful then I would have given this 4 or 5 stars because we didn’t really have much else to complain about.
reviews.response: We are disappointed that you were unhappy with your stay. We do make the location of our glamping pod clear in our listing details.

reviews.comments:
It was a beautiful and peaceful stay in an amazing accommodation!
Really unusual and different
The dogs loved it too
Beautifully fitted out and very comfortable

photos.caption: Floor plan. Please note the hot tub is not under cover and there is no wall at the end of the deck. The open plan living area has a sofa bed and also a dining table and 4 chairs rather than a breakfast bar.

primaryHost.about: I live with my husband, Antony, and two children, Austin (14) and Lily (11). We love living in this area with all it has to offer, the Norfolk Broads, North Norfolk coast, country villages and the beautiful cathedral city of Norwich. We love the outdoor life, and enjoying walking, cycling, boating and paddle boarding in the local area.

name: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M2
address: Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai, Thailand

reviews.comments: Very nice place. We will come back.:)
Nice place, somthing very different. Clean and ok. We felt it was smaller than the pictures reflected. Too small for much more than a night.
Nice

The most beautiful and unique place I've ever stayed in. Extremely clean and peaceful. Host is extremely helpful friendly, and responsive. There are some really great food spots just a couple minutes walk from the property. It's really difficult to list everything amazing about this place, my family loved it and I couldn't recommend it more. Will definitely book the place again on future visits to Chiang Mai.

Thank you so much for having us!!❤️
A little secret garden to be explored.
This place was so beautiful and unique, definitely recommend staying here if you happy to be a bit out of the city this place is perfect. the whole environment is amazing

this was amazing stay everything was great.  good location and you could borrow a bike to ride around it was quiet and peaceful. if you decide to stay please meditate in the lotus room the energy was very nice. I do very much look forward to returning again in the future.

We loved this experience! The place was more modernized than expected for example the sink felt fancy and the build was very nice. The outside is gorgeous but our favorite part of the stay was one of the cats!! She is the sweetest thing EVER and we fell in love with her. Her name is S̄eụ̄xdāw we learned, which is Thai for leopard. She’s the one with different brown and gray colors! The location is a little far from the town, so the cost of rides added up fast. Our place had a little bit of a funky smell but it was very clean and they make sure there are no bugs before you check in. That was amazing. We booked an extra night than originally planned because we really enjoyed the stay. Having AC and hot water was a blessing.
reviews.response: Thank you for your sincere comment. Due to it's rainy season it's been rainy for a week, plus house is made by clay this might cause the smell of the house. We'll find the way to fix it out. Thank you again for let our place be part of your journey in Chiangmai and hope to see you both again.

reviews.comments: Absolutely love this place. Like Alice in Wonderland.
Beautiful stay with the most adorable cats!
Very unique space, quiet and calming. Enjoyed my stay

The place is really cute and original. It is peacefull and quiet.
It is a little bit far from the city centre. You need to take a GRAB (private taxi) if you went to go to the town or to reach this place.
GRAB are really cheap around 120 bahts to go to the city centre or bus station.
Nattakitt was very friendly and accommodating.  The property is beautiful, quiet, and secure.  I slept comfortably in my earthen house.  I would definitely stay here again!

Unlike anything you've ever stayed in before. Both interior and exterior designs are so very impressive. Mosquitoes are plenty outside at night, but thankfully all the mosquito nets do their job very well. Cats were very playful too. Hosts were also very responsive all the time. Many thumbs up!
Very nice place to stay. It was clean and as described.
beautiful, relaxing space. a bit far from the city but taxis are cheap in thailand so no big deal :)
The Place is Heavenly Earth Friendly, Surrounded by Mother Nature,...U can feel a Spiritual YOU when you are inside

Had a great stay in Leafy greens! Host and staff were very helpful. A great place to stay if you want some private time and away from crowded places. The design of the houses are very unique and instagram worthy.

A VERY special magickal place! HIGHLY RECOMMEND! You can live in a clay mushroom or snail dome, live in nature and get greeted by sweet cats. I am so happy I found this place!

The snail dome design is mindblowing and the mushroom is like your own tiny house. Can't wait to return!!

Definitely a must stay while in Chiang Mai. It’s a great quiet spot to relax with lots of adorable kittens living on the property. Only issue we had was that it was far from the main center. We had to take a Grab to and from everyday.

photos.caption: We will smoke for killing all kind of virus, including COVID19, inside the house after guest checked out.
We will close all windows and doors and let smoke kill all virus about 2 hours, then we will start cleaning.

primaryHost.about: I love travel, seeing different cultures, try different foods and living with nature. We would like to share our beautiful culture, foods and nature with all our friends.

reviews.comments: Kirby has an extraordinarily fun and unique space. I would highly recommend staying here and checking out all the detail that was put into every square inch resulting in an amazing experience.
Loved the place! Extremely creative and authentic.
What a fun place! Thank youfor the great experience!!

My son celebrated his birthday with friends for the night.  Kirby made him a birthday card the day of which was very sweet.  The boys had a ton of fun with the space, super clean.   Directions made it easy to find and directions inside made it easy to locate everything properly.  We would recommend this to friends for the unique and exciting experience.

This place is incredible! My nephew and I took an adventure to the spaceship and had the time of our lives. The costume closet, games and movies provided hours of fun and it's a super special memory we both will always hold. We're looking forward to visiting again!

All the instructions that Kirby provided were so easy to understand and he was very responsive to any questions asked. Highly recommend adventuring here!

One of a kind spaceship stay experience! Kirby, went above and beyond making sure we had everything and responded in real time if we needed anything! The new Murphy sleep sofa is awesome! Our family of 4 slept comfortably! In addition to all the cool spaceship gadgets, the place was immaculate!
Thanks Kirby and family!
Happy Holidays!
reviews.response:
Julia, It was great to meet you and your wonderful family!
I felt like we bonded over the whole Pacific Northwest ice storm ordeal!

reviews.comments: Even on a short and late notice, we arrived in the night to the most perfect spaceship I could have ever imagined. We will be regulars on this wondrous location and home, far far away from home.

Great landing place for our family of four! When we need another out of this work experience we’ll be back!

“It was very fun, but a tiny bit creepy…aliens” -Space Traveling Son 1

“I miss the UFO stuffy and I liked playing with the controls” -Space Traveling So. 2
Me and my friends stayed here for just one night and we are already looking at coming back. it was a truly amazing experience and super impressive. message response time was amazing and fast.
What a weekend to remember!! I have nothing but good things to say about the communication, cleanliness and spectacular memorable Airbnb that the owner put his heart and soul into.

My son, his best friend and his dad, celebrated his 16th birthday at this incredible spaceship.  It was an amazing time in beautiful country that brought much laughter and many smiles.  Thank you for a wonderful time as special memories were made.
This place was utterly amazing. My grandchildren and me stayed here for 3 nice and we were so surprised at how cute and how much this looks like a spaceship.
Out of this world!

Wow what a special place Kirby has created!! We had a wonderful themed getaway with our kids. We were able to disconnect and enjoy playing games and dressing up in the costumes he provided. So many wonderful lights and memorabilia that made it memorable. My kids were so upset to have to go home! Thanks for a great experience.
You can really tell how much work is put into this airbnb! Definitely the place for sci-fi geeks and space-loving kids. More spacious then it looks, imo
Enjoyed the stay. LMK if you ever want to trade notes on AirBnb hosting, UFOs, or music.

The spaceship was amazing!! We love themed places like this that make a vacation unique and fun. You can tell Kirby and Patricia put a lot of thought and work into all the little details from the spaceship itself to the decor to the costumes and props to the music CD!! Highly recommend if you like all things outer space. Next time I would bring a pad to put on the futon but other than that we had a blast!

What a fun trip!!! The UFO is obviously a labor of love with so much thought, care, and attention put into it. We were constantly finding new and exciting treasures to geek out over. It was a cozy place with all basics provided, plus more like tang! Thank you for sharing your space!
🛸 👽 ✨️

Thank you Kirby! It is an incredible experience. My son was getting ready to deploy. It was a great family bonding experience. The details in regards to the original Jupiter 2 are very good. The sleeping arrangements are not what I expected, but they work!
You must be prepared to have your food and snacks with you for a better experience. Sunset was at 4:25 and I am nor comfortable driving unknown country roads at night.
Kirby is a delightful and very responsive.
Outstanding visit, very fun and unique! We would absolutely recommend and we plan to stay again!

primaryHost.about: Kirby and Patricia Swatosh

reviews.comments: Absolutely incredible experience. Completely unique and totally worth it. Definitely one of the coolest things I have ever done

This experience lives up to the hype!!! We had such a great time! None of us had climbed nor ziplined anything remotely close to this, but the guides were very helpful, informative, and reassuring. The food was delicious, and the view was spectacular. I could go on all day about this adventure. Do yourself the favor of experiencing this!

Many thanks to Daniel, Leo and Marco!

It is a super cool experience!  We really enjoyed it and felt like our guides kept us super safe and happy! Dinner and breakfast were delicious!  Also look at all the attention to detail! Every single last thing has been thought about!!  And impressed with the aluminum welding!
Truly a once in a lifetime experience. If you’re on the fence, just do it. It’s a combination of incredible views, adrenaline inducing activities, and great food. 10/10
We had so much fun at Sky Lodge. All staff were so friendly and helpful. Wonderful meals! we greatly enjoyed our pictures too

This is a must, once in a lifetime experience. The pods were clean, beds were comfortable and the views incredible. Our guides, Jose and Brian were beyond helpful when climbing up to the pods. Dinner was prepared as soon as we arrived which was extremely tasty. We also received a healthy tasty breakfast prior to coming down via zipline. This was truly memorable, highly recommend staying at Natalia's place. You will not regret it.
Don't think about it, just do it. This is an epic experience. Everything was perfect - the guides were amazing as well. Highly, highly recommend.

What an incredible unique experience.  Brian, Cesar and Mario were awesome.  Great food carried up that cliff.  Super comfortable room.  Both the climb and the zipling were awesome.  And such a beautiful location.  Definitely something to remember for a lifetime.

Incredible once in a lifetime experience! The pods were great, the guides Caesar & Leo  were awesome & very experienced, great food, would definitely recommend to anyone. Excellent communication with Natalia.
Great experience!
It was more than just a stay, but a complete, guided tour, and a curated whole experience.
This was such a great experience. Caesar and Leo were great!  If you are looking for an exciting adventure  this is the place for you!

Skylodge was nothing short of incredible! The via ferrata might be a little nerve inducing at first if you’re afraid of heights but it takes very little time to get in the swing of things and I was confident that the route was secure. The staff was incredible throughout the experience! I highly recommend paying the extra fee for the photography, our pictures turned out fantastic! The food provided was great. The bed in our skylodge was the most comfortable we found in Peru, with wonderful pillows as well. Obviously, the view is magnificent! The zip lining down in the morning was a blast. I cannot recommend this experience more!

Absolutely magnificent experience! Once in a lifetime adventurous stay, with stunning sunset and sunrise views from the Sky Pod. Climbing the via ferrata up always felt safe and still exhilarating, and same applies to the zipline down, with major thanks to the guides involved for helping out here. The photoshoot offered was well worth the added cost, and was quite fun with the photographer. I especially loved the small touches like the large tea selection with the hot water for the morning, the playing cards and dominoes, and even the fresh smelling pot pourri in the bathroom underneath the tissues. One of a kind marvelous experience!
The best thing I did on my trip in Peru. So much fun climbing via ferrata and get to the top by sundown. The views are spectacular and so worth every penny!

Absolutely loved this experience - fantastic guides and a once in a lifetime opportunity. Would absolutely recommend! Only call out is you should be prepared to climb at night/in the dark between the pods.

Incredible experience! I really enjoyed it even for a person who's afraid of heights. Mildly terrifying to climb, but it felt safe and the pods were totally worth it. The guides are very friendly and competent. Do not miss the opportunity!
Once in a lifetime experience. I was sacred but 100% glad we did it. Worth every penny and a total blast!

I opted for the via Ferrata up and zip line down. They also have a new starlodge if climbing and zip lining are not for you. This was the most incredible experience I’ve had at an Airbnb! The views of the Milky Way and the sacred valley are spectacular! This is a one of a kind experience that you can’t find elsewhere in the world.

We loved our stay here, it was so memorable and I am glad we stayed a few days longer in Peru so we could experience this adventure.  (For your information, you can purchase a picture package from a photographer that takes really wonderful shots of your climb, stay, and decent, for 200\S per person.  We did this, and I am glad we did, but he would have preferred us to have cash.)
Very nice stay. Lovely people and a beautiful place. We will come back in the summer.
We had a very pleasant stay! Facilities were all neat & clean and the concierge was pleasant. Grounds on which the threehouse is based are nice as well.
reviews.response: Thank you!

reviews.comments: Impeccable
It was really great! We enjoyed our stay very much! ☺️
Cabin suspended in the trees, a quirky  way to spend the night. A wonderful venue and very welcoming hosts. Swimming pool was a bonus
reviews.response: Thank you so much Philip! It was a real pleasure to have you in our tiny cabin!

reviews.comments: We had a great stay at the cabane! Would definitely recommend for a couple of days in a unique setting!
reviews.response: Many thanks Leander for your kindness!

reviews.comments: Un super logement insolite dans un cadre magnifique et bien entretenu. Hôtes réactifs et accueillants, à tester sans hésitation.

localizedReview.comments: A super unusual place in a beautiful and well maintained setting. Responsive and welcoming hosts, to be tested without hesitation.

reviews.comments: Mon enfant de 5 ans et moi avons passé une nuit dans la cabane suspendue. Nous avions cherché un lieu insolite dans un cadre calme, entouré de la nature, pour sortir du train-train habituel. On était bien servi. Nous y avons trouvé notre bonheur entre aventure, confort et improvisation.

localizedReview.comments: My 5 year old and I stayed one night in the hanging cabin. We had been looking for an unusual place in a quiet setting, surrounded by nature, to get out of the usual train. We were well served. We found our happiness between adventure, comfort and improvisation.

reviews.comments:
Séjour très agréable !
Je recommande a 100%

localizedReview.comments:
Very pleasant stay!
I recommend it 100%.

reviews.comments:
Tout était parfait. Le cadre, l’accueil, le petit déjeuner, les sanitaires, la piscine et j’en passe..
Je recommande fortement aux personnes dans le désir de dépaysement.
Merci encore aux hôtes !
reviews.response: Merci beaucoup!

localizedReview.comments:
Everything was perfect. The setting, the welcome, the breakfast, the bathrooms, the pool and so on.
I highly recommend to people in the desire to change their scenery.
Thanks again hosts!

reviews.comments: Génial nous avons adoré !
reviews.response: Merci beaucoup!!!

localizedReview.comments: Awesome we loved it!

reviews.comments: Het was moeilijk om te communiceren met de host vanwege het gebrek aan beide talen. Ik heb gevraagd of er kon worden geparkeerd in de straat en de host heeft aangegeven dat het kon, echter pas toen ik daar aankwam is verteld dat het betaald parkeren is. Het huis zag er mooi uit, het enige nadeel was dat de lakens en de handdoeken muf roken. Het fijne aan het huis was dat er veel extra’s bij inbegrepen waren, denk hierbij aan borden, bestek, wasmiddel etc.
reviews.response:
Hi Sofija,
I think you might have made a mistake between our comment and the one you have written for another host because your comment doesn't fit at all with our property. The communication was good between us. We have a free parking. You booked a tiny cabin and not a home, and the cleaning is perfect a you might have seen.
Can you please delete your comment because it's obviously not the one you have written for us.
Thank you.
Best regards.
Agnès

localizedReview.comments: It was difficult to communicate with the host due to the lack of both languages. I asked if it was possible to park in the street and the host indicated that it was possible, but only when I got there it was told that it is paid parking. The house looked nice, the only downside was that the sheets and towels smelled musty. The nice thing about the house was that there were many extras included, such as plates, cutlery, laundry detergent, etc.

reviews.comments:
Agnes is een zeer vriendelijke en communicatieve host. Avontuurlijke maar rustige plek om te verblijven, hoog in de bomen.
Ontvangen door een zeer vriendelijke conciërge die zorgde voor een lekker ontbijt. Zeker aan te raden.
reviews.response: Thank you!

localizedReview.comments:
Agnes is a very friendly and communicative host. Adventurous but quiet place to stay, high in the trees.
Received by a very friendly concierge who provided a nice breakfast. Definitely recommended.

reviews.comments:
het verblijf was heel aangenaam.
enkel een vuilbakje in de buurt of een lampje aan de trap/hangbrug konden het nog beter maken

localizedReview.comments:
the stay was very pleasant.
only a trash can nearby or a light on the stairs/suspension bridge could make it even better

reviews.comments: Zeer aangename en unieke ervaring! Zeker de moeite waard.

localizedReview.comments: Very pleasant and unique experience! Definitely worth it.

reviews.comments: De hanghut is ontzettend netjes en ruimer dan wij hadden verwacht. Het is een heel unieke ervaring en voor ons de perfecte start van onze roadtrip door Frankrijk. Hosts zijn super vriendelijk en met dit mooie weer was het zwembad een heel fijne verkoeling.
reviews.response: Bedankt en een goede reis naar Frankrijk!

localizedReview.comments: The hanging hut is incredibly neat and spacious than we expected. It is a very unique experience and for us the perfect start to our road trip through France. Hosts are super friendly and with this nice weather the pool was a very nice cooling.
localizedReview.response: Thanks and have a safe trip to France!

reviews.comments: Precies wat je verwacht, super ervaring!
reviews.response: Thank you :)

localizedReview.comments: Exactly what you expect, super experience!

reviews.comments: Geweldig mooi, romantisch plekje! Wakker worden tussen de bomen en met een Frans ontbijtje. De perfecte plek voor een romantische nacht!
reviews.response: Hartelijk bedankt!!!

localizedReview.comments: Amazingly beautiful, romantic place! Wake up among the trees and with a French breakfast. The perfect place for a romantic night!

reviews.comments: Un accueil formidable par le gardien. Une infrastructure magnifique. Je recommande fortement
reviews.response: Merci beaucoup!

localizedReview.comments: Wonderful hosting by the caretaker. Beautiful infrastructure. I highly recommend it.

name: Nacpan Beach Glamping, Ocean View Room

reviews.comments:
Wonderful tents, friendly staff, and awesome restaurant next door. You can go to Sunmai, or Angkla restaurant. There are also about two or so other smaller places to eat at. I stayed with my friend and boyfriend for three nights and rated the place 5 stars.

One caveat though with staying and trying to relax in Nacpan Beach… There are a LOT of merchants walking around really forcing you to buy things from them. They can’t take no for an answer and really will follow you around, even when you’re lounging trying to relax. One of them even grabbed my friend’s wrist as she was walking away. I know they’re just trying to make a living, but maybe there’s an opportunity there to regulate it more, if possible. We dreaded going out of the premises to walk around the beach because they are always waiting by the gate.

We loved the beach glamping at Nacpan for a different experience on holiday. The beach is beautiful and the staff are very friendly. The one complaint is that a lot of the food on the menu was unavailable, limited choice and slow service
Great stay, highly recommend

Wow what an amazing experience, the people the attention to detail was amazing, these guys are true passionate about hospitality, very kind and warm welcoming, they sent up a private dinner for me and my partner and they wore able to make it a surprise for her, Robert and nathanel will like to thank everyone there from Daniel to mark amazing guys we love you

Thank you
Rob and Nat
great place
We enjoyed our stay at the Glamping spot in Nacpan Beach. The beach is very nice and relaxing.
We loved our stay at the Glamping site. The location is very beautiful and the sunsets are dreamy. The included breakfast was very good. Thank you!

It was so far my best stay on AirBnB. We really enjoyed the service it was far beyond our expectations. Everyone is so polite and kind. The accommodation is really clean and comfortable. Breakfast is free and it’s a lot, you can take out the food you can’t finish all in one go.
Will definitely come back one day. Highly recommended. It’s a bit pricy but totally worth it.
Thank you for the amazing stay. :)

Location is a bit far from El Nido proper so the transportation can be a bit expensive about 1500 pesos per trip, it can be lowered to 700 pesos if there are other guests going the same way. Tricycle is another option 700-800 pesos per ride one way Nacpan to El nido proper.

the place is very nice, the staff is very accommodating and you have good privacy. The bathroom is separate from the tent, but its cleaned all the time.

Food is good too. They prepare your breakfast both Filipino and or American dish. Thank you Nacpan Glamping it was a great experience at the tent and the beach.

Absolutely loved this place. My boyfriend proposed to me here with a beautiful private dinner on the beach!Everybody is super sweet and helpful and they went above and beyond to meet our needs. Also, you HAVE to get a massage from angies touch right beside the Sunmai restaurant. We will definitely be back again.

We had a great stay at Nacpan Beach on the Glamping Site.

The check in was very easy, there are plenty of staff to help and they all provide excellent service.

The tent itself is amazing, lots of space and a good AC unit means that you don't even feel as if it is a tent, other than hearing the waves from the beach and the surrounding nature!

The whole resort is incredible, right on an amazing beach with some great small bars nearby worth trying.

Overall I would recommend this resort to anyone, it is an unforgettable place to stay with great facilities and staff.
This place is magical! It’s a paradise in paradise

If you have the spirit of adventure, and even if you don’t , Nacpan Glamping will tap into your hippie heart!  The beach 🏖 is stunning and the tent gardens beautiful.   Nightly entertainment is very cool , delicious cocktails and good food add to the experience.  Staff is friendly and accommodating, Can’t wait to return!

Amazing time glamping with no issues with bugs etc :) amazing beach setting and the air con makes the tent super cool and comfortable. Staff all lovely and fantastic cocktails! A lot of western people get Ill in el nido but we had no problems here suggesting that care is taken at every stage with food and drink preparation. Book this place, you won’t regret it!
it was a great stay. we had a short 1 night stay but a memorable one. thank you!
It is good to stay in Nacpan Glamping if you want to experience something special. Staffs are so kind and food are great with reasonable price.

Overall we are glad we stayed here, but we definitely had some issues. The rooms were great and the staff was great as well. The biggest issue we had was the resort trying to charge us extra or over charge us for things we had already paid for or had previously been quoted a price on. IMO, it seemed like they may have been trying to take advantage of tourists that don’t pay close attention to their bill. Our AC also didn’t work the first night so we had to switch rooms and the restaurant seemed to be out of a lot of things

Wonderful location and overall great concept. My suggestion for visitors bring bug repellent as the insects get aggressive and do bite. Bring plenty of cash to eat and the restaurants since there is no ATM and cards are not accepted on the island at this time. I would recommended the experience and found it to be unique and would do it again.

This incredible oasis went way beyond our expectations. The staff were so hospitable and accommodating. We stayed in the tents and they were so luxurious. The bathrooms we always clean. I got sick one day and the chef made me a special soup and the staff gave me medication. They went above and beyond to make sure you were enjoying your time. Everyone was so happy and helpful. Not to mention nacpan beach is like paradise!
Highly recommend.

Nacpan Glamping is a great experience that one should not miss when in El Nido. It is worth the trip to El Nido just to experience a few nights at Nacpan Beach. This is an eco friendly experience and we enjoyed releasing hatchling turtles into the ocean. We will definitely return
